T02TD2512.2E:123a-0: khams gsum pa zhes bya ba ni sa'i 'jig rten la sogs pa'i @123a * //
T02TD2512.2E:123a-1: sems can gyi 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.2E:123a-2: mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba ni mi 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:123a-3: ri rab la sogs pa thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:123a-5: brtan zhing sra ba ni rdo rje dang 'dra pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:123a-6: nor che ba ni rin po che'i 'byung khung yang de nyid yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:123a-7: rgyu ba zhes bya ba ni sems dang ldan pa'i stobs kyis 'gro bas na rgyu ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:123a-8: de nyid bstan pa ni sems kyi 'du byed pa zhes bya ba yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:123a-9: sems kyis 'du byas pa ni sems kyi 'du byed de sems kyi 'du byed de las de shin tu 'gro bas na rgyu ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:123a-11: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sems las byung ba'i tshul ston pa'i sgo nas khams gsum du zo chun brgyud pa'i tshul gyis yang dang yang du skye bar kun du ston par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:123a-12: thams cad byed pa zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid nas rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i bar du mdzad pas na thams cad byed do //
T02TD2512.2E:123a-13: thams cad nyid ces bya ba ni dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.2E:123a-14: dang po'i sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa'i dang por thog ma med pa'i ngo bor bzhugs pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:123a-16: sems dpa' che zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:123a-17: chos bdag med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis thams cad du khyab pas na sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:123a-18: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin can gyi sems dpa' yin pas na byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:123a-19: bde ba rab stsol zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi tshogs la skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i bde ba stsol bas bde rab stsol to //
T02TD2512.2E:123a-20: sems dpa'i skyil krung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.2E:123a-21: btsun mo'i tshogs bcas zhes bya ba ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs dang lhan cig bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:123a-22: sna tshogs pa ni dngos po tha dad pa'i bdag nyid can te //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-0: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi rdo rje lha mo rnams kyi mdun du bltas nas de bzhin gshegs pa @123b bzhugs pas na /
T02TD2512.2E:123b-1: rdo rje lha mos yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-2: de ltar na de nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:123b-3: rdo rje lha mos yongs su bskor //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-4: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pa ni 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-5: de ltar dang po'i sbyor ba gsungs nas da ni /
T02TD2512.2E:123b-6: bde ba chen po rab grub phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02TD2512.2E:123b-8: ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-9: bde ba chen po ni thar pa chen po ste /
T02TD2512.2E:123b-10: de grub pa ni mngon sum du byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-12: 'dod chags chen po rnams dag phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-14: 'dod chags chen po ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-16: dngos grub kun la rjes chags pas //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-21: / de'i rnam par dag pa ni nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas pa bral pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:123b-23: ma lus gdul bya'i don du ni //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-25: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa ma lus pa la lhag par mos pa'i sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad lung dang rtogs pa la rab tu 'jog pa ni 'dul ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-27: dngos grub thams cad rab grub phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-28: zhes bya ba rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub ni dngos grub thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-29: de rab tu grub pa ni de bsgom pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis de shin tu thob pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:123b-30: de'i phyir bdag sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.2E:123b-31: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang gi ngo bo ste /
T02TD2512.2E:123b-32: de la sogs pa'i mdzes pa gang yin pa de ni sems dpa' chen po la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:123b-33: rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa sems dpa' chen po dam pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:123b-34: rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul gyi rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD2512.2E:123b-35: sogs pa'i sgras ni rdo rje yid las byung ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:123b-36: klu'i dkyil 'khor gyi bar gyi tshul la bslab pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-0: de rnams kyi dngos grub thams cad ni ji skad bshad pa'i dngos grub thams @124a * //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-2: de lta bu'i dngos grub thams cad rab tu grub par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:124a-3: dam tshig las mi 'da' bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-4: dam tshig mchog ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-5: rgyal bas kyang ni bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-7: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin /
T02TD2512.2E:124a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bsrung bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:124a-9: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' lhag par mos pa'i sems can gyi don du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul du byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:124a-10: de ltar na de bsrung bar bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-11: rdo rje bsnyems ma'i tshul 'chang zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-12: phyag rgya thams cad rnam dag phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-13: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na phyag rgya thams cad de /
T02TD2512.2E:124a-14: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-15: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni gdul bya gzhan du ma gyur pa'i sems kyis rtogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' mchog grub phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-17: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ni /
T02TD2512.2E:124a-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i grub mchog pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:124a-19: gdul bya rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po mngon sum du byas pa'o ;
T02TD2512.2E:124a-20: / bde chen rdo rje che sgrub pa //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-21: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-22: de sgrub pa ni bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-23: rgyu ci zhig gi phyir zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:124a-24: dngos grub kun la zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2512.2E:124a-25: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub la sogs pa thams cad do//
T02TD2512.2E:124a-26: de thams cad sgrub pa de'i don du snying po gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-27: ci de 'ba' zhig gsungs sam zhe na //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-28: ye shes phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-30: de la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pas bsgrub pa la nges par sbyor ba'i bsgom pa ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-31: de ston par byed pa'i sgra la yang nye bar gdags pas de skad ces bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:124a-32: aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes gang bshad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-33: 'dod chags dam tshig ces grags te /
T02TD2512.2E:124a-35: de yi rjes grub rnal 'byor ni //
T02TD2512.2E:124a-36: rjes su chags pa zhes pa bshad do //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-1: / ye shes kyi phyag rgya nyid dam tshig ste /
T02TD2512.2E:124b-2: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pa'i ye shes la nges par sbyor ba'i tshul gyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir de dang yang dag par ldan pa ni bcings ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:124b-3: ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang yang dag pa'i snying po ni ye ge h'um de ston par byed pa'am de skyed par byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-4: de nyid kyis na dam pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-5: gang gis bsod nams mi ldan pa //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-6: zhes bya ba ni dam pa'i chos spong ba'am /
T02TD2512.2E:124b-7: mtshams med pa la sogs pa mi dge ba thams cad byed pa ni bsod nams mi ldan pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-8: de rnams kyang gang gi dngos grub thams cad rnyed par dka' ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-9: de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-10: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du ma zhugs te de dag kyang ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-11: don yod pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-12: thogs pa med pa ni bzlog tu med pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-14: mchog ni dam par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-15: thams cad ni ma lus pa ste dngos grub thams cad rnyed par dka' ba ma yin pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:124b-16: snying po gang zhig gsungs pa des don yod pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:124b-19: mchog gi dngos grub thams cad rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dngos grub rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs par skyed par gyur pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-20: bde ba chen po rdo rje che //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-21: gsang ba'i mchog ste dam tshig brtan //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-22: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi mchog ste bskyed pa'i rgyu'o ;
T02TD2512.2E:124b-23: / brtan pa ni mi shigs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-24: dngos po thams cad bsgrub pa ni //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-25: zhes bya ba ni bum pa bzang po la sogs pa dngos po thams cad bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-26: rtog pa thams cad myur 'grub byed //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-27: ces bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bur /
T02TD2512.2E:124b-28: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rtogs pa gsungs pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:124b-29: gnyis par gang gsungs pa de rnams bsgrub pa ni yi ge h'um snying po'i tshul gyis bsgrub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:124b-30: thog ma mtha' med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa la thog ma ni dang por skye ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:125a-1: thog mtha' med cing zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:125a-2: thog ma dang tha ma'i bral ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:125a-3: da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu bzhugs so zhes ston pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:125a-4: dang por byung bzhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:125a-5: bskal ba bzang po la sogs pa'i dang por thog ma med pa'i tshul nyid kyis bzhugs pa yin pa'i phyir dang po byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:125a-6: bsod nams thams cad cher ma thob //
T02TD2512.2E:125a-7: zhes bya ba ni gtsang bar byed pas bsod nams te /
T02TD2512.2E:125a-8: sdig pa'i dri ma thams cad 'khrud pas dag par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:125a-9: bsod nams kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na bsod nams thams cad de 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams de thams cad ni chen po yang yin la mthon po yang yin pas na /
T02TD2512.2E:125a-10: bsod nams thams cad cher ma thob ste /
T02TD2512.2E:125a-11: bsod nams ma lus par skyes zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:125a-12: gzi can rnams kyi bde mchog phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:125a-14: chos bdag med pa'i ye shes kyi snang bas bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bud shing nges par bsreg pas na gzi can te /
T02TD2512.2E:125a-15: gzi mdangs kyis 'bar ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02TD2512.2E:125a-16: gzi can de rnams kyi rang gi dang gis rnam pa rtog pa med par byung ba sems dang sems las byung ba de ni bde ba yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:125a-17: de'i don du gdul bya rnams kyi thar pa chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:125a-18: 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:125a-19: zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi ni aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:125a-20: rjes su chags pa sgom pa ste //
T02TD2512.2E:125a-21: thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba chen po yang dang yang mngon du bya'o zhes bya ba ni rjes su chags par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par ston pa'i tshig ste /
T02TD2512.2E:125a-22: de lta bu'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:125a-23: ci bzhin zhes bya ba ni ci nus pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:125a-24: rang gi nus pas sam sngon gyi 'phen shugs kyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:125a-25: ye shes rab 'jug ces bya ba ni lhag pa'i rnal 'byor ni nges bde ni ye shes te //
T02TD2512.2E:125b-0: de'i rab tu 'jug @125b pa ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed de /
T02TD2512.2E:125b-1: sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:125b-2: des na aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes //
T02TD2512.2E:125b-3: ji bzhin ye shes rab 'jug pas //
T02TD2512.2E:125b-4: zhes bya ba ni 'dis 'dul ba rnams la thun mong du bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.2E:125b-5: nye ba'i snying po dang bcas snying po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:125b-6: nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa'i snying po ni yi ge h'um ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:125b-7: de nyid ni dang po ste thog ma med pa'i tshul gyis bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa'i thog mar rgyun mi 'chad par bzhugs shing mtha' med pas na dang po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:125b-8: bskal thog ces bya ba ni bskal pa ni bzang po la sogs pa'i thog ma ste /
T02TD2512.2E:125b-9: dang por bcom ldan 'das gsungs zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.2E:125b-10: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs shing bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:125b-11: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa'i snying po gsungs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:125b-13: gcig tu tshogs par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:125b-14: phyung zhes bya ba ni bskyed par gyur pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:125b-15: phyogs bcu thams cad du 'gro ba sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:125b-16: 'di skad ston pa yin te sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di chags pa'i gong na nam mkhar gyur pa nam mkha'i phyogs der /
T02TD2512.2E:125b-17: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' thams cad la gnas pa'i rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas khang na sna tshogs padma la rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa bzhugs te /
T02TD2512.2E:125b-18: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes gsungs par gyur pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:125b-19: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dus par mdzad nas gshegs te /
T02TD2512.2E:125b-20: byon nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems can gyi 'jig rten dang bcas pa skyed par mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:125b-21: phyung zhing 'gro ba thams cad dang snod kyi 'jig rten sna tshogs te /
T02TD2512.2E:125b-22: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i rang bzhin can skyed cing phyung bar gyur to //
T02TD2512.2E:125b-23: gtso bos dngos grub dris gyur pa //
T02TD2512.2E:126a-0: zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi khams de bskyed pa rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ji ltar @126a * //
T02TD2512.2E:126a-2: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la dres pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:126a-3: ji ltar skad cig gis 'gro grub //
T02TD2512.2E:126a-4: sems dpa' chen po myur du smros //
T02TD2512.2E:126a-5: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'gro ba sems can gyi khams 'di rnams skad cig gis zhes bya ba bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub tshe 'di nyid la myur du grub pa de lta bus sems can chen po myur du smros shig ces gtso bos dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la dris pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:126a-6: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:126a-7: de nas dris pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
T02TD2512.2E:126a-8: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dang po'i dkyil 'khor de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang por sems can thams cad gzhug pas /
T02TD2512.2E:126a-9: byin gyis brlabs nas rgya che ba'i tshul can gyis /
T02TD2512.2E:126a-10: sems can thams cad la so sor snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:126a-11: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de bstan par mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:126a-12: de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:126a-13: rdo rje kun mchog dam tshig ni //
T02TD2512.2E:126a-15: rdo rje kun ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyis bsdus pa gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:126a-16: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de'o //
T02TD2512.2E:126a-17: de nas bsgrub pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la sogs pa bskyed pa ni grub pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:126a-18: cho ga ji lta ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:126a-19: ji ltar slob ma 'jug pa'i cho gas 'dir slob ma sgrub pa de bzhin du de rnams kyang ring por mi thogs par snod du rung bar bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:126a-20: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar ring por mi thogs par snod du byas pa'i sems can rnams la rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la sogs pa dngos grub kyi mchog bsgrub par 'gyur pa na /
T02TD2512.2E:126a-21: de'i rjes thogs nyid la skyes shing byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:126a-22: de phan chad ces bya ba ni sems can khams gsum na spyod pa thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:126a-23: ji bzhin las kyi rjes su 'gro //
T02TD2512.2E:126a-24: zhes bya ba ni sems can gang de dag gi las dkar po'am nag po'am /
T02TD2512.2E:126a-25: 'dres ma ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du las des bde 'gro la sogs par ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'gro bas na /
T02TD2512.2E:126b-0: ji bzhin las kyi rjes su @126b 'gro na /
T02TD2512.2E:126b-1: rang gi las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang las skyes zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-2: rtag par sdig kun kun du spyod //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-4: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni nyin re'o //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-5: sdig pa kun ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-6: kun du spyod pa ni byed pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:126b-7: des na rtag par sdig kun kun du spyod /
T02TD2512.2E:126b-8: ces bya ba ste 'dis ni sems can sdig pa can mi dge ba kun du spyod pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-9: ngan zhe na ni dngos po ngan pa la chags shing zhen pa ste de nyid du mthas gtugs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-10: 'dis ni sems can gyi tshogs gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-11: le lo byas pa ni dge ba'i las la mi 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:126b-12: mi dge ba'i las la mi 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:126b-13: nor ba sogs pa la yang mi 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni ci yang mi byed pas na /
T02TD2512.2E:126b-14: de ni 'dir le lo can zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-15: 'dis ni sems can gyi tshogs gsum pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-16: da ni zhes pa ni da ltar te /
T02TD2512.2E:126b-17: bshad ma thag pa'i sems can gyi tshogs gsum pa ni sems can gyi khams la gzigs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mgon po de bzhin gshegs pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la dris par gyur pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:126b-20: bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:126b-21: bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ji ltar zhes bya ba ni mi bzod pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-22: na zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rtog pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-23: 'byin pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-24: dge ba thams cad kun du bskyed //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-26: dge ba ni bsod nams so //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-27: thams cad ni ma lus pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-28: kun du bskyed pa ni bskyed par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-30: gal te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' sems can thams cad skyed par mdzad na /
T02TD2512.2E:126b-31: bsod nams thams cad bskyed par gyur na /
T02TD2512.2E:126b-32: de'i yongs su dag pa nyid kyis sems can dag par gyur na /
T02TD2512.2E:126b-33: de lta bur mi snang ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-34: de bas na ci zhig tu nges she na sems can gyi phung po nye bar nges pas na bcom ldan 'das ni skyed pa po ma yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-35: de rnams kyi ni tshig gsan nas //
T02TD2512.2E:126b-36: zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis dris pa'i tshig gsan nas so //
T02TD2512.2E:127a-1: 'di skad du gsungs pa yin zhes bya ba ni gsungs par 'gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:127a-3: rdo rje 'dzin ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:127a-4: rdo rje 'dzin na ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:127a-5: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad sprul pas na kun byed do //
T02TD2512.2E:127a-6: skyed par byed pa yin pas na 'byin pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:127a-7: yang ci zhig gsungs she na /
T02TD2512.2E:127a-8: las kyi 'ching ba lhod gyur pa //
T02TD2512.2E:127a-10: 'di dag mi dge ba la 'jug pa las kyang dge ba la 'jug par byed la /
T02TD2512.2E:127a-11: dge ba la zhugs pa las kyang mi dge ba la 'jug par 'gyur la /
T02TD2512.2E:127a-12: la la ni dge ba dang mi dge ba gnyi ga la 'jug pa'am /
T02TD2512.2E:127a-13: ci yang mi byed pa dag kyang yod do //
T02TD2512.2E:127a-14: de bas na 'di dag ni 'dres mar spyod pa yin gyi /
T02TD2512.2E:127a-15: 'di rnams kyi las kyi mtha' dge ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:127a-16: mi dge ba'i tshul gcig tu nges par bstan par gyur pa ni ma yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:127a-17: de bas na 'di rnams rnam pa gsum du gyur pa la /
T02TD2512.2E:127a-18: nga ni lung 'bogs pa tsam gyi tshul gyis 'di rnams kyi 'byin pa po yin gyi /
T02TD2512.2E:127a-19: rnam pa thams cad nas thams cad du skyed par byed pa ni ma yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:127a-20: gal te thams cad nas thams cad du skyed pa po yin par gyur na ni /
T02TD2512.2E:127a-21: de'i tshe thams cad bde ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:127a-22: de'i tshig de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:127a-23: shin tu chags pa rnams dag phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:127a-25: lhag par chags pas na shin tu chags pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:127a-26: chos bdag med pa'i 'dod chags dang /
T02TD2512.2E:127a-27: dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:127a-28: de'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar rtogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:127a-29: yang na chos bdag med pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed pa'i gdul bya rnams te de'i don to //
T02TD2512.2E:127a-30: kun mchog cho ga rgyas pa ni //
T02TD2512.2E:127a-31: zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i rgyun te thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i cho ga rgyas pa de bka' stsol cig ces gsol ba btab bo //
T02TD2512.2E:127b-0: gal te las kyi 'ching ba lhod pas 'gro @127b ba'i tshogs rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur la /
T02TD2512.2E:127b-1: 'ching ba dam po ni tshul gcig pa nyid du 'gyur pa de bas na shin tu chags pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa gang gis sems can de rnams shin tu chags pa rnam par dag pa thob par byed pas bsam pa shin tu brtan pa'i las kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i go 'phang rtogs pa nyid du gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:127b-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag ston par byed pa'i tshig ste /
T02TD2512.2E:127b-3: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs nyid la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos bka' stsal ba yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:127b-4: dngos grub thams cad stsol pa ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub thams cad stsol pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:127b-5: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dang po'i rtog pa thams cad ces bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid ni bde ba chen po ste /
T02TD2512.2E:127b-6: de'i rdo rje gsang ba yin pas na bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:127b-8: bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa'i thog ma nyid du gnas pas na bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba dang po ste /
T02TD2512.2E:127b-9: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.2E:127b-10: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes las byung bas na mchog dam pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:127b-11: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:127b-12: dngos grub thams cad stsol pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
T02TD2512.2E:127b-13: rtog pa kun gyi bde ba che /
T02TD2512.2E:127b-14: rdo rje gsang bas bka' stsal to //
T02TD2512.2E:127b-16: yi ge h'um gi rang bzhin can gyi rtog pa thams cad gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.2E:127b-17: rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du dpa' bo zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:127b-18: gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi don bskyed par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:127b-19: stsol bzhin pa'i tshul gyis 'jigs pa med par rtag tu bzhugs pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:127b-20: yi ge h'um gi snying po 'di ni dpa' po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:127b-21: de lta bu'i snying po dpa' bo de'i rtog pa 'di yang ji lta bu gzhan yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:127b-22: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa cho ga zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:128a-0: cho ga chen po de nyid rnam par dbye ba ni sna @128a * //
T02TD2512.2E:128a-1: tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:128a-2: dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pas na sna tshogs so //
T02TD2512.2E:128a-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyor ba ni rgyud phyi ma ste /
T02TD2512.2E:128a-4: de dang lhan cig gnas pas na phyi ma'i rgyud dang bcas pa zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:128a-5: dngos grub thams cad rab grub byed //
T02TD2512.2E:128a-7: sems can rnams kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad bskyed cing /
T02TD2512.2E:128a-9: dngos grub thams cad rab grub byed /
T02TD2512.2E:128a-12: rdo rje 'chang ba'i snying po'i rtog pa gsung bar mdzad ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:128a-13: 'jig rten thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2512.2E:128a-18: de'i khams chen po ni snod kyi 'jig rten te /
T02TD2512.2E:128a-19: phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:128a-20: sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i zhing khams so //
T02TD2512.2E:128a-21: de'i rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de dang mnyam pa'i sems can rnams zhes bya ba yi ge h'um gi rang bzhin nam mkha' dang mnyam pas rgya che ba /
T02TD2512.2E:128a-22: sangs rgyas nyid du grub pa la sogs pas bde ba dam pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes te /
T02TD2512.2E:128a-23: bde ba yang yin la dam pa yang yin pas na dam pa nyid bde ba dam pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:128a-24: sangs rgyas pa'i bde ba chen po thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:128a-25: de'i ngo bor gyur pas ni bde ba dam pa nyid do //
T02TD2512.2E:128a-26: gyur pa ni thob pa'o zhes nges par byas pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:128a-27: 'di skad ston pa yin te snying po 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sems can rnams sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi skal pa bzang po la sogs pa'i dang por gyur pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:128a-28: de bas na snying po 'di ni dngos grub kyi dam pa bskyed pa yin no zhes nges bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.2E:128a-29: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas rtog pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:128a-30: 'jig rten thams cad sangs rgyas nyid grub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.2E:128b-0: bde ba chen po rab @128b grub phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:128b-1: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:128b-2: bde ba dam pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:128b-3: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:128b-4: de nas bsdu ba sngon du 'gro ba ni gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:128b-5: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang /
T02TD2512.2E:128b-6: bsgom pa bya'o zhes don bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.2E:128b-7: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:128b-8: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.2E:128b-9: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:128b-10: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa'i thog mar sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas nyid du grub pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa gsungs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.2E:128b-11: bde bar gshegs pa de rnams zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.2E:128b-12: dang po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par stsol //
T02TD2512.2E:128b-13: zhes bya ba ni dang po ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ni dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub stsol pas na dngos grub ste /
T02TD2512.2E:128b-14: dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub stsol pa la de bzhin gshegs pas gsol ba btab pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:128b-15: ci chags pa dang bral pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi phyir chags pa med par bstan par bya ba'am zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:128b-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni chags pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:128b-18: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'dir 'dul zhing rab tu 'jog pas na de'i gdul bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:128b-19: ci chags pa dang bral bas 'dul ba gang yin pa de la chags pa dang bral bas 'dul zhing don du gnyer ba de'i ched du chags pa med par so sor thar pa'i sngom pa bstan par bya pa'i phyir ;
T02TD2512.2E:128b-20: sprul pa'i sku des 'dul ba rnams kyi phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:128b-21: bslab pa dang bcas par bya ba'am zhes pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:128b-22: mdo sde'i tshul bstan par bya ba'am zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:128b-23: 'dod chags thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.2E:129a-0: 'dod chags kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin @129a * //
T02TD2512.2E:129a-1: pas na 'dod chags thams cad de rigs lnga'i lha rnams bsgom pas 'dul ba rnams so //
T02TD2512.2E:129a-2: de'i rnam par dag pa ni gzung ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:129a-3: 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dang bral ba nyid kyis rigs lngar rtogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:129a-4: de'i don du rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs shig ces ;
T02TD2512.2E:129a-5: de bzhin gshegs pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi thugs kyi bya ba gsol ba btab pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:129a-6: de la nyid kyi thugs kyi bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:129a-7: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:129a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor brtag par mdzad do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.2E:129a-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi rjes thogs nyid la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas rdo rje'i glu gsungs so zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:129a-10: rdo rje'i glu len cing dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2512.2E:129a-11: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor brtag par mdzad pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:129a-12: yongs su brtag par mdzad pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:129a-13: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:129a-14: da ni rdo rje glu ste /
T02TD2512.2E:129a-15: rjes su chags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:129a-16: rjes su chags pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na rjes su chags pa thams cad de /
T02TD2512.2E:129a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sngags bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:129a-18: des bskyed pa'i bde ba ni rjes su chags pa thams cad kyis bskyed pa'i bde ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:129a-19: des yid mchog tu bde bar gyur pa ni rjes su chags pa thams cad kyi bde ba dam pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:129a-20: de rnams 'byung ba'i rgyu ni khyed gnyis yin pas na bskyed pa'i rgyu'o //
T02TD2512.2E:129a-22: rab dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2512.2E:129a-23: gang gi phyir khyed ni rab tu dga' ba yin zhing 'gro ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:129a-24: sems can rnams kyi bde ba chen po brtan zhing mtho bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po ste /
T02TD2512.2E:129a-25: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi brtan pa ni rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:129a-26: de mdzad pas na brtan zhing mthe bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:129b-0: bdag kyang der mdzod ces bya ba ni ji ltar khyed ni de rnams kyi brtan @129b zhing mthong bar mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag kyang brtan zhing mtho bar mdzad pa de bzhin du mdzod cig pa'o /
T02TD2512.2E:129b-1: rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la rings shing myur bar grub pa nyid du phyogs shing mngon du gyur par mdzod cig ces pa te /
T02TD2512.2E:129b-2: slob dpon de lta bu'i glu len zhing rtag pas rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:129b-3: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2512.2E:129b-4: dang po'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:129b-6: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyibs ltar /
T02TD2512.2E:129b-7: dkyil 'khor 'di thams cad bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:129b-8: phyag na rdo rje thams cad du //
T02TD2512.2E:129b-9: rdo rje lha mo la sogs tshogs //
T02TD2512.2E:129b-12: thams cad dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'dra ba las 'dir rdo rje yid las byung ba nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du thams cad bud med kyi cha lugs 'dzin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:129b-13: de ltar rdo rje'i glu len cing dkyil 'khor bris nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:129b-15: cho ga gzhan du zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:129b-16: ji ltar sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:129b-17: rang gi snying pos lha rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:129b-18: de la snying po ni 'di dag yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:129b-19: aa nu r'a ga ya ga mam h'um zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:129b-20: h'um badzra dri shti sa ma ki ma ta /
T02TD2512.2E:129b-21: h'um badzra k'i li k'i li h'um /
T02TD2512.2E:129b-22: h'um sma ra ta badzri ni bandha /
T02TD2512.2E:129b-23: h'um tu shya badzra ni h'um zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:129b-24: rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:129b-25: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:129b-26: rdo rje sbrang rtsi ma la sogs pa'i snying po ni dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:129b-27: rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i snying po rnams yin par shes bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:129b-28: de nas sgo dbye ba byas la mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:129b-29: de nas bum pa la sogs pas dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.2E:129b-30: dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshul du bdag nyid rgyan gyis brgyan la /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-0: sngon du spyod pa byas shing sems rtse @130a * //
T02TD2512.2E:130a-1: gcig pa thob pa'i rdo rje snyems ma'i lha mo'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs ma g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje dril bu thogs pa dang bcas pas snyems pa byas shing lag pa g-yon pa na dang po'i rdo rje thogs pa blangs la 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snyems ma mchog gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid 'jug par bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-2: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa bcings la lag pa g-yas pas ji skad du bshad pa'i gzungs ma blangs nas bzung ba'i tshul gyis badzra badzra zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-3: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i glu zlos shing de bzhin du /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-4: slob dpon bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:130a-5: zhugs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas skor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-6: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'dug la h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pas de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-7: gsang ba brjod la sngar bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:130a-8: de ltar sngar bshad pa'i cho ga rgyas par rdzogs par byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-9: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyis bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-10: dbang bskur la dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul bzhugs blangs nas mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod de /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-11: de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje bzung zhing chos kyi dril bu dkrol la /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-12: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs nas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-14: snying po dang phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bcom ldan 'das la blangs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-15: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-16: rang gi rdo rje ming nas brjod pa yang byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-17: dkyil 'khor rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:130a-19: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod par byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-20: snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas /
T02TD2512.2E:130a-21: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:130a-22: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-0: rdo rje slob dpon rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rjes su zhugs pa de @130b bzhin du de kho na nyid chen po 'byung bas rjes su bskul te //
T02TD2512.2E:130b-1: rang gi cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad pa la /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-2: srid pa'i bde ba rnam dag phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:130b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-4: bka' ma nos la phyir 'byung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:130b-5: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rdzogs so ;
T02TD2512.2E:130b-6: / slob ma gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-7: dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho ga nyid kyis //
T02TD2512.2E:130b-8: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gis slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:130b-9: de nas de bzhin du las kyi cho ga thams cad rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:130b-10: 'dir yang rang nyid 'jug pas dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-11: ji ltar dkyil 'khor du rang nyid 'jug pas /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-12: dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'gyur pa de bzhin du 'dir yang 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
T02TD2512.2E:130b-13: rdo rje slob dpon thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-14: dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:130b-15: phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-16: dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan ma thams cad kyi bdag po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:130b-17: dam tshig thams cad shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-18: dam tshig thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig thams cad de /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-19: de shes pas na dam tshig thams cad shes pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:130b-20: de yang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:130b-21: thams cad tshar gcod pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-22: phan 'dogs par nus pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-23: las kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi tshul gyis sems can thams cad la tshar gcod pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-25: ji ltar na de ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-26: dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-27: gang gi phyir dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi las skad cig gis byed pa nyid du /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad pa der dngos grub thams cad /
T02TD2512.2E:130b-29: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa des /
T02TD2512.2E:131a-0: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'byor pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes @131a * //
T02TD2512.2E:131a-1: te las gang gis byed pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:131a-2: sems can gyi don gyi bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:131a-3: sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa la sogs pa'i tshul de dag gi dngos grub thams cad ni ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'i las te /
T02TD2512.2E:131a-4: de byed pas na dngos grub thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi las byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:131a-5: skad cig nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:131a-6: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas dus gzhan du byin gyis brlabs par mdzad pa ma yin gyi /
T02TD2512.2E:131a-7: rigs lnga'i dngos grub kyi bya ba byed par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:131a-9: rang nyid 'jug pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:131a-10: 'jug pa tsam zhes smos pas ni dbang bskur ba dgar ba yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:131a-11: des ni shin tu yang byin gyis rlob par mdzad do zhes ston to //
T02TD2512.2E:131a-12: slob dpon ma yin pa yang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor 'dir ma zhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:131a-13: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni rgyu ci'i phyir slob dpon ma yin zhing dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa dag la yang bcom ldan 'das de ltar byin gyi rlob par mdzad ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:131a-14: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:131a-15: 'di ltar zhes bya ba rnam pa 'dis rang nyid dkyil 'khor du 'jug par byed pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:131a-16: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nges par rang gi dam tshig gis zhes pa dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i rang gi dam tshig gi cho ga 'dis rdo rje slob dpon du gyur nas so //
T02TD2512.2E:131a-17: slob dpon 'jug pa ni zhes bya ba ni zhugs nas dbab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad byed du 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:131a-18: snying po 'di yang byin gyis brlabs kyis zhes bya ba ni h'um gi mthus dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa la yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:131a-19: rdo rje slob dpon thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:131a-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du h'um zhes bya ba lan cig bzlas pas kyang 'grub pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:131a-21: mi sod pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje la sogs pas kyang bcom par mi nus pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:131a-22: mi tshugs pa zhes bya ba ni zil gyis mnan par mi nus pa'o /
T02TD2512.2E:131b-0: thams cad byed ces bya ba ni snga ma @131b bzhin no //
T02TD2512.2E:131b-1: nam mkha' la sogs pa las aa la sogs pa'i yi ge thams cad nas sna tshogs ston cing mngon par 'dod pa'i don gsal bar byed pa'i lus kyis thams cad mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:131b-3: da ltar byung ba'i mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po thams cad yi ges gsal bar byas nas mig gis mthong ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:131b-4: thos zhes bya ba ni rna bas so //
T02TD2512.2E:131b-5: rig ces bya ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas so //
T02TD2512.2E:131b-6: shes zhes bya ba ni bsam pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes pas nges par 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:131b-7: dngos po thams cad ces bya ba ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i tshul lo //
T02TD2512.2E:131b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:131b-9: rdo rje 'chang chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas par 'dus par mdzad nas gsol pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:131b-10: yongs su spyang ba'i don ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.2E:131b-11: ji ltar dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub pa ni dbang bskur bar byed pa ltar ni ma yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:131b-12: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de nyid bsgrub par gsol ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:131b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dag pa dang gdul bar bya ba'i phyir bgegs mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:131b-14: sdug bsngal skyed par mdzad pa de bzhin du gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du rang nyid zhugs pa /
T02TD2512.2E:131b-15: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa'i slob dpon la yang de ltar mdzad pa ma yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:131b-16: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.2E:131b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de la bgegs mi mdzad par ma zad kyi /
T02TD2512.2E:131b-18: bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje 'chang shin tu brtan pa'i sems rtse gcig pa mngon du 'gyur zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:131b-19: shin tu dgyes pa ni sgrub pa po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yang dag pa'i tshul gyis mngon du bya'o//
T02TD2512.2E:131b-20: rjes su chags pa ni sgrub pa po rang gi dngos grub rdzogs par mdzad pa la thugs rtse gcig pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:131b-21: shin tu rgyas pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis sgrub pa pos bdag nyid kyi ngor bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:131b-22: dngos grub thams cad ni ji skad bshad pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.2E:132a-1: cad dang ye shes thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.2E:132a-2: las thams cad ni ji skad du bshad pa rnams sgrub par mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:132a-3: ji ltar sgrub par mdzad ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:132a-4: gdon mi za bar grub pa zhes bya bas so //
T02TD2512.2E:132a-5: dus ring pos sam zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:132a-6: ma yin te myur du zhes bya bas so //
T02TD2512.2E:132a-7: 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rang nyid zhugs pa tsam gyis de lta bu la sogs pa'i dngos grub de la gsol bar mdzad pa de 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
T02TD2512.2E:132a-8: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor slob dpon gang gis dkyil 'khor bri ba'am /
T02TD2512.2E:132a-9: de'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'drir bcug gam gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa lan cig brjod pa'am /
T02TD2512.2E:132a-10: gzhung dang don gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa des bsgrubs na'ang zhes bya ba ni bsgrubs pa 'ba' zhig la gsol bar ma zad kyi 'on kyang ma bsgrubs pa la yang ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:132a-11: dkyil 'khor ma zhugs na yang zhes bya ba ni klog pa dang 'dzin pa'i nus pas dngos grub thams cad dang bcas pa'i mchog gi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:132a-12: dngos grub kyang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas dngos grub thams cad de /
T02TD2512.2E:132a-13: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:132a-14: de rnams dang bcas pa'i mchog gi dngos grub ni rdo rje 'chang ba chen po nyid la sogs pa thob pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:132a-15: skye ba 'di nyid la zhes bya ba ni skye ba gang la des gsang ba'i rtog pa 'di lan cig brjod pa'am /
T02TD2512.2E:132a-16: 'dzin pa'i skye ba de nyid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang bcas pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thob pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:132a-17: gzhung 'dis ni skye ba brgyud pas goms pa'i rnal 'byor gang lhan cig tu brjod pa'am /
T02TD2512.2E:132a-18: 'dzin pa de nyid skye ba 'di la mchog gi dngos grub sgrub par byed pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:132a-19: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bstan to //
T02TD2512.2E:132a-20: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:132a-21: rgyu gang gi phyir te dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pas gang zhig nyan pa dang 'dzin pa de /
T02TD2512.2E:132a-22: tshe 'di nyid du mchog gi dngos grub sgrub par byed pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:132a-23: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:132a-24: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:132b-0: gang gi phyir yi ge @132b h'um gi rtog pa 'dis gang zag khyad par can de la 'dod pa'i dngos grub rdzogs par byed pas /
T02TD2512.2E:132b-1: gdon mi za ba dang thogs pa med pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:132b-2: ci'i phyir gdon mi za ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:132b-3: thogs pa med pa yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:132b-4: bdag ces bya ba la gang gi phyir rdo rje 'chang bdag dang /
T02TD2512.2E:132b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang 'di la bar gcod byed par nus pa ma yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:132b-6: de nyid ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:132b-7: thams cad rjes su chags pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2512.2E:132b-8: thams cad kyang yin la rjes su chags pa yang de nyid yin pas na thams cad rjes su chags pa zhes bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:132b-9: sems rtse gcig pa'i rang bzhin gyis shin tu rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.2E:132b-10: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang rjes su chags pa las kyang byung ba yin no zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis rjes su chags pa des mnyam pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor rnams las 'byung bar 'gyur na /
T02TD2512.2E:132b-11: dngos grub gzhan yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:132b-12: 'on kyang 'byung ba yin zhes bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:132b-13: rjes su chags pa 'byung zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir 'dod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:132b-14: 'dod pa bstan pa ni sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa 'dod pa'i bsam pa bstan pas shin tu rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid can gyi rjes su chags pa de 'byung ba yin gyi gzhan du ma yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:132b-15: 'dod pa bstan pa de la ci dgos zhes rnam par rtog pa de bsal ba'i phyir de mi 'dod pas ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:132b-16: shin tu rnal 'byor gyi rang bzhin rjes su chags pa de mi 'dod na ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.2E:132b-17: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni yun ring pos zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.2E:132b-19: bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i go 'phang thams cad ces bya ba la /
T02TD2512.2E:132b-20: bde ba chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02TD2512.2E:133a-0: rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa gang la de nyid thog mar yod pa de nyid du bde ba chen po la sogs @133a * //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-2: thams cad kyang yin la go 'phang yang de nyid yin pas thams cad kyi go 'phang ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-3: bde ba chen po la sogs pa yang yin la thams cad kyi go 'phang yang yin pas na bde ba chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyi go 'phang ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-4: grub na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la shin tu rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i bsgom pas grub pa'i rnal 'byor la'o //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-5: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung bas te grub pa po kho na la'o //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-6: bde ba chen po ni thar pa chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-7: gsang ba chen po ni phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD2512.2E:133a-8: snying po 'di dag skad cig ma gcig gis ster bar byed pas na /
T02TD2512.2E:133a-10: rdo rje chags pa skad cig ma gcig la ster ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-12: sgrub pa'i dam tshig 'di yin te //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-13: zhes bya bas ni bsgrub par bya bas bsgrub pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:133a-14: bde ba chen po dang chags pa chen po ste /
T02TD2512.2E:133a-15: rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-16: bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ni sgrub pa'i dam tshig ste rgyu'o //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-17: de yang shin tu rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-19: zhes bya ba ni shin tu rnal 'byor gyi rang bzhin sgrub pa'i dam tshig 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul gang gis kyang 'da' bar mi spyod pas na 'da' bar dka' ba yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-20: sdig pa chen po byed pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-21: de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-22: zhes bya ba ni gang zhig dam pa'i chos spangs pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:133a-23: mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa chen po byed pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:133a-24: gang zhig dkyil 'khor la ma zhugs pa de rnams kyang shin tu rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid can gyis bsgrub pa'i dam tshig 'dis dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgrub pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-25: dngos grub gang gis 'grub ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:133a-26: mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ba ni rang gi phyi ma'i mtha' la ston pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-27: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:133a-28: mchog gi dngos grub kyis ji ltar 'grub ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:133a-29: lan cig bzlas pas sdig pa spyang bas zhes bya ba ni shin tu rnal 'byor 'dis /
T02TD2512.2E:133b-0: rdo rje @133b 'chang ba chen po lan cig bzlas pas rnal 'byor pa la dam pa'i chos spangs pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sdig pa spyang bar mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:133b-1: sdig pa spyang ba'i rgyu lan cig gi bzlas pas des mchog gi sgrub pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:133b-2: rtog pa gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'am de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa gzhan gyis rang rang gi brtag pa rnam pa gsum zhal bzhi dang /
T02TD2512.2E:133b-3: phyag brgyad pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i khyad par dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyis gang gsungs pa'i rtog pa rnams las gsungs pa de rang gi yid kyis 'dod pa'i gzugs brnyan rjes su dran pa'i sgom pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i khyad par bsgoms pa rnams kyis snying po yi ge h'um brjod pa'am /
T02TD2512.2E:133b-4: glegs bam zhes bya ba ni dpal mchog dang po'i glegs bam mdun du bzhag nas //
T02TD2512.2E:133b-5: der bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te bsgoms na de yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:133b-7: thams cad nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.2E:133b-8: bcom ldan 'das de nyid dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i rtog pa las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs yi ge h'um dang glegs bam gyi tshul du bzhugs pa rnams kyi de'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:133b-9: thams cad nyid kyi bdag po 'grub //
T02TD2512.2E:133b-11: gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sgrub pa po gang la gzugs brnyan nam //
T02TD2512.2E:133b-12: glegs bam med pa na de'i snying po yi ge h'um /
T02TD2512.2E:133b-13: ras sam rtsig pa la bris nas bsgrub pa ni sngon du bsnyen pa byas shing bzlas pa dang ;
T02TD2512.2E:133b-14: bsgom pa dag gis phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:133b-15: gang gis yi ge h'um bri zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:133b-16: bdag gis zhes bya ba ni bdag gis yi ge h'um bris nas /
T02TD2512.2E:133b-17: bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:133b-19: don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub can bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:133b-20: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la gal te /
T02TD2512.2E:133b-21: slob dpon gang zhig gsang ba'i rtog pa 'di dang /
T02TD2512.2E:134a-0: dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa'i rtog pa rnams sgrub par @134a * //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-2: de'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la thig gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:134a-3: ji lta ba bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams bris nas /
T02TD2512.2E:134a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-5: de sgo dbye ba byas pa la bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.2E:134a-6: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dang po'i rdo rje bcings nas rang nyid 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-7: zhugs nas chags pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-8: chags pa chen po ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i chags pa chen po de las thogs pa chen po ste rnal 'byor thams cad skye bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.2E:134a-9: thams cad bdag nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:134a-10: rnal 'byor sgrub pa po rnams la skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-11: dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-12: chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-13: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-15: zhes 'og nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-16: theg pa che las bde ba che //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-17: zhes bya ba ni tham cad kyi rnal 'byor de las bde ba chen po ste bde ba chen po mngon du'o //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-18: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin can gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba mngon du byas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-19: bde ba che las rdo rje brtan //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-20: zhes bya ba gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo de las stong ba nyid bcu drug gi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo mi phyed pa dang po'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa byung ba yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-21: rdo rje las ni phyag rgya 'byung //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-22: zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje de las mda' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-23: dang po'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams ci'i phyir phyag rgya zhes brjod snyam du rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:134a-24: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.2E:134a-25: de rnams kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor ba ni de'i rang bzhin la lhag par mos pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:134b-0: gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor ba @134b des phyag rgya thams cad de phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:134b-1: sgrub pa po la sogs pa'i rgyud la rgyas 'debs pas na phyag rgya zhes rab tu grags pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:134b-2: dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba zhes bya ba ni 'da' bar dka' ba'i don ni dam tshig ces bya bar brjod pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:134b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang 'da' bar dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD2512.2E:134b-5: phyag rgya'i dam tshig rab gsungs te //
T02TD2512.2E:134b-6: yid kyis gzugs ni brtan phyir ro //
T02TD2512.2E:134b-8: ci'i phyir phyag rgya'i dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:134b-9: phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni /
T02TD2512.2E:134b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sku gsung thugs kyi rdo re ston cing mngon par 'dren pa'i rang bzhin gyis phyag rgya rnams bcings pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2512.2E:134b-11: rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa yang bsdus pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:134b-12: nyams pas 'jigs pa zhes bya ba ni dam tshig nyams pas 'jigs pas de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:134b-13: phyag rgya'i rag bzhin gyi dam tshig rnams kyis ji ltar 'da' bar mi mdzad ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:134b-14: dper na 'khor los sgyur b'a rgyal po'i bka' la phyag rgya'i rgyas btab pa de'i yul na gnas pa rnams kyis /
T02TD2512.2E:134b-15: 'da' bar mi nus pa de bzhin du phyag rgya rnams skye bo thams cad kyis kyang 'da' bar nus pa ma yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:134b-16: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyams pas 'jigs pas grub pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:134b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pas kyang gzhung lugs nyams pa'i 'jigs pas grub na /
T02TD2512.2E:134b-18: de'i phyir phyag rgya'i dam tshig 'dis ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:134b-19: sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la ji ltar bshad pa'i rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'chang nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i rnam pas bskal pa bya ba rnams kyis kyang de ltar thob pa ma yin na /
T02TD2512.2E:134b-20: ji ltar tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchog bsdus pa yod na thog par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:134b-22: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gis 'jig rten gdul bar bya ba de ni 'dul ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:135a-1: sems dpa' la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:135a-2: rnam pa gang gis ji ltar 'dul bar yod pa de ni ji ltar 'dul ba can gyi 'jig rten no //
T02TD2512.2E:135a-3: de bzhin dngos grub gsungs pa yin //
T02TD2512.2E:135a-5: de lta bu'i dngos grub 'jig rten de la gsungs ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:135a-6: de bas na de de'i thob par bya ba'i phyir thabs gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:135a-7: de yi thabs ni phyag rgya yin //
T02TD2512.2E:135a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dngos grub de la ji ltar 'dul ba dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa thob pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya kha na thabs yin no ;
T02TD2512.2E:135a-9: / thabs de'i las ji lta bur ldan pa yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:135a-10: dngos grub thams cad byed pa mchog //
T02TD2512.2E:135a-11: ces bya ba la mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:135a-12: de nas cho ga rgyas pa ni de yin no zhes bya ba ni de lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i rim pas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'dir slob dpon gyis 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:135a-13: zhugs nas chags la sogs pa che //
T02TD2512.2E:135a-14: zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2512.2E:135a-15: dngos grub thams cad byed pa mchog / ces bya ba'i bar du brjod la /
T02TD2512.2E:135a-16: rang gi cho ga thams cad rjes su brjod nas /
T02TD2512.2E:135a-17: slob ma gzhug par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:135a-18: gnang ba thob nas slob ma gzhug par bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:135a-19: 'di ni de nas de bzhin du cho ga rgyas pa'o zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:135a-20: dngos grub thams cad shin tu gdon mi za'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du slob dpon dang /
T02TD2512.2E:135a-22: dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba de bzhin du phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du yang shin du gdon mi za bar 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.2E:135a-23: slar yang 'di'i don bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:135a-24: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po sgrub pa'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor chen po rab tu bsgrubs la /
T02TD2512.2E:135a-25: rang gi snying gar rdo rje 'khor los gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor sprul la /
T02TD2512.2E:135a-26: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2512.2E:135a-27: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du rang rang gi snying po rnams kyis rang rang gi gnas su gzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:135a-28: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba brjod la /
T02TD2512.2E:135b-0: dpal rdo @135b rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-1: de nas aom sva bha ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes bya bas rang bzhin gyis dag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-2: de nas bdag med par mnyam pa nyid kyis aom sarba sa mo & ham zhes bya bas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bdag nyid bsgom mo //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-3: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin bdag rang yin no zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:135b-5: lha thams cad snying ga na gnas pa'i dang po'i rdo rje'i nang du /
T02TD2512.2E:135b-6: aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes bya ba bsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:135b-7: rab tu dga' ba'i ngag gam /
T02TD2512.2E:135b-9: yid kyis brjod cing bzlas pa'i don du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-10: nyin re bzhin du lan cig byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:135b-11: ji srid mngon sum du byas pa de bzhin du zla ba gcig gam /
T02TD2512.2E:135b-13: lo gcig gis dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-14: de nas nyin re'am zla ba re re la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-15: de la re zhig dang po ji ltar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi'i dbus su bdag bsrung ba dang gnas bsrung ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:135b-16: rnal 'byor chen po rdzogs pa'i bar gyi cho ga rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-17: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la snying po dang bcas pa'i yi ge h'um brjod pa la brtson pas /
T02TD2512.2E:135b-18: yi ge ta las mig g-yon zla bar bya //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-19: g-yas pa yi ge ma las nyi mar dgod //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-20: h'um gis mig 'bras bskal pa'i mer byas te //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-21: tshul 'di nyid kyis rdo rje'i blta ba byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:135b-22: rlung gi dkyil 'khor las byung ba'i //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-23: rno zhing 'bar bas khyab par byed //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-24: dbus su yi ge bkod pa yi //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-25: rdo rje brtul zhugs can gyis bsam //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-26: rdo rje me yis thal bar byas pa'i rgya mtsho dang//
T02TD2512.2E:135b-27: sa 'dzin dang bcas sa nyid kyang ni de bzhin du //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-28: nam mkha'i khams su yi ge kham ni rnam bsgoms la //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-29: rnam par snang mdzad chu rgyun 'bebs pa bsam par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-30: dba' rlabs phreng ba kun du 'khrug par gyur pa yi //
T02TD2512.2E:135b-31: dpag tu med pa'i chu yi phung po de bzhin 'byung //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-1: ge ra yis chu yi rgya mtsho mched //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-2: padma gyur pa yongs su brtag par bya ba yin //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-3: gser gyi rus sbal snang ba zhes rab grags pa ni //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-4: chu skyes kyi ni rtsa bar bsam par bya ba yin //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-5: 'dzam bu gser dang mtshungs pa'i lte ba ru //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-6: rnam pa nyid ni de nyid du yang bsam par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-7: de nas kham gi ngo bo rnam snang mdzad dang bcas //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-8: byon nas lte ba la ni bzhugs par gyur pa yin //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-9: de nas gcig tu gyur pa nyid las ri rab ni //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-10: rin chen bzhi yi cha shas las ni gyur pa yin //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-11: h'um sum h'um zhes bya ba'i ri rab skyed par byed pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnams brjod cing bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-12: de nas rdo rje bcings pas sa la de bzhin du reg cing rdo rje'i ri rab byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:136a-13: de'i steng du rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas khang bskyed la yi ge hr'i las lha thams cad kyi gnas rnams su sna tshogs padma rnams bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.2E:136a-14: dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
T02TD2512.2E:136a-15: bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-16: de nas de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:136a-19: las kyis rgyal po mchog bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-20: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings la de bzhin du yi ge brjod cing bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-21: de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir snga ma bzhin du de bzhin du sangs rgyas gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-22: de nas langs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:136a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' gang bar bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:136a-24: thams cad bdag nyid yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:136a-25: de nas dang po'i rdo rje aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um badzra tishtha gu hya mandala au tha pa ya zhes brjod cing nam mkha' la dkyil 'khor bteg cing de nyid du bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:136b-0: dang po'i rdo rje de nyid kyis lan cig bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas slar yang @136b phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:136b-1: badzra dri shta mata ces bya ba mig gnyis la rnam par bkod do //
T02TD2512.2E:136b-2: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs //
T02TD2512.2E:136b-3: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02TD2512.2E:136b-4: yi ge h'um ni brjod pa yis //
T02TD2512.2E:136b-5: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
T02TD2512.2E:136b-6: de nas snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2512.2E:136b-7: mal nas langs te ji lta ba bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:136b-8: nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su dkyil 'khor de bzhin du nam mkha'i phyogs su gzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:136b-9: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram ma ti kra ma h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:136b-10: rdo rje'i glu len cing snga ma bzhin du thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:136b-11: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bris te /
T02TD2512.2E:136b-12: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i dbus su sna tshogs padma'i steng du lugs ma la sogs pa rang bzhin //
T02TD2512.2E:136b-14: zla ba dang mtshungs zhal bzhad pa //
T02TD2512.2E:136b-15: sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs kyis mdzes ;
T02TD2512.2E:136b-16: / kha dog rnams kyis dbu la byugs //
T02TD2512.2E:136b-17: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
T02TD2512.2E:136b-18: rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog / g-yon na rdo rje khu tshur gyis snyems pas dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02TD2512.2E:136b-19: g-yas pa bstod pa'i tshul gyis rang gi thugs kar dang po'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' //
T02TD2512.2E:136b-21: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um brjod cing dgong par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:136b-22: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun du rdo rje yid las byung ba'i gnas su rdo rje mtshon cha ma la rdo rje yid las byung ba dang 'dra bas na /
T02TD2512.2E:136b-23: ji srid rdo rje dril bu'i gnas su rdo rje dril bu ma rdo rje dril bud dang bcas pa 'dra ba'i bar du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:136b-24: 'di rnams kyi snying po ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.2E:136b-25: de nas de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnams phye la /
T02TD2512.2E:136b-26: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyis bsdu ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:136b-27: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod par bya'o//
T02TD2512.2E:136b-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po bcings la g-yas pa'i sdigs mdzub kyi lcags kyus bcom ldan 'das 'khor dbang bcas pa rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i spyan drang ba'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137a-1: du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro bas sdom ba blangs la /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-2: aom sarba yo ga tsittam autp'a da y'a mi zhes bya bas /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-3: byang chub chen por sems bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-4: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi dang po'i rdo rje blangs te /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-5: rang gi snying gar bzhag la sur te sa ma ya stvam ho badzra siddhi ya th'a su kham zhes bya ba brjod cing yi ge h'um las rdo rje bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137a-6: de nas phyi'i sgo la mngon par phyogs nas gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid la dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-7: rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid ji snyed pa'i dris lus la byugs te /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-8: rgyan dang bcas shing me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-9: gos dmar po zung gcig bgos pa /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-10: kha dri zhi ma pos bgos pa /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-11: gos dmar pos gdong g-yogs bcings nas /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i yid 'ong ma'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i gzugs ma lag pa g-yon pas rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-13: g-yas pas rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-14: rkang pa ya gcig mdun du 'dor ba phyag g-yas pas me skor gyi tshul gyis blangs la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-16: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-17: 'dod chags la sogs pa de kun yid khyod ni //
T02TD2512.2E:137a-18: kun bsdus bdag la bde ba stsol mdzod cig / rdo rje sems dgongs myur du bdag bstan mdzod //
T02TD2512.2E:137a-19: bdag dgyes mdzad dang bde mchog grub la 'dud //
T02TD2512.2E:137a-20: ces bya ba'i drug ldan la sogs pa'i glu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis gsang ba'i glu brjod la /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-21: dang por shar gyi sgo nas 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137a-22: rdo rje lcags kyu ma yang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137a-23: slar yang lho'i sgo nas 'jug ste rdo rje zhags pa ma'i snying po brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137a-24: de nas de bzhin du nub kyi sgo nas zhugs te /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-25: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i snying po brjod par bya'o//
T02TD2512.2E:137a-26: de nas de bzhin du byang gi sgo nas zhugs te /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-27: rdo rje dril bu ma'i snying po brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137a-28: slar yang shar gyi sgo nas snga ma bzhin du zhugs te /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-29: sgeg mo dga' ba'i rdo rje mas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:137a-30: dkyil 'khor la lan gsum bskor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-0: @137b ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-1: h'um ma h'a su kha badzra satva dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2512.2E:137b-3: aa nu rakto me bha ba su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-5: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-7: aa n'a dhi ni dha nas tv'a ma h'a su kha badzra gu hya sa ma ya: sidhimme pra ya tstsha /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-9: de nas rdo rje lha mo bzhi po 'di rnams kyis bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-10: h'um badzra drishta sa ya ke phat /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-11: h'um badzra k'i li k'i li h'um /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-13: h'um ru shya badzra n'i h'um /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-14: slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-15: de kho na nyid 'di lan cig brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-16: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-17: rdo rje chen po nor che ba /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-18: ye shes chen po las che ba //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' deng bdag grub //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-21: pra siddha mam zhes bya ba yang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-22: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-23: yi ge aa yis bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-24: slar yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-25: thams cad kyis rdo rje ma bral zhing bdag nyid la 'dis dbab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-26: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um aa su /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-27: de nas ma h'a su kha badzra satva pra ti grihan sa ma ya stvam zhes bya ba 'dis me tog rnams dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-28: de nas de rnams blangs te /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-29: de ring khyod la rdor 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-30: dngos grub kun phyir dbang bskur mdzod //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-31: 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug nyid //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-32: sems can kun la bde ba ster //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-33: zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi spyi bo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-34: aom ma h'a su kha badzra satva aa bhi shinytsa su ra ta stvam /
T02TD2512.2E:137b-35: zhes bya ba yang brjod do //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-36: de nas aom badzra tsakshu ka ma mas ya sarba su ra stvam zhes bya ba 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-37: de nas he badzra p'a shya zhes bya ba brjod cing shar gyis sgo nas dkyil 'khor la blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-38: de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-39: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor bas shis ba brjod pa sbyin pa'i mngon par 'dren pas snying ga'i phyogs su 'dzin cing mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:137b-40: de nas rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi pos bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.2E:138a-0: glu dang rol mo'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das kyi @138a * //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-1: mdun du gzungs ma dang bcas pas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:138a-2: sgeg mo dga' ba'i rdo rje mas slar yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag rgyas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:138a-3: ae yam su ra te ra ham su ra tam me bha ga b'an ;
T02TD2512.2E:138a-4: / sarba su kha bha mantha autta ma siddhim me pra ya tstsha /
T02TD2512.2E:138a-5: aa ni nas tyi na aom ma h'a su kha badzra stva dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2512.2E:138a-10: myur du thams cad rjes chags pa //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-11: ko li ki las thams cad nus //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-12: thams cad rjes su chags dran pas //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-13: rtag tu yang ni legs dgyes 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-14: aom ma h'a su kha siddha badzra stva siddhya dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2512.2E:138a-15: siddha sa ma ya stvam siddhi h'um /
T02TD2512.2E:138a-16: de nas ji srid mtshan ma thob kyi bar du phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur ba thams cad kyis de la dbang bskur ba mdzad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-18: de nas skad cig ma de nyid du rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-19: gzungs ma de yang rdo rje snyems ma dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-20: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dbang bskur bar mi mdzad na de'i tshe //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-21: rang nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas dbang bskur ba thams cad blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-22: de nas rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dngos grub blangs te /
T02TD2512.2E:138a-23: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-24: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-25: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-26: byin gyis brlabs nas rjes chags bya //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-27: h'um zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:138a-28: slar yang dril bu dkrol la /
T02TD2512.2E:138a-29: dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:138a-30: mchod pa lnga dang rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid mchod par bya'o//
T02TD2512.2E:138a-31: de nas tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:138a-32: snying po dang phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.2E:138a-33: lung bstan pa 'byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas blangs te mchod pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par mchod nas dbyung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-0: de nas slob @138b ma gzhug par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:138b-2: de'i tshe rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gzungs ma med par slob dpon gyis 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-3: zhugs nas cho ga thams cad rdzogs par byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:138b-4: rjes su gnang ba nod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:138b-5: srid pa'i bde ba rnam dag phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-6: sngar gyi srid pa la khyod dga' //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-7: 'dod pa kun gyi dngos grub che //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-8: 'gro ba kun la bsgrub par gyis //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-9: de ltar rjes su gnang ba mnos la slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-10: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.2E:138b-13: // / de la bslab pa ni gnas lang yongs su 'dzin pa'am /
T02TD2512.2E:138b-15: dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i slob mas sngar bshad pa'i chogs rig pa'i sdom pa gzung bar bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-16: de nas sarba yo ga tsittam autpa da y'a mi zhes bya bas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa slob dpon gyis byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-17: de nas de'i snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:138b-18: mchod pa lnga yis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-19: de nas de la 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:138b-20: deng khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa yin gyis /
T02TD2512.2E:138b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa la khyod kyis smra bar mi bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:138b-22: dad pa med pa rnams la brjod par mi bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-23: de nas mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings nas 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:138b-24: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsgrubs pa'i //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-25: khyod kyi dam tshig gsang ba 'di //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-26: gal te dkyil 'khor med la smras //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-27: khyod kyi rigs kun brlag par 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-28: aom ma h'a su kha ha na sa ma ya aa ti kra me na nam su ra ta stvam /
T02TD2512.2E:138b-29: de nas yon gyi mchog blangs la shar gyi sgo la mngon bar phyogs pa'i phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.2E:138b-30: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du 'jug la /
T02TD2512.2E:138b-31: rang nyid 'jug pa'i sbyor bas slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:138b-32: de nas rna bar 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:139a-2: chags bral nyid kyis dag par 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-3: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' sbas pa yin //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-5: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-6: sdug bsngal gzhan ni rang bzhin med //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-7: de bas sems can chags bral la //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-8: slar yang yid ni ma byed cig / de nas 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:139a-9: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis /
T02TD2512.2E:139a-10: de bas na ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i rdo rje'i ye shes skyed par gyur na dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02TD2512.2E:139a-11: khyod kyis kyang dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba la brjod par mi bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-12: de lta ma yin na khyod la dam tshig gis gnod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-13: de nas rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid kyis sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya 'og dang steng du kha lta ba bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:139a-14: rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:139a-15: 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-16: khyod kyis su la smras na ni //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-17: khyod kyi spyi bo 'gems par byed //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-18: de nas phyag rgya de nyid kyis mna' bsgag par bya ba'i phyir//
T02TD2512.2E:139a-19: snying po chu la lan cig bzlas la /
T02TD2512.2E:139a-20: slob ma de 'thung du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-21: de la 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:139a-22: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-23: snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzod //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-24: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-25: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-27: de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:139a-28: de nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-29: ngas gang bsgo ba de gyis shig //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-30: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig / de ma yin na mi bde ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:139a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:139a-32: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par mdzod cig ces smros shig brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:139b-0: de nas myur du rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo rje ma bcings @139b te ;
T02TD2512.2E:139b-2: di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:139b-3: 'di de rdo rje'i dam tshig ste /
T02TD2512.2E:139b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod pas /
T02TD2512.2E:139b-5: rdo rje ye shes bla med pa //
T02TD2512.2E:139b-6: khyod la de ring dbab par mdzad //
T02TD2512.2E:139b-7: de nas badzra a'a be sha zhes bya ba 'dis lan brgya brjod par bya'o ;
T02TD2512.2E:139b-8: / slar yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma dral zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:139b-9: ao nu r'a ga ya mi h'um /
T02TD2512.2E:139b-10: aa aa aa aa: zhes bya ba lan brgya brjod na des par 'bab pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:139b-11: de nas sngags de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dod du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:139b-12: de nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba byin nas /
T02TD2512.2E:139b-14: de nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:139b-15: de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya slob ma'i snying gar de bzhin du dgrol du bcug la /
T02TD2512.2E:139b-16: sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing //
T02TD2512.2E:139b-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid chen po snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:139b-18: de nas de bzhin du dbang bskur ba thams cad kyis slob ma la dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.2E:139b-19: rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dngos grub byin la /
T02TD2512.2E:139b-20: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
T02TD2512.2E:139b-21: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2512.2E:139b-22: zhes bya ba de la sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:139b-23: de nas dam tshig phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2512.2E:139b-24: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02TD2512.2E:139b-25: zhes bya ba slob tu gzhug go //
