T02TD2512.2E:227a-12: de don du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i bya ba'i rgyud de de ston par byed pa'i rgyud rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.2E:227a-14: // / de ltar slob dpon las kyi cho ga gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:227a-15: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:227a-16: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'i don ston pa'i tshig yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:227a-17: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems par byin gyis brlabs pa'i slob ma ni rdo rje slob ma ste /
T02TD2512.2E:227a-18: de rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i bya ba'i rgyun te /
T02TD2512.2E:227a-19: de ston par byed pa'i rgud rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems pas gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:227a-20: rdo rje mchod yon bskor bcings pas //
T02TD2512.2E:227a-21: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor chen po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:227a-22: ji lta ba bzhin du ldan pa'i phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis rdo rje mchod yon gyi phyag rgya rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su bskor la me tog gi phreng ba dang ldan par bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:227b-0: lhag par mos pa'i khyad par phul du byung bas bzhin gyi padma g-yos pa ni bsams pa bzhin g-yos @227b pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:227b-1: des bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos yang dag par phyag byas pa ni mgo bos yang dag par phyag byas pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-2: dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed yin //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-4: rnal 'byor ba'i dngos grub kun skyed par byed pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-5: rnal 'byor ba gnas gang du gnas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:227b-6: dkyil 'khor zhugs nas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:227b-7: nang gi dkyil 'khor bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-8: de ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:227b-9: bde ba chen po zhes brjod cing //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-11: ci zhig byed cing de skad ces brjod ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:227b-12: bskor ba lan gsum byed bzhin du //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-14: nang gi dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum du byed cing zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-15: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che//
T02TD2512.2E:227b-16: 'gro ba kun la grub par mdzod //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-17: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-18: 'khor lo bshad do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-19: de khyad par du byed pa ni gnas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:227b-23: 'jig rten pa'i gzhal yas khang thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pas na gnas so //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-24: dngos grub mtha' yas ni nam mkha' thams cad la rtag tu bzhugs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku dag gsung dang thugs rdo rje bskyed pa gang yin pa de'i mtha' ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis mthar thug par mi nus pa na mtha' med pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-25: bshad do zhes bya ba ni bshad mtha' gzhung des rab tu bstan pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-26: nam mkha' phyogs su ma lus pa ni phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'o //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-27: de la rab tu gnas shing gzhir bya ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-28: mnyam pa me dpa'i bde ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2512.2E:227b-29: de'i rdo rje dang po'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.2E:227b-30: rin po che dang padma dang /
T02TD2512.2E:227b-32: de rnams kyi gsang ba ni 'khor lo de ste /
T02TD2512.2E:228a-1: legs par sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.2E:228a-2: dang po zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.2E:228a-3: bde ba yang yin la mchog kyang yin pas na bde ba'i mchog yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:228a-4: dngos grub thams cad mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:228a-5: mchog kyang yin la dang po'i bde ba yang yin pas na mchog dang po'i skyes bu ste /
T02TD2512.2E:228a-8: yang 'di'i don brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:228a-10: bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa byas la bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir spos chab kyis bkang ba'i snod la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas la lha'i khang pa'i sgor bzhag la mchod yon dang /
T02TD2512.2E:228a-11: mchod pa rnam pa lngas ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par bzla'o //
T02TD2512.2E:228a-12: mchod chen thams cad dgug pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:228a-13: bdag la byin rlabs sogs grub pas //
T02TD2512.2E:228a-14: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing //
T02TD2512.2E:228a-15: dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:228a-16: lugs ma'am yang na brkos pa'am /
T02TD2512.2E:228a-17: byas pa'am ni bris pa yi //
T02TD2512.2E:228a-18: dang po'i 'khor lo bzhag nas ni //
T02TD2512.2E:228a-19: der ni lhar yang rab tu 'grub //
T02TD2512.2E:228a-20: yi ge h'um zlos shing dang po'i rdo rje phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:228a-21: aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes brjod nas sa la bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:228a-22: bcom ldan 'das yum gyi dkyil 'khor sprul la /
T02TD2512.2E:228a-23: de nyid rang gi snying gar bzhag na dkyil 'khor dar rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:228a-24: de nas gal te 'byor pa yod na me tog la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod la /
T02TD2512.2E:228a-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta pra na me na badzra bandha nam ka ro mi zhes bya ba dang phyogs thams cad nas yan lag lngas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:228a-26: phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro bas sngom pa bzung la /
T02TD2512.2E:228a-27: sdig pa dral ba'i bar gyi cho ga rnams rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:228a-28: de nas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa'i dang po'i rdo rje'i dbus su yi ge h'um mngon par yid kyis bris la /
T02TD2512.2E:228a-29: de nyid yid la zlos shing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:228a-30: de nas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:228b-0: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems yi ge h'um dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug gis bskor ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur ba @228b bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:228b-1: de'i steng du yang h'um ka nas kasha'i bar du gsal ba'i yi ge skar ma lta bu las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bsams /
T02TD2512.2E:228b-2: yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa h'um dang bcas pa las dang po'i rdo rje /
T02TD2512.2E:228b-3: rdo rje'i dbus su yang h'um bsams la badzra h'um zhes zlos shing rdo rje ni bdag go zhes rdo rje'i nga rgyal du bsgoms nas /
T02TD2512.2E:228b-4: rdo rje las rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa spros la /
T02TD2512.2E:228b-5: des sems can gyi khams thams cad rdo rje 'chang chen por rtogs par byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:228b-6: rdo rje 'chang chen por byas nas de rdo rje der yid kyis gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:228b-7: de nas rdo rje de badzra satva ham zhes zlos shing sems dpar byin gyis brlabs pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:228b-8: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje dril bu blangs la lag pa g-yas pas dang po'i rdo rje bsnyems pa dang bcas pas gsor la /
T02TD2512.2E:228b-9: yang badzra satva ham zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.2E:228b-10: de nas ma h'a sa ma ya satva ham zhes bya ba ni spyi'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:228b-11: de nas dang po'i rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du bcings la sa ma y'a ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:228b-12: de nyid kyi snying ga dang dbral ba dang lkog ma dang /
T02TD2512.2E:228b-13: spyi bor byin gyis brlabs la sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.2E:228b-14: de nas sems dpa'i skyil mo kung bcas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:228b-15: lus ni drang por gzhag byas la //
T02TD2512.2E:228b-16: rdo rje bsnyem ma 'chang byed cing ;
T02TD2512.2E:228b-17: / bsgyings dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor //
T02TD2512.2E:228b-18: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yis //
T02TD2512.2E:228b-19: rdo rje sems dpar rnag nyid 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:228b-20: zhes bya ba 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:228b-21: de ltar phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02TD2512.2E:228b-22: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshul tsam du yid kyis zhugs la /
T02TD2512.2E:228b-23: snga ma bzhin du dang po'i rdo rje der lha mo'i dkyil 'khor sprul la dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blang ba'i bar gyis rang gi 'jug pa'i cho ga byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:229a-1: 'khor de rang gi lus la them par bsams nas rang gi lus kyi lha thams cad kyi gnas su hr'i: las sna tshogs padma'i gdan bsams la gzhi'i lus la /
T02TD2512.2E:229a-2: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:229a-3: rang gi gnas su 'dug la mdun du nam mkha'i phyogs su h'um a'a zhes bya ba sna tshogs padma'i steng du dang po'i rdo rje kha dog dmar po bskyed la /
T02TD2512.2E:229a-4: de'i dbus su h'um bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:229a-5: h'um badzra ham zhes zlos shing rdo rje'i nga rgyal du bsgoms nas h'um badzra satva ham zhes brjod la rdo rje de rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:229a-6: de bzhin du rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la gzhi'i lus la rang gi gnas nas yid kyis badzra ghanta ho a'a zhes yid la zlos shing mdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs su sna tshogs padma'i steng du rdo rje dril bu bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:229a-7: rdo rje dril bu'i dbus su badzra ghanta ho /
T02TD2512.2E:229a-10: zhes zlos shing rdo rje dril bu'i nga rgyal du rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.2E:229a-11: badzra ghanta ho& ham zhes zlos shing dril bu ma'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:229a-12: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dad bcas pa dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:229a-16: de nas dang po'i rdo rje bcings la h'um dri shya zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:229a-17: de bzhin du rdo rje dril bu ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:229a-18: badzra ghanta ho: dri shya zhes bya bas rdo rje dril bu ma blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:229a-19: de nas gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:229a-20: h'um zlos shing bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi lus la gnas shing ji lta ba bzhin du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:229a-21: de nas dang po'i rdo rje bcings la sa ma ya stvam zhes zlos shing 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02TD2512.2E:229a-22: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam ho aam /
T02TD2512.2E:229a-24: aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes lan gsum zlos shing bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:229a-25: de bzhin du rdo rje dril bu ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-0: sa ma @229b ya stvam zhes zlos shing 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-2: sa ma ya stvam ham badzra ghante ho /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-3: zhes lan gsum zlos shing bcom ldan 'das ma bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:229b-4: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dang chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-6: zhes brjod de bsdu pa'i phyag rgya bcings la yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas rang gi lus dang 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i sku la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcug la /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-7: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:229b-8: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen pos de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rgyas btab la /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-9: dang po'i rdo rje bcings nas badzra satva aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya bas rang gi snying gar rdo rje bsam mo //
T02TD2512.2E:229b-10: de nyid kyi dbral ba'i gnas su badzra ratna /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-11: aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes rin po che /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-12: de nyid kyi lkog ma'i phyogs su badzra dharma aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes padma /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-13: de nyid kyi spyi bor badzra karmma aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya bas sna tshogs rdo rje bsams mo //
T02TD2512.2E:229b-14: de nas yi ge brgya bas brtan par byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-15: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-16: de bzhin du yi ge gnyis kyi go chas bdag nyid bgo bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:229b-17: de nas rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-18: bdag po'i dbang bskur ba blangs la /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-19: ming gi dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:229b-20: de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blangs la /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-21: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid mchod la mchod pa de rnams rang gi gnas su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:229b-22: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings la de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje gzung zhing chos kyi dril bu dkrol la /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-23: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:229b-24: h'um zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:229b-25: de nas dril bu dkrol zhing dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:230a-0: de nas dang po'i rdo rje nam mkha'i phyogs su ji skad du @230a * //
T02TD2512.2E:230a-1: bshad pa la dang po'i gzhal yas khang bskyed la lha thams cad kyi gnas su hr'i: las sna tshogs padma'i gdan bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:230a-3: de nas gzhal yas khang nyams dga' //
T02TD2512.2E:230a-4: nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas //
T02TD2512.2E:230a-5: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te dang po'i sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:230a-6: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang /
T02TD2512.2E:230a-7: las kyi rgyal po mchog bsgoms nas /
T02TD2512.2E:230a-8: sgo phye ba la yang bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:230a-9: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2512.2E:230a-10: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02TD2512.2E:230a-11: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di //
T02TD2512.2E:230a-12: lan cig rab tu brjod par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:230a-13: de nas gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma dang //
T02TD2512.2E:230a-14: spyan drang ba'i sngags kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcug la rdo rje gnod sbyin la sogs pas bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:230a-15: rdo rje khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnams bcad de /
T02TD2512.2E:230a-16: rdo rje bsrung bas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs la /
T02TD2512.2E:230a-17: h'um zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2512.2E:230a-18: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:230a-21: phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab la /
T02TD2512.2E:230a-22: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur nas mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2512.2E:230a-23: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:230a-24: de nas rnam par dag pa'i sgeg pa'i rdo rje mas phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:230a-25: phyag bzhi byas nas yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:230a-27: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02TD2512.2E:230a-29: zhes bya ba'i snying po zlos shing don rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.2E:230a-30: bdag ni rang nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:230a-32: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug che nyid dbang phyug che //
T02TD2512.2E:230b-0: 'dod chags chen po @230b bde ba che //
T02TD2512.2E:230b-1: rdo rje sems dpar bdag gyur cig / ces brjod la rang gi snying gar rdo rje'i dbus su yi ge h'um yid kyis bris te /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-3: rab tu dga' ba'i tshig zlos shing lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:230b-4: de ltar dang po byin gyis brlabs pa lan cig byas nas gang gi tshe mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sbyor bas gnas par 'dod pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-5: badzra sa tva h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su rdo rje sems dpa' yid kyis bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-6: de ltar dang po'i rdo rjer bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la gnas te /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-7: bya ba thams cad byas nas yang zhugs te h'um zlos shing gsad ba'i lcags kyu mas bcom ldan 'das rang gi lus la bcug la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-8: mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis mchod nas phyag kyang byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-9: de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:230b-10: sgom pas dub bar gyur na yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-11: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa yang byas nas yang rnam par dag pa'i sgeg pa'i dga' ba'i rdo rje dang phyag rgya bzhis phyag byas la bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2512.2E:230b-12: de ltar nyin re zhing zla ba gcig gam /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-13: drug gam lo gcig gi bar du nyin re dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:230b-14: de nas nyin re'am zla ba re'am /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-15: lo re zhing dkyil 'khor bir bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:230b-16: de la dang por sa spyang ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-17: sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-18: dang pos rdo rjes de bzhin du dkyil 'khor sprul la /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-19: phyag bya ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-20: sngom [*sdom?] ba bzung la rnal 'byor chen po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-21: gzhal yas khang dang gdan rnams bskyed nas /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-22: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sems dpa'i skyil la mo krung du 'dug la /
T02TD2512.2E:230b-23: deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02TD2512.2E:231a-0: ces bya ba la sogs pas bdag nyid spro ba @231a * //
T02TD2512.2E:231a-2: de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la spos snod lag na thogs te /
T02TD2512.2E:231a-3: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
T02TD2512.2E:231a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:231a-5: de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:231a-6: dang po'i sbyor ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum rnam par bsgoms shing snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.2E:231a-7: h'um zhes zlos shing phyag rgya chen po bcings la dkyil 'khor chen po bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:231a-8: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan khyod la gsol ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag nyid la gsol ba btab par bsam mo //
T02TD2512.2E:231a-9: de nas langs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' gang bar bsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:231a-10: bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can //
T02TD2512.2E:231a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:231a-13: de nas dang po'i rdo rje'i h'um badzrod tishtha mandala autp'a da ya mi zhes zlos shing dkyil 'khor bteg la /
T02TD2512.2E:231a-14: nam mkha'i phyogs su yid kyis bteg nas yang dang pos rdo rje dang h'um zhes bya bas snying ga dang lkog ma dang dbral ba dang spyi bor bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:231a-15: de nas badzra drishta ma ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su dgod la /
T02TD2512.2E:231a-16: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs //
T02TD2512.2E:231a-17: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02TD2512.2E:231a-18: h'um zhes bya ba zlos byed cing //
T02TD2512.2E:231a-19: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
T02TD2512.2E:231a-20: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la slob ma thams cad lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:231a-21: lha lhag par gnas pa byas nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su /
T02TD2512.2E:231a-22: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du sngar bshad pa'i cho gas thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:231b-0: de nas yi ge hri: las mig g-yon pa dang g-yas pa gnyis su nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la khro bo'i lta bas kun nas blta zhing @231b sgo rnams bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:231b-1: de ltar thig gdab pa'i cho ga byas nas tshon dgye bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:231b-2: re zhig dang por aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya bas tshon rtsi thams cad la re zhig lan bdun bdun bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:231b-3: de nas rdo rje nyi ma'i khro bo'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.2E:231b-4: hi zhes bya bas sbar bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:231b-5: de nas dang po'i rdo rje'i yi ge h'um zlos shing dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:231b-6: g-yas nas bskor ba'i rim gyis tshon rtsi thams cad dgye ba ni dang po rtsom pa'i tshe nas byas nas phyis ni ci bder bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:231b-8: dmar po dang ljang gu dang /
T02TD2512.2E:231b-9: sngon po dang ser po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:231b-10: dkar po ni thams cad kyi nang du bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:231b-11: dkyil 'khor dbus su sna tshogs padma sdong bu dang bcas par dpal rdo rje sems dpa' lugs ma'am /
T02TD2512.2E:231b-14: 'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la //
T02TD2512.2E:231b-16: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur sogs //
T02TD2512.2E:231b-17: rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs ldan //
T02TD2512.2E:231b-19: aom su ra ta stvam zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2512.2E:231b-20: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis rdo rje snyems tshul du bzhugs pa dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:231b-21: de'i shar gyi char rdo rje yid las byung ba'i gnas su 'dod chags rdo rje ma sku mdog dmar mo g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzhu bsnams shing g-yas pas mda' gsor ba la brtson pa g-yas logs su rdo rje k'i li k'i la'i gnas su rdo rje k'i li k'i la ya sku mdog dkar ljang phyag gnyis kyis dang po'i rdo rje 'khyud de bzhugs pa /
T02TD2512.2E:231b-22: rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma'i gnas su lha mo dran ma /
T02TD2512.2E:231b-23: sngon mo phyag g-yon chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:231b-24: phyag g-yas ji ltar mdzes par bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:231b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su rdo rje snyems ma'i gnas su 'dod pa ma'i dbang phyug ma sku mdog sngo ba rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis bsnams te gnyis ka dkur brten par bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:232a-0: 'di rnams dgod pa'i sngags ni dza:badzra drishta sa ma ya @232a * //
T02TD2512.2E:232a-2: h'um badzra k'i li k'i la ya h'um /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-3: bam badzri ni sma ra ta /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-4: ho badzra k'a me shva ri tvam /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-5: nang gi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi me'i mtshams su rab tu dga' ba ma sku mdog dmar ba /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-6: bden bral gyi mtshams su shin tu dga' ma ba la sha'i mdog ltar dkar ba /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-7: rlung gi mtshams su spyan ma sku mdog sngo ba /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-8: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su dpal mo chen mo gser gyi mdog can 'di rnams ni me tog dang /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-11: dri spyi bor thal mo sbyar te 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:232a-12: lha mo rdo rje rgyal mo 'di rnams kyi sngags bshad pa ni he badzra ra ti /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-14: aom badzra lo tsan ni ma sha ri bi badzra ho //
T02TD2512.2E:232a-15: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi me'i mtshams su sgeg mo sku mdog dmar ba /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-16: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa bsnams nas /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-17: dku gnyis su brten te bzhugs pa /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-18: bden bral gyi mtshams su bzhad ma pa la sha'i mdog ltar dkar ba /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-19: phyag gnyis kyis so'i phreng ba gnyis bsnams nas bzhad par ston pa /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-20: rlung gi mtshams su glu ma sku mdog sngo ba pi wang len pa la brtson pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:232a-21: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su gar ma sku mdog ser ba rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa phyag gnyis na bsnams te gar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:232a-22: de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni he ra ti badzra bi l'a sa ni tra ta /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-23: be ba ga te badzra h'a se ha ha /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-24: he ra hi badzra g'i te /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-26: he ra ti badzra nri tye /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-28: de nas phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i shar sgo gnyis su rdo rje lcags kyu ma sku mdog dmar ba rdo rje lcags kyus rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dgug par mdzad pa /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-29: lho phyogs kyi sgo gnyis su rdo rje zhags pa rnams pa la sha ltar dkar ba /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-30: rdo rje zhags pas gzhug par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:232a-31: nub phyogs kyi sgo gnyis rdo rje lcags sgrog ma /
T02TD2512.2E:232a-32: sku mdog sngo ba lcags sgrog gis 'ching bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:232a-33: byang phyogs kyi sgo gnyis su rdo rje dril bu ma sku mdog ser ba phyag g-yas pas rdo rje dril bu dkrol ba phyag g-yon pas stan la snyems pa bri'o //
T02TD2512.2E:232a-34: de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-3: de la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'dzum pa dang bcas shing dga' ba chen pos gzigs pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-4: 'dod chags rdo rje ma dang rab tu dga' ma dang sgeg mo dang /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-5: lcags kyu ma rnams kyis sgeg cing 'dzum pa dang bcas pas rnam par g-yo zhing zur gyis blta ba la spyan ras gzigs pa k'i li k'i la dang /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-8: zhags pa ma 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzums pa la longs spyod par mdzad pa /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-12: lcags sgrog ma'i snyems ma dang bcas pa la mchog tu bzhad pas spyan g-yon du gzigs pa /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-13: rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma dang /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-16: dril bu ma rnams kyis rnam par sgeg pa'i 'dzum zhing rab tu 'dud pa dang ldan pa la gzigs par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:232b-17: 'di dag thams cad kyang sna tshogs padma la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-18: dgod cing bde ba'i gzugs can no //
T02TD2512.2E:232b-19: shar phyogs na bzhugs pa rnams ni /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-20: mi bskyod pa'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-21: lho phyogs pa rnams ni rin chen 'byung ldan cod pan gyis so //
T02TD2512.2E:232b-22: nub phyogs pa rnams ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan gyis so //
T02TD2512.2E:232b-23: byang phyogs pa rnams ni don yod grub pa'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:232b-24: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris shing bkod nas sgo dbye ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-25: bsdu ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-26: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-27: rdo rje can gyi spyan sngar ni //
T02TD2512.2E:232b-28: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis 'dug ste //
T02TD2512.2E:232b-29: bde chen rdo rje can rab mchog / bdag po lan cig yang dag dgug //
T02TD2512.2E:232b-30: he ma h'a su kha badzra aa mo gha sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-31: pra buddha su ra ta stvam /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-32: aa nu rakto me bha wa /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-33: su to shyo me bha wa /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-34: su dri dho me bha wa /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-35: su po shyo me bha wa /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-37: aa dhi ni da na satva sarba siddhi mme pra ya tstsha /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-38: ae sha stvam aa kri sha pra be sha ya sa ma ye rab tam ba shi ka ro mi /
T02TD2512.2E:232b-39: ai mer mu dra mandra p'a de dza: h'um bam ho: de la bde ba chen po rdo rje che//
T02TD2512.2E:233a-0: @233a * // rdo rje mchog ma ni rdo rje gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma'o //
T02TD2512.2E:233a-1: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo thams cad la rdo rje bsrung ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-2: lha thams cad legs par bsrungs nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la h'um zhes bya bas mchod yon phul la h'um dri shya dza: h'um pam ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-5: aa nu r'a g'a mi h'um /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-6: zhes lan gsum zlos shing dang po'i rdo rje bcings la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:233a-7: de nas rdo rje 'dod chags ma'i rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-8: dza:badzra drishtha dza:h'um bam ho:sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-11: badzra badzra drishtha sa ma ya ke ma ta /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-13: 'dod chags rdo rje ma bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:233a-14: de bzhin du rdo rje dril bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-15: badzra ghante ho:dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-18: zhes lan gsum bzlas pa la rdo rje dril bu ma bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:233a-19: yang gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-20: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-21: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:233a-22: yang gsang ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu ma 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa la bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:233a-23: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa la chos dang /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-25: phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas gdab par bya'o ;
T02TD2512.2E:233a-26: / de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:233a-27: de nas mchod yon phul la bum pa gang ba la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-28: rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i gos dang yang sgo srung bzlas pa'i gos kyis gdong g-yogs la gos sna tshogs bgos shing me tog gi phreng ba btags pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-29: kha dri zhim por byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-30: phyag bzhi byas nas sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-31: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:233a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:233b-0: @233b yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba btab nas sngom pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-1: de nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chu la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su bzlas pas bdag nyid dbang bskur la badzra badzra zhes zlos shing rdo rje shugs kyis dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing /
T02TD2512.2E:233b-2: dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje glu 'di phyag rgya dang bcas pas blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-3: rjes su chags pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-4: yid kyi bde ba dam pa yi //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-6: rab tu dga' ba'i 'gro rnams la //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-7: bde ba chen po brtan zhing mthong //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-8: thog ma'i grub pa myur mdzod cig / aom ma h'a su kha badzra siddhi /
T02TD2512.2E:233b-9: badzra satva siddhya dza:h'um bam ho: siddhi sa ma ya siddhi h'um /
T02TD2512.2E:233b-10: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i glu'o //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-11: de la phyag rgya 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:233b-12: rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-13: spyi bor thal sbyar me tog bcas //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-14: phyag rgya kun gyi rnal 'byor che//
T02TD2512.2E:233b-16: sgo srung gi lha mo rnams kyi snying po yang de bzhin du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-17: de nas 'di'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:233b-18: ba dan gsum pa rtse gsum bcas //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-19: bsgyings bcas mtha' sogs las grol bas //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-20: glog 'gyu ltar gdeg mdun du bskor //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-21: de ni rdo rje gar zhes bshad //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-22: thal mo khong stong me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pa spyi bor gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-23: de nas 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-24: ma h'a ra ta su dri dha /
T02TD2512.2E:233b-25: su dri shya su kha su satva aa siddhya mi /
T02TD2512.2E:233b-26: rnam sgeg dga' ba'i rdo rje ni //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-27: rnam par 'gyur bas sgeg bcas pa //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-28: bzhin ras padma kha phye bas //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-29: bzhugs gnas mgon la phyag bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-30: aom par ma su kha sha ya su la li ta /
T02TD2512.2E:233b-31: bi l'a sya na ma sti /
T02TD2512.2E:233b-33: bha ga w'a ntam dza:h'um bam ho:hi hi hi hi pra t'i tstsha ku su m'a nydza li n'a tha zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:233b-34: de la 'di'i rnam par sgeg pa'i dga' ba'i rdo rje ste /
T02TD2512.2E:233b-35: rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa'i mig dang phyag bya bas rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2512.2E:234a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bsam pas phyag @234a * //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-2: de nas dkyil 'khor bskor ba lan gsum byas la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug la /
T02TD2512.2E:234a-3: mchod pa chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-4: rdo rje chen po nor che ba //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-5: ye shes chen po las che ba //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-6: rdo rje sems bdag deng grub mdzod //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-7: ces bya ba de kho na nyid brjod bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-8: de nas dza:h'um bam ho:bra siddha mam zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-9: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la g-yon ba'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma'i rdo rje phye la h'um a'a:zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-10: de nas me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-11: aom pa ram su kha sha ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa phyag bya ba'i glu dang zlos shing 'jug pa'i phyag rgya nyid phab la bsgyings pa dang bcas pas mdzub mo dang mthe chung gi rtse mo mtha' nas dgrol ba ni me tog dor ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-12: de nas phreng ba de blangs la 'dis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-13: deng khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa nas aom ma h'a su kha badzra satva aa bhi shinytsa mam su ra ta stvam zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod do //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-14: de nas snying po 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-15: aom badzra tsakshu ma h'a su kha su ra ta stvam /
T02TD2512.2E:234a-16: de nas he badzra p'a shya zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2512.2E:234a-17: rdo rje lcags kyu ma nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:234a-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i bar gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi ngo bor bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-19: de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:234a-20: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-21: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor bas shis par brjod pa'i tshul du rang gi snying gar bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:234a-22: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:234a-23: de nas 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi glu dang rol mo'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-0: de nas bdag nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpar bsams la dang po'i rdo rje dang badzra satva zhes bya ba zlos shing bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag @234b rgyas rang gi lus la gnas ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02TD2512.2E:234b-1: bdag nyid dbang bskur ba la sogs pa gzengs bstod pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:234b-2: lung bstan pa'i bar gyi cho ga rnams rjes su spyad nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:234b-3: ji ltar mngon bar 'dod pa'i bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-4: de nas mchod pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par mchod la phyir dbyung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-5: de nas slob ma gzhug par 'dod na /
T02TD2512.2E:234b-6: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.2E:234b-7: rdo rje mchod yon bskor bcings la //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-8: snying nas bsam pa g-yos pa yis //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-9: mgo bos yang dag phyag byas la //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-10: dngos grub dam par rab grub byed //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-11: dkyil 'khor nyid du zhugs pas kyang //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-12: bskor ba lan gsum bya ba yin //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-13: bde ba chen po 'dod chags che //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-14: 'gro ba kun kyang grub phyir bya//
T02TD2512.2E:234b-15: de nas mchod pa bzhi pa yis //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-16: bde ba che la yang dag mchod //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-17: de bzhin rdo rje dbang bskur la //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-18: slob ma bzung ste gzhug par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-19: 'dir cho ga thams cad dang por gzhug par bshad pa yin la /
T02TD2512.2E:234b-20: 'dir khyad par ni 'di ltar rdo rje mchod yon gyi phyag rgyas 'jug pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-21: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.2E:234b-23: // / de la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su gzung ba'i dge bsnyen nam /
T02TD2512.2E:234b-24: dge sbyong ngam dge slong gi sngom pa yongs su bzung ba la rig pa'i sngom pa 'dzin du bcug ste /
T02TD2512.2E:234b-25: des slob dpon la phyag byas nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:234b-26: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-27: ces bya ba'i bar gyi rim pas 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.2E:234b-28: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug ste /
T02TD2512.2E:234b-29: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pa ram ma h'a bo dhi tsitta autp'a da ya mi aa be sha sarba satva dh'a tu pa ri tran su khotta ma siddhi ni mi ttam aa ta ga dam bha ba sa ma siddhi ma h'a shya dya dyi battya y'a aa bad sarba da ma ma h'a siddhi ma h'a hi shva dya dhi siddha y'a ya tsa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-0: de nas de'i snying gar su ra te sa ma ya stvam hi badzra siddha ya @235a * //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-1: tha su kham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:235a-2: de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2512.2E:235a-3: de slob dpon gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i bshad pa'i sngags dang /
T02TD2512.2E:235a-4: phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-5: de nas me tog la sogs pas mchod la yon gyi mchog blangs te /
T02TD2512.2E:235a-6: slob dpon gyis phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ba la /
T02TD2512.2E:235a-7: dang po'i 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.2E:235a-8: rdo rje shugs kyis rang gi dbang bskur ba'i cho gas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-9: sgo bzhi las shar sgo nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i las kyi phyag rgyas dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-10: lho phyogs nas zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-11: nub nas lcags sgrog mas bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-12: byang nas dril bu ma'i las kyi phyag rgyas dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-13: de nas shar phyogs nas yang bcug la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-15: chags bral gyis ni dag par 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-16: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' sbas pa yin //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-19: gzhan dag ngo bo nyid kyis med //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-20: de bas kun dang chags bral bar //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-21: khyod ni nam yang ma byed cig / de nas 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-22: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor bstan zhing dbab pa'i phyag rgya dgrol ba'i bar gyi cho ga sngar bshad pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-23: de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar sgor bltas pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-24: sna tshogs padma la bris la /
T02TD2512.2E:235a-25: slob ma dpal rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.2E:235a-26: phyag rgya chen po padma'i steng du gzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:235a-27: dbang bskur ba nas phyag rgya bzhi byin gyis brlab pa'i bar gyi chog rgyas pa rnams bya ba ni sngar dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga las gsungs pa'i tshul du thams cad bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235a-28: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.2E:235a-30: // / de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.2E:235a-31: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bstan nas /
T02TD2512.2E:235b-0: da ni dam @235b tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la /
T02TD2512.2E:235b-1: slob dpon gyi dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:235b-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:235b-3: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa ston pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235b-4: de phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste /
T02TD2512.2E:235b-5: gang gi phyir sgrub pa med par gdul bya rnams kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i don grub par mi 'gyur bas na rgyu de'i phyir sgrub pa bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235b-6: sgrub pa de nyid dngos grub kyi rgyu yin pas na sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235b-7: sgrub pa de'i dngos grub khyad par ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:235b-8: shin tu rtag pa yin zhes gsungs te thog ma dang tha ma med pa dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa mngon sum du byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir shin tu rtag pa'i dngos grub ste /
T02TD2512.2E:235b-9: dngos grub shin tu rtag pa de'i sgrub pa bshad pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.2E:235b-10: srid pa 'dir zhes bya ba ni tshe 'di nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235b-11: gang gi phyir thob ces bya ba ni sgrub pa gang gis de thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235b-13: shin tu rtag pa'i dngos grub nyid //
T02TD2512.2E:235b-15: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob pa ni shin tu rtag pa'i dngos grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:235b-16: ci'i phyir sgrub pa 'dis shin tu rtag pa'i dngos grub tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:235b-17: 'di yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:235b-18: 'og nas bshad pa'i sgrub pa 'dis so //
T02TD2512.2E:235b-19: byang chub sems dpa' ni zhes bya ba sgrub pa po srid par gnas shing zhes bya ba la 'dod pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:235b-20: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa na gnas pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235b-21: srid pa spangs pa zhes bya ba 'dod pa'i srid pa la sogs pa spangs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:235b-22: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug che //
T02TD2512.2E:235b-23: zhes bya ba rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad thob cing rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub rdzogs pas na /
T02TD2512.2E:235b-24: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug che //
T02TD2512.2E:235b-26: rtag tu sems can kun don byed //
T02TD2512.2E:236a-0: ces bya ba ni phyi ma'i mthar thug pa med par sems can gyi don mdzad @236a * //
T02TD2512.2E:236a-2: / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas kyang tshe 'di nyid la srid pa la gnas shid srid pa spangs pa grub cing sems can gyi don rtag tu byed par 'gyur bas na sgrub pa 'di ci zhig bya zhes rtog na de'i phyir ji ltar 'di yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:236a-3: ji ltar grub pa 'dis tshe 'di nyid la srid par gnas shing srid pa spangs pa grub par gyur pa de /
T02TD2512.2E:236a-4: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la sogs pas sgrub pa ni ma yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:236a-5: gang gi phyir des bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob par bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.2E:236a-6: byang chub spyod pa zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang /
T02TD2512.2E:236a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu'i spyod pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:236a-8: de la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub spyod pa la sogs te /
T02TD2512.2E:236a-9: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thob par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:236a-11: bsgom pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi spyod pa la sogs pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:236a-12: dge ba'i tshul ni gzhan gyis kyang //
T02TD2512.2E:236a-13: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i spyod pas kyang ste /
T02TD2512.2E:236a-14: de dag gis tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ste /
T02TD2512.2E:236a-15: dam par gyur pa ji ltar 'dis thob par gyur pa de bzhin du de dag gis thob par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:236a-16: tshul gzhan dag gis sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub tshe 'di nyid la grub pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:236a-17: sems can thams cad kyi don ci'i phyir mi byed ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:236a-18: gdul bya min pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:236a-19: sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub bskyed pa'i phag chags med pas sangs rgyas dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa mthong ba lta bu'i skal pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams ni gdul bya ma yin pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:236a-20: mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i las gyi lam dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi khams ni bsod nams med pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:236a-21: de bas na gdul bya ma yin pa 'am /
T02TD2512.2E:236b-0: bsod @236b nams med pa'i rgyu'i tshul gzhan gyis sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa mthong nas sems can gyi don bya bar mi nus shing /
T02TD2512.2E:236b-1: tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pas sems can thams cad kyi don rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:236b-2: de bas rgyud chen las grub pas //
T02TD2512.2E:236b-3: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:236b-5: sangs rgyas yang na rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2512.2E:236b-7: 'og nas ji skad bshad pa'i sgrub pas grub cing sangs rgyas sam //
T02TD2512.2E:236b-11: chos rtog pa'i bag chags bskyed pas 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i mthong ba la sogs pa rgyur gyur pas gdul bya rnams kyis phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rdzogs par byed pa'i sems can gyi don byed pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:236b-12: tshad rtsi tsam zhig ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:236b-13: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:236b-14: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po sangs rgyas nyid dang rdo rje 'chang nyid du bskyed pa rdzogs par byas pa ni sems can gyi don nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:236b-15: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa de mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:236b-16: ji lta bu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag sems can gyi don mdzad ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:236b-17: srid pa'i nyes pa dri ma med //
T02TD2512.2E:236b-18: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:236b-19: 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:236b-20: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa ni srid pa'i nyes pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:236b-21: de'i dri ma med pa ni dri ma de dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:236b-22: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2512.2E:236b-23: zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:236b-24: nam mkha' mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar mtha' yas pas nam nam mkha' mtha' yas te /
T02TD2512.2E:236b-25: de'i ngo bo nyid ni nam mkha' mtha' yas pa nyid do //
T02TD2512.2E:237a-0: nam mkha' mtha' yas pa nyid des nam mkha' mtha' yas ltar thams cad du song bas sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'char de rnams mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i @237a * //
T02TD2512.2E:237a-1: khams la bzhugs nas mya ngan las mi 'da' bar sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:237a-2: ji ltar nam mkha' dang mnyam par sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-3: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'am //
T02TD2512.2E:237a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-5: gang gi phyir bsgrub pa 'dis sems can dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-7: le lo can yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:237a-8: de bas na 'di'i nus pas sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs pa de rnams nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad do //
T02TD2512.2E:237a-9: su zhig gis de skad gsungs she na /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-10: bcom ldan 'das don yod par grub pa rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:237a-11: de ltar slob dpon gyi sgrub pa bshad nas /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-12: da ni rva nas bzung ba'i tshul gyis bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-13: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-14: don yod pa ni 'bras bu yod pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-15: de nyid kyis na thogs pa med pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:237a-16: myur ba ni ring por mi thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:237a-17: mchog ni bsgrub pa'i thabs gzhan las dam par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:237a-18: de yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-19: bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-20: 'di sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'chang ba nyid sgrub pas na /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-22: rjes su bshad pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-23: bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpar gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:237a-24: lugs ma'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-25: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gzugs bzo bo bzang po byed du gzhug pa'am /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-27: de nas yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su bzhag la bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:237a-28: ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-29: nyin re zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:237a-30: nyi ma re re ni nyin re'o //
T02TD2512.2E:237a-31: bzlas pa dang bsgom pa'i dus kyi thog ma ni dang po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:237a-32: lan cig ni zhes bya ba ni lan cig gcig go //
T02TD2512.2E:237a-33: yul dang ldan gyur pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:237b-0: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i cha lugs dang rgyan gyis @237b bdag nyid brgyan par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:237b-1: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni rnam pa de lta bus dgug cing spyan drangs la /
T02TD2512.2E:237b-2: mchod pa zhes bya ba gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis yang dag par mchod do //
T02TD2512.2E:237b-3: gang gis yang dag par dgug par bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:237b-4: gsang ba mchog gis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:237b-5: yi ge h'um zlos shing gsang ba'i lcags kyu dril bu dang bcas pas rang gi lus la gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig do //
T02TD2512.2E:237b-6: phyag rgya chen pos rang byin gyis brlab ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:237b-7: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po rab tu zhes bya ba /
T02TD2512.2E:237b-8: shin tu byin gyis brlab pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:237b-9: rdo rje sems dpar byas pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:237b-10: phyag rgya chen por rab byin brlab //
T02TD2512.2E:237b-12: rdo rje mig gis de bzhin blta //
T02TD2512.2E:237b-14: ji ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bskal pa bzang po'i thog mar /
T02TD2512.2E:237b-15: rdo rje lta ba'i phyag rgyas gzigs shing ;
T02TD2512.2E:237b-16: yi ge h'um gi glu gsung zhing bzhugs pa de bzhin du rnal 'byor pas rdo rje mig gis blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:237b-17: rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag ces bya ba la /
T02TD2512.2E:237b-19: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po dang lha mo'o //
T02TD2512.2E:237b-20: de'i bdag nyid ni gnyis su med pa'i byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems kyi ngo bo bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:237b-21: rang nyid ni bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:237b-22: yi ge h'um ni glu zlos pas //
T02TD2512.2E:237b-23: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:237b-24: zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:237b-25: rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:237b-26: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:237b-27: badzra a'a be sha a'a zhes bya bas bdag nyid la dbab par byas /
T02TD2512.2E:237b-28: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dgrol la /
T02TD2512.2E:237b-29: dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur gcig bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:237b-30: de nas snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa las /
T02TD2512.2E:237b-31: yi ge h'um yid kyis bris nas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:238a-0: de nas rang gi sems nam mkha'i phyogs su yi ge h'um gi @238a * //
T02TD2512.2E:238a-3: de'i steng du yi ge h'um gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa h'um dang bcas pa las dang po'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.2E:238a-4: rdo rje'i dbus su h'um bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:238a-5: rdo rje ni bdag po zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:238a-6: de nas rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i sbyor bas /
T02TD2512.2E:238a-7: badzra satva ham zhes zlos shing rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:238a-8: de nas bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor la /
T02TD2512.2E:238a-9: badzra satva ham zhes yang bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:238a-10: de nas ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.2E:238a-11: de nas sa ma ya stvam zhes zlos shing dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:238a-12: sa ma ya stvam zhes bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:238a-13: de nas sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya bas /
T02TD2512.2E:238a-17: spyi bor bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:238a-18: de nas h'um zlos shing phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:238a-19: h'um aa zhes bya bas mdun du sna tshogs padma dang po'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bskyed par byas la badzra ham zhes bya bas nga rgyal bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.2E:238a-20: rdo rje badzra sa tva ham zhes zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:238a-21: de nas der rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bzhis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:238a-24: dbang du byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te h'um dri shya zhes bya bas lta ba byas nas gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma dang h'um gis rang gi lus la bcug la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:238a-25: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod cing 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba'i 'od kyis dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:238a-26: de nas rang gi lus kyi nang du chud pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dang chu dang 'o ma bzhin du gcig tu gyur par bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:238a-27: sa ma ya stvam aa ham dza: h'um bam ho /
T02TD2512.2E:238a-28: zhes lan gsum bzla par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:238a-29: lnga po bsdus pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:238a-30: aom su ra ta stvam zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.2E:238a-31: de nas gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-0: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes lan @238b gsum bzlas la bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:238b-1: de nas dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-5: badzra karm'a zhes bya ba de bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:238b-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mchog bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-7: yi ge gnyis kyi go chas go /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-10: ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-11: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blangs la /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-12: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bdag nyid la yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-13: rnam par sgeg pa'i dga' ba'i rdo rjes phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-14: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung //
T02TD2512.2E:238b-15: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2512.2E:238b-16: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya che //
T02TD2512.2E:238b-17: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
T02TD2512.2E:238b-18: de ltar bsgrub pa lan cig byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-19: de'i rjes la thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin yin par bsams nas /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-20: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-21: ras ris dang sku gzugs la sogs pa las /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-22: yi ge h'um gi glu nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:238b-23: de ltar nyin re zhing byin gyis brlabs pa lan cig byas nas ;
T02TD2512.2E:238b-24: ji srid bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyi mdun du nyin re zhing mdun du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:238b-25: de nas mtshan thog thag bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:238b-26: de nas de cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-27: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-29: bshad ma thag pa'i bsgrub pas so //
T02TD2512.2E:238b-30: rdo rje 'dod pa kun dbang phyug /'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding //
T02TD2512.2E:238b-32: 'dod pa yang yin la kun kyang yin pas 'dod pa kun te /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-33: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:238b-35: dbang phyug ni de rnams la dbang byed pa'i bdag po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:238b-36: 'dod pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni bsams pa tsam gyis so //
T02TD2512.2E:238b-37: 'gro ba ni rang gi gnas nas 'og min la sogs pa'i gnas su song ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-0: 'ong ba ni gnas de nas rang gi @239a * //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-2: dngos grub kun ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa grub pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:239a-3: de la dbang du byed pa'am des dbang phyug tu gyur pas na rdo rje kun gyi dbang phyug go //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-5: grub ces bya ba gsungs te ji skad du bshad pa'i bsgrub pa 'dis rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub rdzogs par 'gyur ba ni grub pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-6: kun mchog dam pa'i dbang phyug yin //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-7: zhes bya ba ni kun kyang yin la mchog dam pa yang yin pas na kun mchog dam pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-8: de nyid ni dbang phyug yin pas na kun mchog dam pa'i dbang phyug ces bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-9: phun sum tshogs pa yang yin la kun kyang yin pas phun sum tshogs pa kun de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i 'byor pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-10: de rnams kyi bdag po yin pas na phun sum tshogs pa kun bdag go //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-11: thams cad yin zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-12: 'dod chags chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshul lo //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-13: bde ba chen po ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-14: thams cad 'dul zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rigs kyi bdag por gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-15: sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-16: rtag par zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-17: kun du 'dul ba'o zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pas na kun du 'dul ba'o ;
T02TD2512.2E:239a-18: / dngos grub kun gyi bde mchog mchog / ces bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub ni dngos grub ste /
T02TD2512.2E:239a-19: des bskyed pa'i bde ba ni dngos grub kun gyi bde ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-20: bde ba mchog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mchog yin pas na dngos grub kun gyi bde mchog ces bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-21: phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug yin //
T02TD2512.2E:239a-23: phyag rgya yang yin la kun kyang yin pas na phyag rgya kun te /
T02TD2512.2E:239b-0: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa lha @239b mo'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-1: de rnams kyi bdag po ni gtso bo'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-2: de rnams kyi gtso bor gyur pa nyid kyis na dbang phyug yin zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-3: rdo rje kun gyi dngos grub che //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-5: rdo rje yang yin la kun kyang yin pas na rdo rje kun te /
T02TD2512.2E:239b-6: rdo rje rigs kyi ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin can gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-7: de'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub la sogs pa ni dngos grub chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-8: thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'byung gnas che //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-9: zhes bya ba la thams cad mkhyen pa ni padma'i rigs kyi ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-10: de'i 'byung gnas kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na /
T02TD2512.2E:239b-11: thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'byung gnas che //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-13: padma'i rigs kyi ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyur gyur pa nyid kyis thams cad du khyab pa'i 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-14: mi tshugs pa ni zil gyis gnon par mi nus pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-15: mi sod pa ni gsod par mi nus pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-16: thams cad byed ces bya ba la ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i las byed pas na thams cad byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-17: de kun gyi gnas zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-18: khams gsum las rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:239b-19: gzugs dang gzugs med pa na gnas pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams 'dul bar mdzad pas na khams gsum las rgyal ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-20: sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad du khyab pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:239b-21: ji ltar khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yin zhe na ;
T02TD2512.2E:239b-22: tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs nus zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:239b-23: gang gi phyir 'di khams gsum pa la spyod pa'i sems can thams cad la /
T02TD2512.2E:240a-0: tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa nus pas na rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa lha thams cad kyi sbyor ba sems @240a * //
T02TD2512.2E:240a-1: can gyi khams thams cad la stsol ba yin pa'i phyir te /
T02TD2512.2E:240a-2: de bas na thams cad la rjes su dga' bas kun la rjes su chags pa'i sems kyi ngo bos so //
T02TD2512.2E:240a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs can thams cad bskyed par mtshungs pa med pa gnyis pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i mchog yin pas na kun mchog go //
T02TD2512.2E:240a-4: kun rig ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas so //
T02TD2512.2E:240a-5: dngos grub thams cad ster zhes bya pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad ster bas na dngos grub thams cad ster ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:240a-6: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du //
T02TD2512.2E:240a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:240a-8: rnam pa de lta bur bsgoms pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dang 'dra bar grub par gsungs nas da ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar bsgoms pas /
T02TD2512.2E:240a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:240a-11: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te gal te zhes bya ba ni ci ste zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02TD2512.2E:240a-12: ji ste dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid dam /
T02TD2512.2E:240a-13: sangs rgyas nyid dam byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can sgrub par 'dod pa de'i dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub pa'i thabs dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyi sbyor bas de 'di ltar sgrub na sgrub pa'i dngos grub thams cad tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:240a-14: don 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:240a-15: phyi mas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:240a-16: rgyud kyi phyi ma las gsungs pa'i cho ga rnams kyis sam /
T02TD2512.2E:240a-17: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i rgyud las bshad pa'i 'jig rten bas sam /
T02TD2512.2E:240b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa las gsungs pa'i rtog pa thams @240b cad kyis sam /
T02TD2512.2E:240b-1: rang nyid kyis mdzad pa zhes bya ba rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i cho gas myur zhing rings pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:240b-2: rtog cing brtan par dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:240b-3: de ltar phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir cho ga gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:240b-4: da ni rang gi lha'i skur bdag nyid bskyed de /
T02TD2512.2E:240b-5: dngos grub 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes brtan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:240b-6: de la ji ltar na rang gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid bsgrub par bya zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te ;
T02TD2512.2E:240b-7: rang gi phyag rgyas rang gi lha'i sku dang gsungs dang thugs rdo rje'i ngo bor bdag nyid sgrub pa ni rang gi lha'i skur bdag nyid bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:240b-9: phyag rgya chen por mnyam gzhag la //
T02TD2512.2E:240b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:240b-11: rang gi lha'i sku'i gsang ba ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:240b-12: der mnyam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par bsgoms nas bsgrub par bya zhing brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:240b-13: rang gi snying po zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i snying pos so //
T02TD2512.2E:240b-14: lan cig ces bya ba ni lan cig ste /
T02TD2512.2E:240b-15: thun mtshams dang po la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:240b-17: ye shes sems dpa' rang gi lus la ji lta ba bzhin du bcug la /
T02TD2512.2E:240b-18: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rab tu bsgrubs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:240b-19: chos dang las kyi phyag rgya gnyis kyis rgyas btab la /
T02TD2512.2E:240b-20: phyag rgya chen po bcings te rang gi lha'i snying po bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:240b-21: de ltar na rnal 'byor pa la rang gi lha'i snying po des rang gi sku'i gsang bas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:240b-23: de ltar cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas phyag rgya chen pos bdag la byin gyis brlab pa byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:240b-24: de'i rjes la rang gi lha'i snying po bzla bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:240b-25: de la ji ltar na yi ge h'um gi glu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:240b-26: ro bhi ta sogs phyag rgyar ldan //
T02TD2512.2E:241a-1: sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.2E:241a-2: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:241a-3: rgyud 'di las ni gtso bor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba ston pa yin la /
T02TD2512.2E:241a-4: de bas na lce la rdo rje dkar po bsams la lte bar h'um la sogs pa rang gi lha'i snying po bsams la yang rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa la yi ge h'um la sogs pa rnam par bsams nas /
T02TD2512.2E:241a-5: de nyid ji lta ba bzhin du zlos shing chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:241a-6: de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:241a-7: da ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa gsungs pa ni de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa'i rgyud bshad do zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:241a-8: phyag rgya yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas phyag rgya thams cad de /
T02TD2512.2E:241a-9: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:241a-10: de rnams kyi mchog grub pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:241a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku'i gsang bar bdag nyid bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:241a-12: gal te phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te rnal 'byor pa gang la la zhig rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i gsang ba sgrub par 'dod pa des dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:241a-13: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i cha lugs 'dzin pa nyid kyis rang gi snying po bzlas shing /
T02TD2512.2E:241a-14: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:241a-15: skyo bar gyur pa na ngal so zhing bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:241a-16: de nas phyag rgya chen po bshad par gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:241a-17: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub par gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:241a-18: de la ji ltar dam tshig thams cad grub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na zhes bya ba yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:241a-19: dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni //
T02TD2512.2E:241a-20: zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:241b-0: 'di skad ston pa yin te snga ma bzhin du bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas sa ma @241b ya stvam /
T02TD2512.2E:241b-1: zhes brjod cing rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:241b-2: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i sku'i rdo rje la rang gi lha'i snying po yid kyis bris la /
T02TD2512.2E:241b-3: rang gi lha'i sku gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par bsgoms te /
T02TD2512.2E:241b-4: rang gi lha'i snying po bzla par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:241b-5: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya sgrub pa gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:241b-6: da ni las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:241b-7: de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:241b-8: rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis //
T02TD2512.2E:241b-9: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis ni gar gyi mchod pa yin pa'am /
T02TD2512.2E:241b-10: las kyi phyag rgya'i gar gyi mchod pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:241b-11: gar gyi mchod pa rgyur gyur pas //
T02TD2512.2E:241b-12: des sgrub cing bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:241b-13: skyo bar ma gyur zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:241b-14: mchod pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na mchod pa thams cad de /
T02TD2512.2E:241b-15: phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis so //
T02TD2512.2E:241b-16: de la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni mchod pa thams cad la sogs pa las thams cad kyi mchog so sor rtogs pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02TD2512.2E:241b-18: zhes bya ba ni de sgrub pa po la skye ba 'di kho nar 'grub par 'gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:241b-19: rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni //
T02TD2512.2E:241b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.2E:241b-22: snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:241b-23: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis rang gi lha yang dag par mchod pas phyag byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:241b-24: aa zhes bya bas snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2512.2E:241b-25: de'i steng du rang gi lha'i bzla bar bya ba'i snying po bsams nas de nyid zlos shing rang gi lha'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:241b-26: rang gi lha dang chos thams cad rang gis 'od gsal bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:241b-27: rtog pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na rtog pa thams cad de /
T02TD2512.2E:241b-29: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.2E:242a-0: de rnams kyi sgrub ba chen po ni bshad ma thag @242a * //
T02TD2512.2E:242a-2: de nyid ni don yod par grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242a-3: de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud chen po zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242a-4: de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhi bsgrub pa bshad nas da ni chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa bsgrub pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:242a-5: rab tu ldan pa'i sgrub pa bdun gyis kyang gal te grub par ma gyur na /
T02TD2512.2E:242a-6: de'i tshe 'og nas rjes thogs nyid la 'chad pa'i las rnams lan cig bzlas pas grub par 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:242a-7: de nas rtog pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyud ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:242a-8: chos dang phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:242a-9: dam tshig dang las kyi phyag rgya ni rtog pa thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:242a-10: de rnams kyi sgrub pa ni ji skad du bshad pas na ma grub pa ni bskyed cing rdzogs par ma gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242a-11: dngos grub thams cad ni las nyis brgya grub ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242a-12: de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud de /
T02TD2512.2E:242a-13: de bshad par bya'o zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242a-14: nyin re zhes bya ba ni nyin zhag re re zhing ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:242a-15: dang por zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa sgrub pa'i sngon du'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242a-16: lan cig ces bya ba ni lan cig gcig go //
T02TD2512.2E:242a-17: phyag rgya sgrub pa la don yod pa //
T02TD2512.2E:242a-18: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i don yod cing 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242a-19: de nyid kyis na dngos grub thogs pa med pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:242a-20: rgyu de rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:242a-21: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:242a-22: gal te ji skad du bshad pa'i sgrub pa bdun gyis bsgrubs su zin kyang /
T02TD2512.2E:242a-23: chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa sgrub pa pos grub par ma gyur na /
T02TD2512.2E:242a-24: de'i tshe yang rang gi lha'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:242a-25: thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa'i las grub par byed pa'i phyag rgya bcings la thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa la sogs pa'i las lan cig bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242b-0: de'i rjes la chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa bzhi @242b bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242b-1: de ltar na phyag rgya bzhi'i dngos grub nges ba de kho nar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:242b-2: da ni las sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:242b-3: thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:242b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rjes su mnyes par bya ba ni rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur pa las rang dbang du gyur par bya ba'i phyir mngon du phyogs bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242b-5: dgug pa dang zhes bya ba ni de rnams nyid spyan drang ba ni dgug pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242b-6: bcing ba dang zhes bya ba ni spyan drangs pa de rnams nyid rang dbang du byas pa'i phyir rdo rje lcags sgrog gis mi 'gul bar bya ba ni bcing ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242b-7: dbang du bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni de rnams nyid rang dbang du byas pa ni dbang du bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242b-8: de ltar na thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:242b-11: dbang du bya ba sgrub pa ni de bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242b-12: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:242b-13: bde ba chen po rdo rje lta bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:242b-14: bde ba chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242b-15: de'i lta ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje lta ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:242b-16: rdo rje 'bar ba'i lta ba brtan pa dang po'i rdo rje dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242b-18: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba gsang ba'i lcags kyus spyan drangs la /
T02TD2512.2E:242b-19: mdun du ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs te /
T02TD2512.2E:242b-20: phyag rgya thams cad kyis dbang bskur te phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:242b-21: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te h'um zlos shing de'i rjes la aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes zlos shing 'dzum pa'i blta bas bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing de bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:242b-22: de lta bus ni rjes su mnyes par gyur te /
T02TD2512.2E:242b-23: sgrub pa po gang la rjes su chags pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:242b-24: de bzhin du gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa bsgrubs na yang rjes su chags par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:242b-25: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:243a-0: 'bar ba'i lta bas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs @243a * //
T02TD2512.2E:243a-1: pa spyan drang bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:243a-2: de lta bus ni de thams cad 'gug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:243a-3: gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa bsgrub pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:243a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa'i lus su yid kyis bcug la /
T02TD2512.2E:243a-5: gnod sbyin mo la sogs ba'i lus dang de gcig tu byas la 'dzum pa'i lta bas de dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:243a-6: de lta bus de sgrub pa pos bkug nas dbang du byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:243a-7: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:243a-8: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba la brtan pa'i lta bas blta bzhin du bzlas par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:243a-9: de lta bus ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:243a-10: de bzhin du thams cad byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:243a-11: 'dzum pa'i lta bas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba la blta zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:243a-12: de rnams dga' ba bskyed pa'i bsam pas bzla bar byas te de lta bus ni dbang du byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:243a-16: dngos grub thams cad mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2512.2E:243a-17: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba ni bde ba thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:243a-18: yid bde ba yang de bzhin no //
T02TD2512.2E:243a-19: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'o /
T02TD2512.2E:243a-20: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub ni dngos grub thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:243a-23: dngos grub 'di thams cad mngon par 'phel ba ni gong nas gong du rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis skye ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:243a-25: bde ba'i rdo rje chen po'i rdo rjes so zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:243a-26: dang po'i rdo rje mtshan ma la sogs par gnas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:243a-27: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:243a-28: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:243a-29: yi ge h'um zlos shing dang po'i rdo rje bcings la rang gi mtshan mar gzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:243b-0: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes zlos shing bcom ldan 'das yum rdo rje bsnyems ma dang lhan cig yang dag par sbyor @243b ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:243b-1: de lta bus ni de nyid kyis bde ba mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:243b-2: de bzhin du thams cad byas la dang po'i rdo rje snying gar 'jog cing /
T02TD2512.2E:243b-3: rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:243b-4: de lta bus ni yid bde ba mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:243b-5: de bzhin du thams cad byas la dang po'i rdo rje dbral bar bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:243b-6: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rang bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:243b-7: de lta bus ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:243b-8: de bzhin du thams cad byas la dang po'i rdo rje spyi por 'jog cing bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa grub par bsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:243b-9: de lta bus ni dngos grub thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:243b-11: gzugs dang gzi brjid chen po mngon par 'phel bar bya ba zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i tshe ni tshe chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:243b-12: tshe dang lang tsho ni de rnams nyid kyi na tshod dar la bab pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:243b-13: de rnams nyid kyi mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02TD2512.2E:243b-14: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa ni gzugs so //
T02TD2512.2E:243b-15: de rnams nyid kyi gzi mdangs ni gzi byin chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:243b-16: tshe dang lang tsho dang gzugs dang gzi byin 'di rnams mngon par 'phel ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.2E:243b-18: dang po'i rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:243b-19: dang po'i rdo rje ni dbus ma snying ga la sogs par gzhag ste btung bar bya ba 'di ni dang po'i rdo rje bcud kyis len pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:243b-20: 'di skad ston te de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la h'um gis dang po'i rdo rje bcings te aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes zlos shing rang gi snying gar de'i rtse mo dbus ma gzhag pa'am khar bzhag nas gzhib cing btung ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zla ba'i mdog can gyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun du rtse mo dbus ma las byung bas /
T02TD2512.2E:243b-21: rang gi kha kun du gang nas yan lag thams cad du khyab pas /
T02TD2512.2E:244a-0: des lus thams cad rdo rje sems dpar gyur par @244a * //
T02TD2512.2E:244a-2: de lta bus ni tshe chen po mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:244a-3: de bzhin du de rang gi mtshan mar bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:244a-4: khar 'jog cing btung bar byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:244a-5: de lta bus ni rdo rje sems dpa'i lang tsho mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:244a-6: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:244a-7: rang gi khar bzhag nas btung bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:244a-8: de lta bus ni gzugs thams cad mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:244a-9: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:244a-10: dbral bar bzhag la de'i 'og tu khar bzhag nas rdo rje rtse mo'i dbus ma'i de nyid btung bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:244a-11: de lta bus ni rnal 'byor pa'i gzi byin mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:244a-15: snyan pa 'phel bar bya ba la ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i cha lugs phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni dpal chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:244a-16: de nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems bde ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:244a-17: yid bde ba grub par bya ba'i phyir dngos po thams cad ni bdag nyid can gang yin pa de ni skal ba bzang ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:244a-18: de nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad na rtag tu gnas pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhes phyogs bcur sgras khyab pa gang yin pa de ni grags pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:244a-19: de nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam par 'jug pas rdo rje dbyings thams cad thugs su chud pa'i sems ye shes sems dpa'o zhes snyan pa'i sgras khyab pa gang yin pa de ni snyan pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:244a-21: grags pa la sogs pa 'di dag 'phel ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni zhes snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.2E:244a-22: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:244a-23: dang po'i rdo rje grub pas so //
T02TD2512.2E:244a-25: dang po'i rdo rje ni mdzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag dang /
T02TD2512.2E:244a-26: mthe'u chung gi rdo rje ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:244a-27: de nyid kyi las bzhi po 'di dag mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:244b-0: 'di skad ston te snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la yi ge h'um gis dang po'i rdo rje bcings te @244b mdzub mo gnyis gshibs la rtse mor byas nas bdag nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyal srid kyi dpal dang ldan pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpar sgom zhing aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes bzla bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:244b-1: de lta bus ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' chen po mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:244b-2: de bzhin du thams cad byas la dang po'i rdo rje gung mo gnyis gshibs pa'i rtse mor phyi rol du bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:244b-3: sngar bshad pa'i don bsgoms pas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skal ba bzang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:244b-4: de bzhin du thams cad byas la dang po'i rdo rje srin lag gnyis rtse mor byas pas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i grags pa bsgoms pas grags pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:244b-5: de bzhin du thams cad byas la dang po rdo rje mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs te rtse mor sbyar la bsgreng ste bzhag nas /
T02TD2512.2E:244b-6: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i snyan pa dang ldan par bsams na de lta bus ni snyan pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:244b-8: ye shes dang chos dang las bsgrub par bya ba la ni zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i stobs ni stobs chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:244b-9: de rnams nyid kyi nges pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2512.2E:244b-10: de rnams de nyid kyi yang dag pa'i rig pa bsnyen pa'i chos dang /
T02TD2512.2E:244b-11: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:244b-12: sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i las ni de rnams kyi stobs po che dang /
T02TD2512.2E:244b-14: las de grub pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:244b-16: dang po'i rdo rje snying po stobs che ba'o zhes bya ba gsungs te rang nyid dang /
