T02TD2512.2E:244b-18: lce dang mgo bor bstod pa ni dang po'i rdo rje'i snying stobs che bas so zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:244b-19: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.2E:244b-20: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:244b-21: h'um gis dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:244b-22: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2512.2E:244b-23: des bdag nyid bstod pa'i tshul du byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:244b-24: de lta bus ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i stobs grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:244b-25: rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:245a-0: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ye @245a * //
T02TD2512.2E:245a-1: shes bskyed pa'i bsam pas dang po'i rdo rje rang gi snying gar bstod cing bzlas brjod byas te de lta bus ni de grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:245a-2: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:245a-3: rang gi lce la rdo rje bsams pas yi ge h'um yid kyis bris la dang po'i rdo rje'i rtse bstod pa'i tshul gyis bya zhing bzlas brjod byas te de lta bus ni so so yang dag pa'i rig pa bzhi'i bdag nyid can gyis chos grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:245a-4: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:245a-5: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:245a-6: sems can gyi don bya ba'i bsam pas rang gi rdo re mgo por bstod pa'i tshul du byed cing de bzhin du byas na de lta bus ni las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:245a-10: rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston pa la ni zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba ni rdzu 'phrul thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:245a-11: 'bar ba'i 'byin pa la sogs pas bstod pa ni cho 'phrul lo //
T02TD2512.2E:245a-12: sngon chad ma myong ba'i bde ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:245a-13: yid bde ba bskyed pa ni rmad du byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:245a-14: rang gi lus la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:245a-18: nor bu'i rigs sprul pa ni rnam par 'phrul ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:245a-22: rnam par 'phrul pa de dag thams cad ston pa la ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa nye par dmigs su rung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:245a-24: dang po'i rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:245a-25: dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:245a-27: mthe bong dang srin lag 'bar ba'i tshul du bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:245a-29: rang gi lus la bskor ba'i tshul du bya ba 'di ni dang po'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:245a-31: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la aa h'um gis dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:245a-32: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes zlos shing nam mkhar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'i tshul du byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-0: de lta bus ni phyogs bcur rdo rje sems dpa'i skus bdag @245b nyid 'gro ba ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:245b-1: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-2: dang po'i rdo rje de bzhin du bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-4: srin lag gnyis 'bar ba'i tshul du byas nas de lta bus ni cho 'phrul thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:245b-5: de bzhin du thams cad byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te rang gi snying gar dga' ba bskyed pa'i tshul du bzhag na /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-6: de lta bus ni rmad du byung ba ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:245b-7: de bzhin du thams cad byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-8: rigs lnga bskyed pa'i bsam pas rang gi lus la bskor bar byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-9: de lta bus ni rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:245b-10: thams cad du yi ge dang /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-11: gzugs kyis bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-12: thos pa dang smra ba dang 'dri bar grub par bya ba la ni zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-15: sku gzugs la sogs pa thams cad las mngon par 'dod pa'i don ston par byed pa'i yi ge aa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-16: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis 'das pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-18: da ltar byung ba'i dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes bas mthong ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-19: rna ba'i rnam par shes pas thos pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-20: lces smra ba dang lus kyis 'dri ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-21: 'di rnams grub pa ni rdzogs par snang ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:245b-23: dang po'i rdo rje don yod ba'i bden pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-24: dang po'i rdo rje bcings la thams cad du bskor te dbang po thams cad la gzhag pa ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i bden ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:245b-25: 'di ni skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-26: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-27: yi ge h'um gis dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-28: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes zlos shing thams cad bskor bar h'um las mig gnyis su rdo rje bsams la mig dang gzugs thams cad las bden pa thams cad mthong ba'i bsam pas mig tu gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-29: de lta bus ni thams cad bden pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:245b-30: h'um gis rna ba gnyis su rdo rje gnyis bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:245b-31: de bzhin du bskor nas rna ba gnyis su gzhag par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:246a-1: bus ni thams cad bden pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:246a-2: lce la h'um las rdo rje dkar po bsams la h'um yid kyis bris te /
T02TD2512.2E:246a-3: de lta bus ni thams cad bden pa thob pa smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:246a-4: yi ge h'um las thams cad la yid kyis bris la de bzhin du dang po'i rdo rje bcings te kun du bskor la lus la bzhag na /
T02TD2512.2E:246a-5: de lta bus ni lus kyis thams cad dris pas grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:246a-6: dbang po thams cad kyis bde ba thams cad mthong ba dang thos pa dang sgra ba dang zil gyis gnon par bya ba la zhes bya ba ni dbang po yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na dbang po thams cad de ;
T02TD2512.2E:246a-7: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi dbang po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:246a-8: de rnams kyis bden pa thams cad ston te /
T02TD2512.2E:246a-9: de la mig gi dbang pos thams cad bden par mthong ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:246a-10: rna ba'i dbang pos thams cad bden par thos pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:246a-11: lce'i dbang pos thams cad bden par smra ba dang ;
T02TD2512.2E:246a-12: lus kyi dbang pos zil gyis gnon pa'i lang tsho dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.2E:246a-13: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:246a-14: dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:246a-15: dang po'i rdo rje rtse mo dbus mas dbang po thams cad la reg par bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pas so //
T02TD2512.2E:246a-17: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la yi ge h'um gis dang po'i rdo rje bcings la h'um nyid kyis mig gnyis su rdo rje bsams la aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa' des thams cad bden pa mthong ba'i bsam bas mig gnyis la reg par byas na thams cad bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:246a-18: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:246a-19: h'um las rna ba gnyis su rdo rje bsams la rdo rje dbus ma rna ba gnyis su reg par byas na /
T02TD2512.2E:246a-20: de lta bus ni thams cad thos par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:246a-21: de bzhin du thams cad byas la lce la snga ma bzhin du rdo rje bsams te yid kyis h'um bris la rdo rje dbus ma des lce la rig par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:246a-22: de lta bus ni lce thams cad bden pa smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:246b-0: de bzhin du thams cad byas la lus la h'um las rdo rjer @246b bsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:246b-1: rdo rje dbus ma des rang gi lus la reg par byas la rdo rje sems dpa'i lang tsho dang bdag nyid ldan par bsams na /
T02TD2512.2E:246b-2: de lta bus ni rdo rje sems dpa'i lang tsho dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:246b-6: lan thob par gyur pa la ni zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams cad sbrul ba ni sgyu ma thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:246b-7: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ba ni bde ba'i mchog go //
T02TD2512.2E:246b-8: ma 'ongs ba'i don lung ston pa ni lung bsgo ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:246b-9: yan lag tu ma gyur par rang gi lha dngos la gzhan dag zlos shing ces bstan pa'am /
T02TD2512.2E:246b-10: dngos po gang byed 'dod pa de yongs su dor la gzhan dag gyis shig ces lhas bstan pa gang yin pa de ni lan thos pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:246b-11: 'di rnams kyi grub pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.2E:246b-13: dang po'i rdo rje rmad du byung bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:246b-14: dang po'i rdo rje rang gi las byed pas na dang po'i rdo rje rmad du byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:246b-15: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:246b-16: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la h'um zlos shing dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:246b-17: aa nu ra ga y'a mi h'um zhes zlos shing dang po'i rdo rje rtse mo dbus mas sgyu ma bstan pa'i tshul du byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:246b-18: de lta bus ni sgyu ma thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:246b-19: de nyid kyis bde ba'i mchog thams cad bstan pa'i tshul du byas nas de lta bus ni bde ba'i mchog thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:246b-20: de nyid kyis lung bsgo ba bstan pa'i tshul du byas na lung bsgo ba thams cad bstan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:246b-21: de nyid kyis lan thams cad bstan pa'i tshul du byas na de lta bus ni lan thams cad thob pa ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:246b-25: sa la nye bar longs spyod pa ni zhes bya ba ni gter thams cad ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:246b-26: nor ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:246b-27: de rnams 'phrog pa ni dgug pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:246b-28: rgyal srid ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:247a-0: sa la nye bar longs spyod pa ni khams gsum @247a * //
T02TD2512.2E:247a-1: gyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba thob pas skye bo thams cad bsgo ba nyan cing rang dbang du byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:247a-2: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:247a-3: dang pos rdo rjes dbang bskur bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:247a-4: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:247a-5: de bzhin du 'di'i dngos grub byed pa ni 'di'i mtshan nyid yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:247a-7: h'um gis dang po'i rdo rje bcings la de'i rdo rje dbus ma mdzod spu'i gnas su bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:247a-8: sngar bshad pa'i gter dbyung ba'i sbyor bas aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2512.2E:247a-9: de gter dbyung ba'i tshul du byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:247a-10: de lta bus ni gter thams cad 'byin par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:247a-11: de bzhin du thams cad byas la de nyid dbral ba'i phyogs su gzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:247a-12: des nor 'gugs pa'i tshul du byas la de lta bus ni nor thams cad 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:247a-13: de bzhin du thams cad byas la dbral ba'i phyogs su dbus ma'i rdo rje bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:247a-14: khams kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bsam par bya zhing des dbang bskur ba sbyin pa'i tshul du byas nas de lta bus ni rgyal srid thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:247a-15: de bzhin du thams cad byas la de'i dbus ma'i rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:247a-16: skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rang dbang du byas pa'i tshul gyis bzhag na de lta bus ni sa'i bdag po nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:247a-17: yul thams cad dang skye bo dang grong dang nags dang /
T02TD2512.2E:247a-18: chu'i nye bar longs spyod pa sbrul [*sprul] ba la ni zhes bya ba yul thams cad ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:247a-19: skye bo ni mngon par 'dod pa'i skye bo'o //
T02TD2512.2E:247a-20: grong la sogs pa yang go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:247a-21: de rnams nye bar longs spyod pa ni kun du longs spyod pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:247a-22: de rnam par sbrul pa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:247a-23: de ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:247a-24: dang po'i rdo rje bsgrub pas so //
T02TD2512.2E:247a-26: dang po'i rdo rje ni dbus ma sa la bzhag pa de dag gi tshul du bya ba 'di ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:247a-27: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:247a-28: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la yi ge h'um zlos shing dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-0: @247b de'i dbus ma'i rdo rje sa la bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-1: des yul thams cad sbrul ba'i tshul du bya zhing aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um zhes bzlas brjod byas nas yul thams cad sbrul nas nye bar longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:247b-2: de bzhin du thams cad byas la dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma sa la bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-3: des mngon par 'dod pa'i skye bo sbrul pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-4: de bzhin du bzlas na de lta bus ni skye bo thams cad sbrul par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:247b-5: de bzhin du thams cad byas la dang po'i rdo rje'i rdo rje dbus ma sa la gzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-6: des mngon par 'dod pa'i grong sbrul par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-7: de lta bus ni grong sbrul par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:247b-8: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-9: dang po'i rdo rje'i rdo rje dbus ma sa la gzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-10: 'dis nags dang chu bo sbrul pa'i tshul du bya zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-11: de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na nags dang chu bo la sogs pa sprul par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:247b-12: thams cad la sngon ma byung ba'i yul lha'i yul dang /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-14: g-yog 'khor shin tu bzang po la sogs pa sbrul te nye bar spyod pa la ni thams cad las zhes bya ba ni las la sogs pa'i dngos po tha na las sngon ma byung ba'i lha'i yul dang /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-17: yid bde ba skyed par byed pa'i rig 'dzin lta bu'i bsnyen bkur ba mtha' yas pa dag sprul nas /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-18: de rnams la nye bar longs spyod cing kun du yongs spyod par 'gyur ba de phyag rgya gang gis 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-19: dang po'i rdo rje sprul pas so //
T02TD2512.2E:247b-21: dang po'i rdo rje'i rdo rje dbus ma thams cad du bskor la yid kyis de dag sprul par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-22: 'di ni dang po'i rdo rje sprul pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:247b-24: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-25: de bzhin du dang po'i rdo rje bcings pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:247b-26: sngags zlos shing dang po'i rdo rje'i rdo rje dbus ma sngon ma byung ba'i lha'i yul sprul pa'i bsam pas thams cad bskor bar byas te de lta bus ni lha'i yul sprul par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:247b-27: rin po che mngon par sprul pa'i bsam pas ni lha'i rin po che sprul par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:248a-0: lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang bskur ba bzang po mngon par sprul pa'i bsam @248a * //
T02TD2512.2E:248a-1: bas ni g-yog 'khor shin tu bzang po sprul par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:248a-2: lha'i yul la sogs pa ji ltar sprul pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i bsam pas thams cad du bskor na lha'i longs spyod la sogs pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:248a-3: skad cig gcig gis sa gzhi thams cad las 'bru la sogs pa smin par bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:248a-4: chu'i phung po chen po dbyung ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:248a-5: snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:248a-6: rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.2E:248a-7: de ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:248a-8: dang po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug gis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:248a-9: dang po'i rdo rje rtse mo dbus ma la khro bo 'bar ba'i lta ba g-yo bas mig mi 'dzums par blta zhing las 'di dag sgrub par byed pas na /
T02TD2512.2E:248a-10: 'di ni dang po'i rdo rje dbang phyug go //
T02TD2512.2E:248a-11: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:248a-12: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:248a-13: dang po'i rdo rje'i rdo rje dbus mas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i 'brul sogs pa sa gzhi las bskyed pa'i tshul du bya zhing mig mi 'dzums par bltas na de lta bus ni sbrul par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:248a-14: de nyid kyis chu med pa'i phyogs su chu'i phung po bskyed pa'i tshul du bya zhing mig mi 'dzums par bltas la bzlas brjod byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:248a-15: de lta bus ni chu'i phung po chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:248a-16: de nyid kyis mun par snang ba chen po bskyed pa'i tshul du bya zhing 'bar ba'i lta bas blta bzhin du bzlas brjod byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:248a-17: de lta bus ni mun par snang ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:248a-18: g-yo ba'i lta bas blta zhing 'di nyid kyis lha la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad rang dbang du bya ba'i tshul du byas te de lta bus ni dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:248a-19: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bza' ba dang btung ba dang zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:248a-20: rtser gzhug pa ni dga' zhing rol pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:248a-21: las thams cad la sbyor ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.2E:248a-22: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:248a-23: dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i //
T02TD2512.2E:248a-24: thams cad dbang du byed pas so //
T02TD2512.2E:248a-25: zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje bcings la de'i rdo rje dbus ma las grub pa'i tshul du byas la ldang ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:248a-26: btung ba dang lus bskyod pa'i tshul dang /
T02TD2512.2E:248b-0: mgo @248b bos bka' bsgo ba'i tshul du byas pa 'di ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i thams cad dbang du byas pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:248b-2: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la de bzhin du dang po'i rdo rje bcings nas de'i dbus ma'i rdo rjes srin po la sogs pa za bltar byed cing bzlas brjod byas te de lta bus ni thams cad zos par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:248b-3: de bzhin du thams cad byas la dbus ma'i rdo rjes rgya mtsho chen po btung ba'i tshul du bya zhing bzlas brjod byas nas de lta bus ni thams cad 'thung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:248b-4: de bzhin du thams cad byas la rdo rje dbus ma des gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa dang rtsed mo'i tshul du byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:248b-5: yang dag pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms nas de lta bus ni thams cad rtse bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:248b-6: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:248b-7: dang po'i rdo rje dbus mas lha la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.2E:248b-8: mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad la nges par sbyor ba'i tshul du byed cing rang gi mgo bos lung bsgo ba'i tshul du byed cing bzlas brjod byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:248b-9: de lta bus ni las thams cad la nges par sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:248b-10: dngos po thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:248b-13: rdo rje la sogs pa thams cad mthong ba la ni zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:248b-14: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:248b-15: dang po'i rdo rje bsnyems pas so //
T02TD2512.2E:248b-17: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:248b-18: g-yas pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis dang po'i rdo rje blangs la /
T02TD2512.2E:248b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing thams cad du bskor ba 'di ni dang po'i rdo rje bsnyems pa thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:248b-20: de yang thams cad rjes su dran zhing thams cad du bskor bar bya'o zhes bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:248b-21: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:248b-22: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:248b-23: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:248b-24: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dang po'i rdo rje blangs te /
T02TD2512.2E:248b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran zhing thams cad du bskor bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:249a-0: de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar @249a * //
T02TD2512.2E:249a-2: byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su dran pas ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:249a-3: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad rjes su dran pas ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad mthong ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:249a-4: dang po'i rdo rje la sogs pa mtshan ma thams cad rjes su dran pas ni dang po'i rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:249a-5: rang zhes bya ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD2512.2E:249a-7: bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2512.2E:249a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad ston pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:249a-13: de grub pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:249a-16: du mar ston pa zhes bya ba la rab tu phra ba ni shin tu phra ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:249a-17: rdul phra rab la sogs pa'i tshul lo //
T02TD2512.2E:249a-18: shin tu phra ba de ri rab la sogs pa'i tshul du byin gyis rlob pa ni brtson pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:249a-19: nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa'i gzugs sna tshogs ston pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa ni du ma ste /
T02TD2512.2E:249a-20: 'di thams cad kyis nye bar ston pa dmigs par 'gyur ba ni ston pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:249a-21: 'di dag ni ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:249a-22: dang po'i rdo rje'i gzugs sna tshogs pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:249a-23: dang po'i rdo rje bcings la mthe'u chung dang /
T02TD2512.2E:249a-25: gung mo'i rdo rje bzhi snying gar gzhag par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:249a-26: 'di ni dang po'i rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs can yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:249a-27: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:249a-28: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:249a-29: mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs pa'i rtse mo gung mo gnyis gshibs pa'i rtse mo dang sbyar la snying gar bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:249a-30: bdag nyid kyi lus las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sprul pa bsgrub pa'i bsam bas de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:249a-31: de lta bus de grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:249a-32: mi snang ba'i bsam bas bzlas na mi snang ba grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:249a-33: nam mkha' la 'gro ba bsgom pas ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:249a-34: shin tu phra ba dang sbom po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:249a-35: du mar ston pa bsgom pas ni shin tu phra ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:249b-0: sbom pa dang du mar ston @249b par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:249b-1: khams gsum gyi bdag po thams cad dbab pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:249b-4: las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:249b-5: 'di dag thams cad ni ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:249b-6: dang po'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:249b-7: dang po'i rdo rje bcings la mdzub mo gnyis h'um mdzad dang bcas pa lta bur byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:249b-8: 'di ni dang po'i rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
T02TD2512.2E:249b-10: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:249b-11: mdzub mo gnyis so sor bsgreng ba gyen du bteg ste /
T02TD2512.2E:249b-12: khams gsum pa'i bdag po thams cad dbab pa'i bsam bas 'og tu bsgyel la /
T02TD2512.2E:249b-13: aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um h'um zhes bzlas na de 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:249b-14: de bzhin du zlos shing mdzub mo gnyis po des khams gsum gyi bdag po thams cad dbang du byas pa'i bsam pas sdigs mdzub byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:249b-15: de lta bus ni de 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:249b-16: mdzub mo gnyis po de nyid kyis khams gsum gyi bdag po thams cad bcing ba'i bsam bas ni de rnams rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:249b-17: mdzub mo gnyis po de nyid kyis khams gsum gyi bdag po thams cad la nges par sbyor ba'i bsam bas de la sdigs mdzub byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:249b-18: de lta bus ni de mngon par 'dod pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:249b-19: lha thams cad dbab pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:249b-22: las thams cad la nges par sbyor ba la ni zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:249b-24: dang po'i rdo rje'i lha'i bdag pos zhes bya ba smos te dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje dbral ba'i thad kar mig lta bu'i tshul du byas pa ni dang po lha'i bdag po'i phyag rgya'i bdag po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:249b-26: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:249b-27: de bzhin du dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:249b-28: lha thams cad dbab pa'i bsam bas /
T02TD2512.2E:249b-29: dbus ma'i rdo rjes dbral bar phred du mig gi tshul du byas na 'dir 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:250a-0: de bzhin du lha thams cad bcing ba'i bsam bas mig gi tshul du byas na da lta bus ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing bar 'gyur @250a * //
T02TD2512.2E:250a-2: / de bzhin du lha thams cad dbang du bya ba'i bsam pas mig gi tshul du byas la bzlas brjod byas nas de lta bus ni dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:250a-3: de bzhin du lha thams cad las thams cad la nges par sbyor ba'i bsam pas mig gi tshul du byas la bzlas brjod byas na lha thams cad las thams cad la sbyar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:250a-4: klu thams cad gnod pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:250a-5: 'dul ba dang dbang du bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:250a-6: las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba dang skrag par bya ba la ni zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:250a-8: dang po'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i rdo rjes so zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
T02TD2512.2E:250a-9: dang po'i rdo rje rang gi snying gar bcings la bskyod cing 'dzum pa'i lta bas 'og tu blta zhing ha h'um ho dhri zhes bya ba zlos pa 'di dang po'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i rdo rje'o //
T02TD2512.2E:250a-11: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:250a-12: de bzhin du dang po'i rdo rje rang gi snying gar bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:250a-13: bskyod cing 'dzum pa'i lta bas 'og tu blta zhing aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um ha zhes zlos shing 'od zer 'bar bas kun 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu'i khro bos klu rnams kun du drangs bar bsam bar byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:250a-14: de lta bus ni klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:250a-15: aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing klu la blta bar byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:250a-16: de lta bus ni dgug par 'gyur ba'i klu thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:250a-17: aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um ho zhes bya bas dgug pa'i lta bas bkug par blta zhing bzlas par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:250a-18: de lta bus ni klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:250a-19: de bzhin du bkug pa'i klu la blta zhing las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba'i bsam bas aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um dhri zhes bya ba bzlas par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:250a-20: de lta bus ni klu thams cad las thams cad la sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:250a-21: gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:250a-22: las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:250a-23: skrag par bya ba la ni zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:250a-24: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:250a-25: dang po'i rdo rje gnod 'dul bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:250a-26: sa la gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i gzugs bris la /
T02TD2512.2E:250b-0: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas @250b nas dang po'i rdo rje snga ma bzhin du bcings la gnod sbyin la sogs pa de'i gdong la dbus ma'i rdo rje bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:250b-1: de'i bar ba'i lcags kyus gnod sbyin la sogs pa dgug par bya zhing de bzhin du de rnams la sngar bshad pa'i g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i lta bas bltas na 'gugs par 'gyur ro ;
T02TD2512.2E:250b-2: / dbang du bya ba'i bsam bas bzhag la bzlas na de lta bus ni dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:250b-3: bcing ba'i bsam pas ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gi bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:250b-4: las thams cad la nges par sbyor ba'i bsam pas bzlas na de lta bus ni gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:250b-5: dkyil 'khor thams cad brtag pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:250b-8: sgrub pa la ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag ba ni ras dang /
T02TD2512.2E:250b-10: nam mkha' la sogs pa'i gnas thams cad du sprul ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:250b-11: ji ltar sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid 'jug pa ni 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:250b-12: me tog la sogs pa'i phyi rol gyi yo byad kyi tshul rnams dang rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pas dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa ni mchod pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:250b-13: dkyil 'khor de rnams dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pas rang gi dbang du byas pa ni bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:250b-14: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:250b-15: dang po'i rdo rje 'khor los so //
T02TD2512.2E:250b-17: dang po'i dbus ma'i rdo rje rtse mo thur dus gzhi la gzugs pas ni brtag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:250b-18: kha'i dbus su bzhag pas ni zhugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:250b-19: phyag byas pas ni mchod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:250b-20: snying gar bzhag pas ni bsgrubs par gyur pa 'di ni dang po'i rdo rje 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2512.2E:250b-22: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la h'um gis dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:250b-23: de'i rtse mo dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor sprul ba'i bsam pas aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um zhes zlos shing sa la bzhag na de lta bus ni dkyil 'khor sprul par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:250b-24: khar bzhag ste bzlas nas de lta bus ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:250b-25: de'i rtse mo dbus ma btud de phyag byas na de lta bus ni dkyil 'khor mchod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-1: dbus ma snying gar bzhag ste bzlas na dkyil 'khor bsgrubs bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-2: phyag rgya thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:251a-5: bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-6: de rnams spyan drang ba ni dgug pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-7: de rnams nyid kyi dam tshig gis bcings pas ni bcings pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-8: sgrub pa po'i 'dod pa rdzogs par bya ba la de rnams nyid kyi thugs rtse gcig pa nyid du 'gyur ba ni brtan pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-9: des dbang du bya ba ni sgrub pa po 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:251a-10: dang po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrubs pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:251a-11: dang po'i phyag rgya bcings mod la sor mo thams cad drang ba las yid la bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-12: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:251a-13: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:251a-14: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:251a-15: rigs kyi lha thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /
T02TD2512.2E:251a-16: chos dang las kyi phyag rgya dgug pa'i bsam pas /
T02TD2512.2E:251a-17: rang gi snying gar rdo rje bsdams pa dral ba'i tshul du mos la sor mo thams cad dral bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:251a-18: de lta bus ni phyag rgya thams cad dgug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-19: bcing pa'i bsam pas ni phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-20: phyag rgya thams cad brtan par bya ba'i bsam pas ni phyag rgya thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-21: dam tshig thams cad ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-22: de rnams dgug pa ni spyan drang ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-23: de rnams gzhug pa ni rang gi lus sam ras ris la sogs pa la gzhug pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-24: de rnams nyid bcing ba ni rang gi lus la sogs pa la brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-25: de rnams nyid grub pa ni lus la sogs pa la rang dbang du bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-26: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:251a-27: dang po'i rdo rje dam tshig gi mchog gis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:251a-28: dad po'i rdo rje bcings la dza: h'um bam ho: zhes zlos pa 'di ni dang po'i rdo rje dam tshig gi mchog go //
T02TD2512.2E:251a-30: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:251b-0: ye shes sems dpa' ji lta ba bzhin du spyan drangs la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas @251b ji lta ba bzhin du blta ba byas la dang po'i rdo rje de dza: h'um bam ho: zlos shing rang gi lus la dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:251b-4: las thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:251b-5: rnam par mi 'jig par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:251b-7: grags pa chen po rab tu bsgrags pa ni zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyang yin la las kyang yin pas na las thams cad de /
T02TD2512.2E:251b-8: thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:251b-9: de rnams bsgrub pa ni rang dbang du bya ba rdzogs par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:251b-10: rang dbang du bya ba rnams phyi ma'i mthar thug pa med pa'i bar du brtan par bya ba ni rnam par mi 'jig par bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:251b-11: srog chags dang srog chags ma yin pa rnams kyis mi shigs par bya ba ni brtan par bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:251b-12: thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la sogs pas rnal 'byor ba che ge mo zhig sems can gyi don byed de zhes phyogs bcur sgra grag par 'gyur ba ni grags ba chen po bsgrags pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:251b-13: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:251b-14: dang po'i rdo rje las kyi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:251b-15: dang po'i rdo rje'i dbus ma'i phyi rol gyi spyi bo dang /
T02TD2512.2E:251b-18: phyogs thams cad du bskor ba ni 'di'i mtshan nyid yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:251b-20: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:251b-21: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:251b-22: de'i rtse mo dbus ma phyir bstan te /
T02TD2512.2E:251b-23: spyi bor gzhag par byas te de lta bus ni las thams cad rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:251b-24: snying gar bzhag na las thams cad rnam par mi 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:251b-25: khar bzhag na de lta bus ni las thams cad brtan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:251b-26: phyogs thams cad du bskor na grags pa chen po rab tu sgrogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:251b-27: rdo rje thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:251b-30: dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa ni dang po'i rdo rjes so zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.2E:251b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.2E:251b-32: rdo rje khro bo'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.2E:251b-35: rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma ni rdo rje thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:252a-0: de rnams dgug pa la sog ba ni ji skad bshad @252a * //
T02TD2512.2E:252a-1: ba byed par 'dod pas rang gi snying gar dang po'i rdo rje bcings la rang gi snying gar bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:252a-2: rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje bsgom pa ni dang po'i rdo rje'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2512.2E:252a-4: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:252a-5: aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um /
T02TD2512.2E:252a-6: zhes zlos shing dang po'i rdo rjer bdag nyid bsgom par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:252a-7: de lta bus ni rdo rje thams cad dgug pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:252a-8: sems dpa' chen po thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:252a-11: dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sems dpas so zhes bya ba ni sems dpa' chen po yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na sems dpa' chen po thams cad de /
T02TD2512.2E:252a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams te bskal ba bzang po'i mthar thug pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.2E:252a-13: de rnams dgug pa la sog sa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:252a-14: 'di dag thams cad ni dang po'i rdo rje sems dpar gyur te /
T02TD2512.2E:252a-15: dang po'i rdo rje bcings la rang gi byang chub sems dpa' bsgom pa ni 'di'i mtshan nyid yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:252a-17: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la dang po'i rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:252a-18: aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um zhes zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyid du bsgom par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:252a-19: de lta bus ni de dag thams cad du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:252a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:252a-23: dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.2E:252a-25: dang po'i rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:252a-26: dang po'i rdo rje bcings la rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa ni 'di'i mtshan nyid yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:252a-28: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:252a-29: dang po'i rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du bcings la snga ma bzhin du zlos shing de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dam /
T02TD2512.2E:252a-30: mi bskyod pa la sogs par bdag nyid bsgom par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:252b-0: de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa la @252b sogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:252b-1: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:252b-4: dbang du bya ba la ni zhes bya ba la rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD2512.2E:252b-5: de dgug pa la sogs pa la ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:252b-7: dang po'i rdo rje 'dzin pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:252b-8: dang po'i rdo rje nyid dang po'i rdo rje 'dzin pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:252b-9: rdo rje 'chang chen por rang nyid rjes su dran pa bsgom par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:252b-11: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la h'um gis dang po'i rdo rje bcings la aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um zhes zlos shing rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por bdag nyid bsgom par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:252b-12: de lta bus ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po rnal 'byor pa rang gi lus la dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:252b-16: yang gsungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02TD2512.2E:252b-17: 'di las sgrub pa thams cad la yi ge h'um gis rang gi phyag rgya bcings la aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um zhes bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:252b-18: de ltar phyag rgya bzhi tshoms kyi tshul gyis las brgya bcu gnyis su gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:252b-19: da ni de nas dang po'i snying po ma grub pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya lnga tshoms kyi tshul gyis gar las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya las brgya pa bsgrub pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:252b-20: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag ston pa'i tshig yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:252b-21: gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pas ji skad du bshad pa'i sgrub pas h'um zhes bya ba'i snying pos mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub ma bsgrubs shing rang dbang du ma byas pa de'i tshe ni ma bsgrubs par gyur pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:252b-22: ma bsgrubs pa ni dang po'i snying po yi ge h'um de thams cad de /
T02TD2512.2E:252b-23: lhag ma ma lus pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:252b-25: 'bras bu yod pa yin la de nyid ni thogs pa med pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:252b-26: las kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na las tham cad de /
T02TD2512.2E:252b-27: thams cad shin du bsrung ba la sogs pa las rnam pa brgya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:252b-28: de rnams kyi rab 'byam ni rgyun te /
T02TD2512.2E:252b-29: de skad cig gis bsgrubs pa ni skad cig rang dbang du bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:253a-0: de thams cad rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thams cad kyi sna tshogs phrin las rdo rje 'chang chen pos @253a * //
T02TD2512.2E:253a-1: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:253a-2: don yod ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:253a-3: las kyi rgyun de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:253a-4: dngos grub skad cig gis grub ces gsungs pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:253a-5: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:253a-6: 'di ltar zhes bya ba nye bar ston pa'i tshig yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:253a-7: thams cad shin tu bsrung ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:253a-10: bde legs su bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:253a-11: tshe mngon par 'phel ba la ni zhes bya ba ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po lhag par bsrung ba ni thams cad shin tu bsrung ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:253a-12: rgyal srid la sogs pa'i longs spyod yongs su 'phel bar bya ba ni sems can yongs su bskyang ba yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:253a-13: bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:253a-14: dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:253a-15: yams dang nye bar 'tshe ba zhi bar bya ba ni zhi ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:253a-16: 'di dag nyid ma skyes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir zhi ba'i las gang zhig byed pa de ni bde legs so //
T02TD2512.2E:253a-17: tshe srung bar byed pa ni tshe mngon par 'phel ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:253a-18: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:253a-19: rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyis so zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:253a-20: rdo rje gar las byung pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgyas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:253a-21: de nas 'di'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:253a-22: rdo rje sku'i mchog gi gtsug tor gyi las dang /
T02TD2512.2E:253a-23: rdo rje bsdams pa btsir ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:253a-24: dbus ma'i nor bu bskor ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:253a-25: sor mo thams cad kyi rdo rje dang sor mo lhag ma rnams kyi 'od kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD2512.2E:253a-27: snga ma bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la rdo rje thal mo'i mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs te rtse mor byas nas g-yon pa'i mthe bo'i steng du g-yas pa'i mthe bong sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi tshul du bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje sku'i mchog go //
T02TD2512.2E:253a-28: 'di spyi gtsug tu bzhag la btsir zhing bsgrub par bya ba'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gtsug tor dang ldan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi rang bzhin du bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:253a-29: de lta bus ni thams cad shin tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:253a-30: phyag rgya de nyid kyi gung mo sor mo dbus ma gnyis kyis rgyab tu bkug la /
T02TD2512.2E:253b-0: @253b nor bur byas pa bsgrub par bya ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad dbang bskur ba thob pa las rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i rgyal srid la rab tu gzhag par bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:253b-1: de lta bus ni thams cad yong sus bskyang par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:253b-2: gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya de gnyis bskor la bsgrub par bya ba yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i bdud rtsi'i phra rab kyis yongs su bkang la rdo rje sems dpar byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:253b-3: de lta bus ni zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:253b-4: gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya nyid kyis mthe bong gnyis gzhibs te rtse mor byas pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:253b-5: mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dang /
T02TD2512.2E:253b-6: gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dang /
T02TD2512.2E:253b-7: srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mo dang /
T02TD2512.2E:253b-8: mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mor byas la bsgrub par byas pa'i dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:253b-9: nad la sogs pa zil gyis mnan la rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:253b-10: de lta bus ni bde legs su byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:253b-11: gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya de nyid bcings la ;
T02TD2512.2E:253b-12: srin lag dang mthe'u chung rdo rje thal mo kha phye ba bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:253b-13: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor byas la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis bsgrub par bya ba kun bkang la /
T02TD2512.2E:253b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' gyur nas rga shi med par bsams nas tshe mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:253b-20: bsrung ba la ni zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor thams cad bcing pa ni ra ba'i 'og gi cha rdo rjer bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:253b-21: mtshams bcing ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'i sa'i cha kun nas rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:253b-22: phyogs bcing ba ni lha'i khang pa nang du bcug par byas nas phyogs bcur rdo rje'i me 'bar bar bskyed de /
T02TD2512.2E:253b-23: 'di dag gis dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.2E:253b-25: phyogs bcing bas bsrung ba ni dkyil 'khor gzhan dag tu yang bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:253b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2512.2E:253b-27: phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin nam dkyil 'khor ni dam tshig chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:253b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub ni rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:253b-29: las lnga po 'di dag ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:254a-0: rdo rje chen po'i gar gyis so sor 'brang bas so zhes bya ba @254a * //
T02TD2512.2E:254a-2: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis kyis phyogs kyi tshogs g-yas nas yongs su bskor ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:254a-4: snying gar zhugs na 'bar ba'i rnam par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:254a-5: dam tshig la ni bam zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:254a-6: grub pa la yang bam brjod par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:254a-9: de zhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis kyis phyogs kyi tshogs g-yas nas bskor ba'i tshul du byas nas dkyil 'khor bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:254a-10: de nyid khar bskor la des mtshams bcing ba'i tshul du byas te ;
T02TD2512.2E:254a-11: 'di lta bus ni mtshams bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:254a-12: de nyid rang gi snying gar bzhugs par byas la rang gi snying ga las rdo rje 'bar bas phyung la des phyogs bcing bar bya zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:254a-13: phyag rgyas phyogs bcing ba'i tshul du byas nas 'dis phyogs bcing bar 'gyur te phyogs thams cad du me 'bar ba'i rab [*re ba?] byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:254a-14: khro bo chen po 'bar ba'i rdo rje bkod par yang mi 'jug go zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:254a-15: yi ge bam dang khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis po de gnyis kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dam tshig la rab tu gzhag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:254a-16: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis po de nyid dang bam zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub na /
T02TD2512.2E:254a-17: de lta bus ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub sgrub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:254a-18: nyin gsum pa dang nyin bzhi pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:254a-19: slar zlos pa dang rtag pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:254a-20: khyab 'jug gi rims thams cad ces bya ba ni sman dpyad kyi gtsug lag las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:254a-21: bsal ba la ni zhes bya ba ni de rnams nad pa'i rgyud las nges par bsal ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:254a-23: rdo rje gar gyis rims nad dang bral bas so zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:254a-25: sems ma'i rdo rje lta bas bsal bas nyin gsum pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:254a-28: rtag pa'i rig ma sel to //
T02TD2512.2E:254a-29: tshad med par bskor bas ni dmigs 'byed mi nus pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:254a-31: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor pa byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:254a-32: rdo rje dbus ma'i gung mo gnyis bsgreng ste /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-0: myu gur @254b byas pa'i sems ma rdo rje ma bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-1: des rim gyis gzung bar bya zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-2: byams pa'i lta bas kyang bsal la /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-3: bcom ldan 'das gtsug 'phyang gis kyang nad pa'i lus kyis phyi bo nas brtsams te rkang mthil gyi bar du kun du gang bar bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-4: de lta bus ni nyin gsum pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-7: rtag pa'i rims dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:254b-8: khyab 'jug gi rims ni dpag tu med par khyab cing bskor bas bral bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:254b-9: ltung ba ni sems kyi sdug bsngal lo //
T02TD2512.2E:254b-10: gnod pa ni gcong chen po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:254b-11: nad ni skya rbab la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:254b-12: mya ngan ni 'jig rten du grags par zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:254b-13: lus kyis gnod pa myong ba la sogs pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
T02TD2512.2E:254b-14: 'di dag rnam par gzhag pa ni med par bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:254b-16: rdo rje gar gyi sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bas so zhes bya bas gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:254b-17: des na 'di'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gnyis lcags kyur sprel la btud de /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-18: mdzub mo gzhibs pa'i rtse mos las kyi dus su snying gar gzhag par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-19: mdzub mo'i rtse mo btsir ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-20: khar gzhug pa dang bzlog ste /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-21: mdzod spu'i gnas su gzhag pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:254b-22: 'di dag gis ni don 'di skad ston te /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-23: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-24: mthe'u chung gnyis lcags kyur byas la phan tshun sbrel ba bcings pa la mdzub mo gnyis gzhi bas pa rtse mor byas nas rang dang gzhan gyi snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-25: sngags zlos shing rdo rje sems dpas bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la kun du bkang nas bde ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-26: yid bde ba thams cad dang ldan par bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-27: de lta bus ni ltung ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:254b-28: de bzhin du thams cad byas la phyag rgya de nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba la bya ba par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gis kyang de bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba'i lus khyab par gyur par bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:254b-30: de lta bus ni gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:254b-31: de bzhin du thams cad bya la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mos nad pa btsir bar bya zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-1: gtsug 'phyang gis kyang nad ba'i lus la khyab par gyur par bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-2: de lta bus nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:255a-3: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-4: phyag rgya de nyid bkod pa'i tshul gyis khar bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-5: yid kyis bsgrub par bya zhing nad pa'i lus dang lhan cig tu byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-6: de lta bus ni bsgrub par bya ba rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba ngang yid bde ba thob nas mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:255a-7: de bzhin du thams cad byas la phyag rgya de nyid yongs su bzlog ste /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-8: mdzod spur bzhag ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya ba khyab par bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-9: de lta bus ni sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:255a-10: dug dang sbyar ba'i dug thams cad nye bar sbyar ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-14: bdud rtsir bya ba la ni zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:255a-15: 'di dag thams cad gang gis bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-16: rdo rje gar gyi nye ba'i dug gis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-17: de la 'di'i mtshan nyid 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-18: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe chung gnyis sprel te /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-19: ba dan gsum pa rdo rje mgu ba'i tshul gyis nye bar bskul ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-25: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-26: dug dang sbyar ba'i dug thams cad kyi 'og tu /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-27: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor //
T02TD2512.2E:255a-28: de'i steng du yi ge h'um 'od zer 'bar ba kun du 'khrugs pa bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-29: lag pa gnyis kyis ba dan gsum pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-30: mthe'u chung gnyis kyis shin tu mgu ba'i tshul gyis byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-31: des kyang rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis sbar pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor h'um dang bcas pas dug gam sbyar ba'i dug shing skam po bzhin nye bar 'bar bar bsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:255a-32: de lta bus ni dug dang sbyar ba'i dug thams cad nye bar 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:255a-33: mthe'u chung gnyis po de yid kyis bsdu ba'i tshul du byas pas ni dug dang sbyar ba'i dug thams cad bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:255b-0: de bzhin du mthe'u chung gnyis kyis bsnun pa'i tshul du byas pa ni dug dang sbyar ba'i dug @255b thams cad dbang po'i gdu bus bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:255b-1: lce la h'um las rdo rje dkar po bsams la de la yi ge h'um zla ba'i mdog can gyi 'od zer 'bar ba bsams la ba dan gsum pa gnyis kyi snyim pas dug dang sbyar ba'i dug thams cad bsal ba'i tshul du bya zhing dug kyang sbyar ba'i dug bza' bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:255b-2: yi ge bam las sbyar ba'i dug gi steng du chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi sten du yi ge h'um las zla ba'i 'od zer rnam par 'gro ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-3: yi ge h'um gis dug dang sbyar ba'i dug bdud rtsir byas par bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-4: ba dan gsum pa'i lag pa gnyis kyis snyim pa byas pa btung ba'i tshul du byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-5: de lta bus ni bdud rtsir byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:255b-6: gdon thams cad dbab pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-8: dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-9: rab tu 'dul ba dang bsrung ba la ni zhes bya ba go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:255b-11: rdo rje gar gyi gdon las thar bas so //
T02TD2512.2E:255b-12: de la 'di'i mtshan nyid 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-13: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis pa bkug la mthe bong gnyis bsgrengs nas phye ste /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-14: mche bar bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-15: des lag mthil dal bus brdab pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-16: mdzub mo'i sor mo btsir ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-17: gung mo'i rdo rje bsdams pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-18: byab cing phyag rgya myur du dgrol ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-19: sor mo lhag ma rdo rje gtsug tor du bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:255b-20: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-21: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-22: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-23: mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa nang du bcug ste /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-24: mthe bong gnyis kha phye la bye ba'i tshul gyis rang gi khar bzhag nas rdor je gnod sbyin du bdag nyid bsams na lag mthil gnyis dal gyis brdab cing gdon gyis zin pa'i snying gar yang rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin rang bzhin du drag pa 'od zer 'bar ba kun du 'khrugs pa yid kyis bcug na des gnod sbyin gyis bzung ba'i lus la gnas pa'i gdon shing skam po ltar 'bar zhing sreg par bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:255b-25: de lta bus ni 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:256a-0: phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis mdzub mo 'di nyid kyi sen @256a * //
T02TD2512.2E:256a-1: mo phan tshun btsir ba'i tshul du byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-2: de lta bus ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gis gdon bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:256a-3: phyag rgya 'di nyid gung mo gnyis rtse mo sbyar la bstan na thams cad du gdon dam tshig 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:256a-4: de bzhin du rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-5: gdon lus las bsal ba'i bsam pas gdon 'byung ba'i tshul du byas nas myur du bkrol na de lta bus ni gdon thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-6: gdon las thar to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:256a-7: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya de gnyis kyis mdzub mo dang /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-8: mthe bong gi gdong sbyar la phyag rgya de bsgrub par bya ba'i spyi gtsug tu gzhag par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-9: de lta bus ni bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:256a-10: gdon bsal nas bsgrub par bya ba phyag rgya 'dis bsrung bar bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:256a-15: bslang ba la ni zhes bya ba ni go bar sla'o //
T02TD2512.2E:256a-16: de dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-17: rdo rje gar gyi khro bo chen pos so //
T02TD2512.2E:256a-20: ba dan gsum pa gnyis bkan te /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-21: mdzub mo khas sbub pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-22: gung mo mdud par bcings la gung mo dang mdzub mo gdong sbyar ba de dang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis las bya ba ni mdud pa btsir ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-23: phyag rgya mod la dgrol ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-24: btsir te se gol gtogs pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-25: gung mos brdeb [?] cing dong du ltung bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-26: bslang ba'i gung tshul du bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:256a-28: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-29: ba dan gsum pa gnyis pa gnyis bkan te bzhag nas de nas de khas sbub la /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-30: gung mo gnyis mdud pa byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-31: mdzub mo gnyis dang gung mo gnyis gdong sprad de phyag rgya btsir zhing h'um bzlas nas bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-32: h'um zhes bzlas na thams cad bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:256a-34: lcags sgrog la sogs pa bcings pa'i steng du 'bar ba'i rdo rje dbab par yid kyis bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:256a-35: de lta bus ni bcings pa kun las grol bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:256b-0: de nyid zlos shing phyag rgya btsir la 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa gzhig pa'i bsam pas rdo rje 'bar ba @256b de la yid kyis dbab par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-1: de rnam par bshig na de lta bus thams cad dral bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:256b-2: de phyag rgya de nyid bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-3: gung mo gnyis rtse mo sbyar nas rtse mo des lha la sogs pa lhung bar bya ba'i bsam bas h'um bzlas la nam mkha' la bsnun na /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-4: de lta bus ni thams cad dong du ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:256b-5: yang gung mo gnyis snga ma bzhin du bcings te 'dis blang ba'i tshul du byed cing yi ge h'um bzlas par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-6: de lta bus ni lhung ba thams cad las bslang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:256b-7: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-8: gdon las thar par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-11: shin tu bsrung pa la ni zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:256b-12: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-13: rdo rje gar gyi lan gyi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:256b-14: ba dan gsum pa gnyis mnyam por byas la mdzub mo dang mthe chung rdo rjer byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-15: gung mo mdud la bzlog ste /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-17: khar bzhag la h'um gis gzhig pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-18: mus gdon las thar bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-19: aa zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'jig ba las bslang ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-20: h'um gi glus tshe mngon par 'phel pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-21: yi ge h'um gi chos kyi tshig gis shin tu bsrung pa ni 'di'i mtshan nyid yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:256b-22: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-23: snga ma bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la yi ge h'um las ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis dpal he ru kar bdag nyid bskyed la ba dan gsum pa gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-24: gung mo'i sor mo gnyis mdud pa'i tshul du bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-26: mthe chung gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis byas la bzlog ste /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-27: mdzub mo gnyis kyi gdong mdzod spu'i gnas su bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-28: yi ge h'um zlos shing mkha' 'gro ma'am //
T02TD2512.2E:256b-29: phra men mas zin pa'i lus la dpal he ra ka 'khor dang bcas pa yid kyis bcug la des mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya thams cad zos par bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:256b-30: de lta bus ni mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya thams cad gzhag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:257a-0: gal te mkha' 'gro ma rnams phyag rgya bcings pas gnod par byed par 'gyur na de'i tshe de'i phyag rgya'i steng du h'um gis rdo rje @257a * //
T02TD2512.2E:257a-2: de lta bus kyang mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:257a-3: phyag rgya 'di nyid bcings la mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon las thar bar bya ba'i bsam pas mu zhes bya ba bzlos shing bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka yang bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la zhugs nas gdon rnams nges par 'byin par bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:257a-4: de lta bus ni gdon las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:257a-5: phyag rgya 'di nyid bcings la mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis bsad pa'i lus la /
T02TD2512.2E:257a-6: dpal he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa'i ye ge aa zlos shing yid kyis bcug la rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyus mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon las snying bkug la bcings pa'i lus la bcug la /
T02TD2512.2E:257a-8: des bde zhing slar 'tsho bar 'gyur par bsams par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:257a-9: de lta bus ni 'chi ba bslang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:257a-10: phyag rgya de nyid bcings la h'um gis glu zlos shing bsgrub par bya ba'i snying dar dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i zla ba'i mdog can gyi mgo la bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs par bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:257a-11: de lta bus ni tshe 'di mngon par 'phel par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:257a-12: de bzhin du phyag rgya de bcings la chos kyi tshig gis yi ge ham zlos shing /
T02TD2512.2E:257a-13: bsgrub par bya ba'i rdo rje'i go chas rdo rjer bya bar bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:257a-14: de lta bus ni shin tu bsrung par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:257a-15: sgrub pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.2E:257a-16: srin po la sogs pa'i gdon gyis nye ba ni sdig pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:257a-19: byur ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:257a-20: byur la sogs pa 'di dag gzhig pa ni zhi ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:257a-22: rdo rje gar gyi zhi bas so zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:257a-23: padma chen po bcings la ji srid 'dod par bzlas pa'am yang na padma'i khu tshur g-yon pa bstan te /
T02TD2512.2E:257a-28: 'byung khung gi phye ma'i spyin sreg bya ba ni 'di'i mtshan nyid yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:257a-29: de la rdo rje thal mo khong stong du byas pa las mdzub mo dang /
T02TD2512.2E:257a-30: gung mo dang mthe bong dang /
T02TD2512.2E:257a-31: mthe'u chung dang mthe ba mo'i 'dab ma bzhir bya ba ni padma chen po'i mtshan nyid yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:257b-0: padma'i khu tshur gyi @257b mtshan nyid kyang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor las 'og nas bshad pa las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:257b-1: 'di skad ces ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-2: de snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyan drangs la /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-3: yang dag par mchod de phyag byas nas de'i 'og tu padma chen po bcings te 'od zer 'bar bas kun du 'khrugs pa /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-4: 'phro ba rnams par 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rang bzhin ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi spyan sngar 'dug pa la /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-5: aom ni ra war na sarba dha rma t'a badzra dha ri ni ham /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-6: zhes zlos shing padma chen po'i phyag rgyas sgrib pa thams cad blangs la bsreg par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:257b-7: de lta bus ni sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:257b-8: aom ro dzo bi ga ta sarba dha rm'a badzra dha ri ni ham /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-9: zhes bya bas sdig pa thams cad blangs la bsreg par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:257b-10: de lta bus ni sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:257b-11: aom sva pon pa ma sarba dharm'a: pra ti be da badzra dha ri ni ham /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-12: zhes bya bas rmi lam dan pa blangs la bsreg par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:257b-13: de lta bus ni rmi lam dang ngan pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:257b-14: aom ni rni mi tta sarba dharm'a dzny'a na badzra dha ri ni ham /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-15: zhes bya bas ltas ngan pa thams cad blangs la bsreg par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:257b-16: de lta bus ni ltas ngan pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:257b-17: aom sva bh'a wa pra bha sva ra sarba dharm'a badzra dha ri ni ham /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-18: zhes bya bas byur thams cad blangs la bsreg par byas na de lta dus ni byur thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:257b-19: yang na padma can gyi khu tshur gyis phyi'i spyin sreg byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-21: las thams cad pa'i thab khung du bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du spyan drangs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-22: g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur dang /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-23: g-yas pa padma'i khu tshur gyis dgad gzar dang blugs gzar blangs te /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-24: aom ni ra war na sarba dharma t'a badzra dha ri ni ham /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-25: zhes mar gyi spyin sreg byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-26: de lta bus ni sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:257b-27: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:257b-28: aom ro dzo bo ga ta sarba dharm'a badzra dha ri ni ham zhes zlos shing til mar gyi spyin sreg byas de lta bus ni sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro//
T02TD2512.2E:258a-0: @258a * // de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-1: aom svapon pa ma sarba dharm'a: pra ti be da badzra dha ri ni ham /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-2: zhes zlos shing til gyi spyin sreg byas na rmi lam ngan pa rnams 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:258a-3: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-4: aom ni rni mi tta sarba dharm'a dzny'a na badzra dha ri ni ham /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-5: zhes bya bas 'bras kyi spyin sreg byas na de lta bus ni ltas ngan pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-6: de bzhin du thams cad byas la aom sva dh'a ba pra bha sva ra sarba dharm'a dha ri ni ham /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-7: zhes bya bas gser khams kyi phye ma'i spyin sreg byas na nges ni byur rnams 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:258a-10: gar byed du gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-11: thams cad dbang par smrar gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-12: pra se na thams cad bsgrub par yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:258a-13: de dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-14: rdo rje gar ma'i 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni thams cad dbab pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-16: gar byed du gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-17: thams cad bden par smrar gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-18: pra se na thams cad sgrub pa la ni zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:258a-19: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-20: rdo rje gar gyi 'bebs ba'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:258a-21: de la 'di'i mtshan nyid ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-22: ba dan gsum pa'i rdo rje gnyis bcings la dga' ba'i tshul gyis sen mos rol mo byed pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-23: rdo rje bcings pa steng dang 'og tu bskyod pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-24: rdo rje bsdams pa'i tha ma la sogs pa nas grol bar gar bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-25: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis kha nas dbyung ba lta bu dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-26: bde ba chen po don yod pa'i dam tshig gi lcags kyus dngos po thams cad la rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba rnams gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyis gsal bar bstan pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-27: sgra snyan gyi tshul gyis sems can dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258a-28: bdag nyid kyis thams cad bde bar gsal bar thob pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:258a-30: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la ba dan gsum pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje bsdams ba bcings la dga' ba'i tshul gyis mthe bong dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-0: mdzub mo'i sen mos rol mo byed cing bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje @258b sems dpa' rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa 'bar ba'i 'od zer kun du 'khrugs pas bsgrub par bya ba kun du gang par 'gyur par bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-1: de lta bus ni thams cad 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:258b-2: ba dan gsum pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje bsdams pa bsgrub par bya ba bskyod pa'i bsam pas steng dang 'og tu bskul par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-3: de lta bus ni thams cad bskul bar byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-4: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-5: yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-6: lhan cig gcig tu byas te ba dan gsum pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin can rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-7: tha ma la sogs pa nas grol ba'i tshul gyis gar byas nas de lta bus ni thams cad gar byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:258b-8: de bzhin du thams cad byas la yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-9: lhan cig gcig tu byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-10: ba dan gsum pa gnyis kyis rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-12: rtse mor byas nas tshig 'byung ba'i tshul gyis kha'i phyogs nas gyen du bteg na dbab par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:258b-13: gsang ba'i lcags kyus bcings la dngos po thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du byung bar du byung bar bsgom nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dngos po thams cad la bkug na de rang nyid kyis ma thong zhing gzhan rnams la yang ston par 'gyur pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-14: brag ca dang 'dra ba'i sbyor bas ni sgra thams cad rang gis thos pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-15: gzhan gyis thos par byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:258b-16: thams cad rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-20: slar gso ba don yod par grub pa la ni zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.2E:258b-21: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-22: rdo rje gar gyi mkha' 'gro ma chen pos so zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:258b-23: de nas 'di'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-24: rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la rdo rje lta bas las bya ba ni 'di lta ste mig mi 'dzums par blta ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-25: mig 'bras gyen du bzlog pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:258b-26: myur du btsums te bsgyel ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:259a-1: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:259a-2: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:259a-3: yi ge h'um las rdo rje ltar 'bar par bdag nyid bsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:259a-4: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings sgrub par bya ba la mig mi 'dzums par blta zhing bsgrub par bya ba'i snying gar rdo rje 'bar ba bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:259a-5: de lta bus ni thams cad rgyas btab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:259a-6: mig gyen du bsgul la yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la zhugs la bsgrub par bya ba'i srog blangs nas gyen du 'phur bar byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:259a-7: de lta bus ni thams cad gsod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:259a-8: bsgrub par bya ba ltung bar bya ba'i bsam pas mig 'dzums la myur du ltung bar byas pas ni thams cad ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:259a-9: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis po de nyid kyis bslang pa'i tshul du bya zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:259a-10: lta bas bslang ba ni thams cad bslang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:259a-11: blta ba de nyid dang khor bo'i lta bas byas na thams cad slar sos par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:259a-12: thams cad rengs par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:259a-14: gnyid log par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:259a-16: bza' par bya ba la ni zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.2E:259a-17: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:259a-18: rdo rje gar gyi gdug pa'i srin pos so zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:259a-19: de nas 'di'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:259a-20: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis bzlog nas mche bar bya zhing mthe chung sor byas pas gzung zhing mche ba gtsigs pas 'jigs su rung ba'i khas mi 'gul ba nyid dang /
T02TD2512.2E:259a-21: yan lag thams cad lhod pa dang gnyid yur zhing gal la ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:259a-25: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la rdo rje gnod sbyin du bdag nyid bsams la mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu gnyis byas nas kha 'gram gnyis su mche ba'i tshul du bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:259a-26: mthe'u chung gnyis 'jigs su rung ba'i khas bsgrub par bya ba len pa'i bsam pas sos 'dzin par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:259b-0: de @259b lta bus ni thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:259b-1: de bzhin du thams cad byas la yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:259b-2: gcig tu gyur par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:259b-3: phyag rgya 'di nyid bcings la bsgrub par bya ba rmongs par bya ba'i bsams pas yan lag thams cad lhod par gyur par byas na de lta bus ni thams cad rmongs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:259b-4: de nyid bcings la bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:259b-5: gcig tu gyur par bsams la mig btsums te glal bar byas na de lta bus ni thams cad gnyid log par bya bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:259b-6: bsgrub par bya ba gzhig pa'i bsam pas snying gar phyag rgya gzhig par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:259b-7: de lta bus ni thams cad gsod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:259b-8: bsgrub par bya ba bza' ba'i bsam pas myur du ldan pa'i tshul byas na de lta bus ni thams cad za par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:259b-9: gzhan gyi dpung thams cad skrag par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:259b-12: gsad pa la ni zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:259b-14: rdo rje gar gyi gshed byed kyis so //
T02TD2512.2E:259b-15: de nas 'di'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:259b-16: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la kha gdangs pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:259b-17: gdong 'jigs su rung ba skra gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD2512.2E:259b-18: mgo thur du 'dud cing 'degs pas las bya'o zhes bya bas rdo rje khu tshur 'phen pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:259b-20: yi ge h'um gis mgo pos sdigs mdzub byed pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:259b-21: rang nyid khro zhing myur du bsgyel ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:259b-23: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:259b-24: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sprul pa bsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:259b-25: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas rnal 'byor ba kha gdangs shing skra gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD2512.2E:259b-26: mgo po'i 'og nas bstod de bhyo zhes zlos shing rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs tshad med pas gzhan gyi dpung mchog tu skrag par byas par bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:259b-27: de lta bus ni gzhan gyi dpung thams cad skrag bar byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:260a-0: de bzhin du rdo rje gnod sbyin du bdag nyid bsams la gzhan gyi dpung gzhig cing gzhom pa'i bsams pas de'i thad kar 'phang @260a * //
T02TD2512.2E:260a-1: zhing rdo rje 'bar ba'i phra rab gzhan gyi dpung gi steng du 'bebs par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-2: de lta bus ni gzhan gyi dpung thams cad bcom par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:260a-3: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje gnod sbyin du bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-4: rdo rje tshur gnyis bcing zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-5: gzhan gyi dpung khro bo'i rdo rje gnyis kyi bar du btsir bar gyur par bsams na /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-6: de lta bus ni rang dbang du byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:260a-7: snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid bsams la h'um dang mgo bos sdigs mdzub byas shing gzhan gyi dpung gi steng du rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi lus chen po ltung bar bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-8: de lta bus ni gzhan gyi lus thams cad lhung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:260a-9: de bzhin du rdo rje gnod sbyin du bdag nyid bsam la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-10: khro bo chen po zil gyis gnon par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-11: gzhan gyi dpung gsad pa'i bsam pas shin tu myur du lhung bar bya zhing ;
T02TD2512.2E:260a-12: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin yang rdo rje 'od zer 'bar ba rab kun du 'khrug pas gzhan gyi dpung gi steng du phab pas gzhan gyi dpung thal par gyur par bsams par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-13: de lta bus ni gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gsod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:260a-14: khro ba thams cad bsal ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-15: bzhin ras dang bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-16: rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-17: 'jigs pa thams cad las thar ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-18: g-yul 'gyed pa las rgyal ba grub pa la ni zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:260a-19: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-20: rdo rje gar gyi rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyi rtse mo zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:260a-21: de nas 'di'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-22: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi srin lag dang mthe chung gnyis mnyam por phye ste /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-23: ba dan bya ba ni rgyal mtshan mchog gi rtse mo ste /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-24: las ni rab tu 'dud pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-27: phrag pa gnyis bsnyems pa ston pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:260a-30: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la rdo rje gnod sbyin du bdag nyid bsams nas rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:260b-0: mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas bar yod par gnas par byas la mthe bong gnyis @260b phye ste /
T02TD2512.2E:260b-1: bsgrengs la mche ba byas pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:260b-2: 'di nyid kyi srin lag dang mthe chung gnyis phye ste /
T02TD2512.2E:260b-3: ba dan lta bur bya ba'i ni rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan te /
T02TD2512.2E:260b-4: 'di bcings la bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:260b-5: lhan cig gcig tu byas la bsgrub par bya ba rab tu 'dud ba'i bsam pas phyag byas nas de lta bus khor ba thams cad bsal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:260b-6: de nyid bcings la bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:260b-8: 'dzum pa byas nas bzhin ras dang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:260b-9: 'di nyid bcings la lce bstod de bskyod pas ni rtsod pa las rgyal ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:260b-10: de nyid bcings pas phyag pa gnyis bsnyems pa bstod pa'i tshul du byas la de lta bus ni 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:260b-11: de nyid bcings la lag ngar gnyis brkyang ste spyi bor bzhag la phyag rgya bcings pa de las dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po phyung ste /
T02TD2512.2E:260b-12: des gzhan gyi dpung bcom par bsams na de lta bus ni g-yul 'gyed pa las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:260b-13: sprin thams cad yang dag par bzung zhing mi g-yo bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:260b-14: char chen po dbab pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:260b-21: grang ba bsal bas ni zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.2E:260b-22: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:260b-23: rdo rje gar gyi dbang pos rdo rjes so zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:260b-24: de las dpal 'di dag gi mtshan nyid 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:260b-25: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug la rdo rje gsor zhing las bya ba ni nam mkhar dbugs gtong ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:260b-26: thams cad du bskyod cing g-yo ba'i lta pas char dbab pa'i tshul dang /
T02TD2512.2E:260b-27: khro bo rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i bzlas pas char gcad pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:260b-28: grang bas yan lag 'dar ba'i tshur dang thams cad du 'bar ba'i rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:260b-30: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-0: lag pa g-yas pas dang po'i rdo rje gsor la nam mkhar dbugs gtong zhing zlas brjod byas nas rang gi dbugs kyi rdo rje rang gi dkyil @261a * //
T02TD2512.2E:261a-1: 'khor gyis kyang sprin mi 'gul bar byas par bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-2: de lta bus ni sprin thams cad yang dag par gzung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:261a-3: de bzhin du rdo rje gsor te thams cad du bskyod cing 'dzum pa'i bsam pa'i lta bas char dbab pa'i tshul du byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-4: de lta bus ni char 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:261a-5: de bzhin du rdo rje gsor zhing rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bdag nyid bsams la h'um zlos shing khro bo'i lta bas rlung dang /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-9: sprin bsal bas ni de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:261a-10: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la rdo rje gsor zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-11: grang ba dang rlung chen po bsgoms pas yan lag grang bas 'dar tshul du byas na /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-12: de lta bus ni tsha ba thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:261a-13: de bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bdag nyid bsams la rdo rje gsor zhing thams cad du me 'bar ba bskyed pa'i tshul du byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-14: de lta bus ni grang ba bsal zhing 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:261a-19: reg bya rnams shin tu grub pa ni rtag par grub pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:261a-21: rdo rje gar gyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-22: de nas 'di'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-23: rdo rje bsdams pa'i rdo rje spyan dang /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-24: rdo rje bsams pa'i mdzub mo g-yon pa'i rtse mo bkug la yu bar byas pa la mdzub mo g-yas pas rdo rje pi wang brdung ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-25: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthil gnyis mnye ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-26: thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba'i dbus su lce bcug pa la rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'o //
T02TD2512.2E:261a-27: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-28: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-29: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te g-yas pa'i mdzub mos g-yon pa'i gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa bzung la /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-30: g-yon pa'i mdzub mos g-yas pa'i gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa bzung ste /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-31: mthe bong gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis gdong sprad par bya ba 'di ni rdo rje spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:261a-32: 'di bcings la byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-0: de lta bus ni rdo rje gzugs kyi dngos grub brtan pa @261b thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:261b-1: de bzhin du thams cad byas la rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub ma g-yon pa bkug pa'i yu ba mdzub mo g-yas pas brdung ba'i phyag rgya 'di bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-2: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sgrar bdag nyid bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-3: de lta bus ni rdo rje sgra'i dngos grub rtag par thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:261b-4: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje drir bdag nyid bsgom zhing rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la lag mthil gnyis phan tshun mnye bar byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-5: de lta bus ni rdo rje dri byang chub sems dpa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:261b-6: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba byas la byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje ror bdag nyid bsams la rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-7: thal mo khong stong gi dbus su lce chud par byas te //
T02TD2512.2E:261b-8: de lta bus ni byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ro shin tu grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:261b-9: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
