T02TD2512.2E:261b-10: rdo rje k'i li k'i lar bdag nyid bsams la lnga po bsdus pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-11: aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um zhes bzla bar byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-12: de lta bus ni rdo rje k'i li k'i la'i reg shin tu grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:261b-13: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rjes su chags pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-15: dbang du byas la rtse ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-16: las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.2E:261b-17: 'di dag thams cad cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-18: rdo rje gar gyis thams cad grub pas so zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:261b-19: de nas 'di'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-20: bde ba chen po rdo rje mchod pa'i las dang dang po'i glu'i bzlas brjod ci 'dod par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-21: shin tu bsdus pa'i 'dzum pas dgod pa dang rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu rang gi ma mchu'i nang sos bzung ba dang rang gi dbang po g-yo ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-22: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gis yid la 'dod pa'i lung bsgo ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-23: des kyang 'da' bar mdzad par mi spyod na /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-24: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba gzhan dag gis lta smos ci dgos /
T02TD2512.2E:261b-25: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-0: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje @262a * //
T02TD2512.2E:262a-1: sems dpa'i sbyor pa byas la rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin rang gi ngo bor bsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-2: gar dang h'um gi glu'i bzlas brjod byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-3: de lta bus ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rjes su chags par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:262a-4: de bzhin du gar dang rdo rje'i lcags kyus nges par bsdus pa'i mdzub mo dang bod pa'i tshul gyis yi ge h'um gi glus bzlas brjod byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-5: de lta bus ni dngos po thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:262a-6: de bzhin du thams cad byas la gar byed cing bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-7: mchu sprad pa'i bsam pas ma mchu'i nang rol sos bzung bar byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-8: de lta bus ni thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:262a-9: de bzhin du thams cad byas la rang gi dbang po g-yo ba'i tshul gyis yi ge h'um gi glu zlos shing bsgrub par bya ba'i gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa dang lhan cig yang dag spyang bar bsgom par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-10: de lta bus ni thams cad dang rtse bar 'gyur ro /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-11: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-12: gar byed cing rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dngos po thams cad la yid la mngon par 'dod pa'i lung bsgo ba'i bsam pas h'um gi glu'i bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-13: de lta bus ni thams cad las la nges par sbyar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:262a-14: lha thams cad dbab pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-15: klu thams cad dbang du bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-18: ma mo thams cad las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-19: rdo rje gar gyi sku'i mchog gis so zhes bya ba ni de la rdo rje gar gyi sku'i mchog 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-20: rdo rje thal mo'am mthe bong gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du byas la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-21: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' sku'i mchog ste 'di gzung bar skad cig gis bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing byin gyis brlab par mdzad pa'i phyir gzung ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:262a-23: sgrub par 'gyur zhing dngos grub thams cad la yang sgrub pa'i thabs su dgongs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:262a-24: spyi bor bzhag nas steng nas yongs su dbab par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:262b-0: sa la bzhag nas khro gnyer gyis gdeg pa @262b dang ;
T02TD2512.2E:262b-1: gnod sbyin gyi gzugs brnyan byas nas de'i snying gar bzhag na mngag bzhugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:262b-2: dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su khros pas bzla ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:262b-3: ma mo'i gnas su bcings te bhyo zhes bya ba dang sbyar nas ma mo thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:262b-4: rtse ba la sogs pa'i bsgo ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:262b-6: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la rdo rje thal mo bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:262b-7: mthe bong g-yon pa'i steng du mthe bo g-yas pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi tshul du bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:262b-8: mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs te sor mo sbyar ba 'di ni /
T02TD2512.2E:262b-9: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i mchog ces bya ba ni phyag rgya 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:262b-10: 'di bcings la spyi bor bzhag nas steng gi phyogs nas lha thams cad dbab pa'i bsam pas g-yas logs nas thur du 'bab par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:262b-11: de lta bus ni lha thams cad dbab par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:262b-12: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas rdo rje sku'i mchog bcings te sa la bzhag na klu thams cad dbang du bya ba'i bsam pas khro gnyer bsdus la bteg na klu thams cad dbang du byed do //
T02TD2512.2E:262b-13: de bzhin du thams cad byas la gnod sbyin gyi gzugs brnyan bris te /
T02TD2512.2E:262b-14: rdo rje sku'i mchog de'i snying gar gzhag par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:262b-15: de lta bus ni mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:262b-16: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:262b-17: dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su khros pa'i sku'i mchog bcings la bzlas brjod byas na 'byung po thams cad mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:262b-18: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:262b-19: bdag nyid dpal he ru ka'i skur bsams la rdo rje sku'i mchog bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:262b-20: bhyo zhes bya ba bzlas nas ma mo thams cad g-yog mor 'gyur zhing rtse zhing rol pa la sogs pa'i bsgo ba'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:262b-21: rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:262b-22: lha'i bu mo thams cad dbrog pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:262b-23: lha dang lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad rtse ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:262b-24: 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa las rgyal ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:263a-0: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thams cad dbrog pa la ni @263a * //
T02TD2512.2E:263a-1: rdo rje gar gyi skyes bu byed pa chen pos so zhes bya ba la de nas de'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:263a-2: rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya khro ba dang bcas pa'i bzhin gyi 'dzum gyis las bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:263a-3: 'di lta ste lus ngan pa rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te /
T02TD2512.2E:263a-4: bsgrub pa dang gzhon nu ma'i mdun du sgrub bcing 'bar ba'i mig sbyor ba bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:263a-5: 'bag bris la blta zhing bsgrub pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:263a-6: dbang phyug chen pos rkang pa g-yon pas mnan la h'um mdzad du sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:263a-7: aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um h'um zhes bya bas 'dod pa'i dbang nga phyug rdo rje'i mdas bsad la kha spub tu bzhag ste rdo rje gser bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:263a-8: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:263a-9: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bdag nyid bsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:263a-10: de'i phyag rgya chen po des rdo rje 'bar ba gsor zhing khro ba dang bcas pas mdzub pa'i bzhin gyis lus ngan po'i gzugs brnyan rkang pa g-yon pas mnan la bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:263a-11: de lta bus ni dpal drang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:263a-12: de bzhin du thams cad byas la gzhon nu ma'i mdun du lha'i bu mo thams cad 'phrog pa'i bsam pas rdo rje 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug cing bzlas na de lta bus ni lha'i bu mo thams cad 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:263a-13: rtsig pa la sogs pa la bud med kyi gzugs bris la gnod sbyin ma la sogs pa lha dang lha ma yin ma yin pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med der bcug la yang dag par sbyor ba bsgom zhing de la blta bzhin du bzlas na de lta bus ni bud med thams cad dang rtse bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:263a-14: de bzhin du rdo rje gsor zhing dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs brnyan rkang ba g-yon pas mnan la /
T02TD2512.2E:263a-15: aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um h'um zhes bya ba bzlas pa byas na de lta bus ni 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:263a-16: rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan la bsnun la de nas de kha spub tu bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:263a-17: rdo rje gsor zhing bzlas par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:263a-18: de lta bus ni dbang phyug chen po thams cad 'phrog bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:263a-19: mchod pa thams cad grub pa dang//
T02TD2512.2E:263b-0: @263b zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags rdo rje la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad de /
T02TD2512.2E:263b-1: de rnams kyis bsgrub pa skyed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:263b-2: thams cad rdo rjer bya ba dang //
T02TD2512.2E:263b-3: zhes bya ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyis mi phyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:263b-4: bdud la sogs pa gdug pa thams cad ni gzhan la gnod par byed par nye bar zhugs pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.2E:263b-5: de rnams rab tu gzhom pa ni shin tu 'dul ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:263b-6: phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad nges par bcings pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:263b-7: dngos grub kyi mchog la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi rgyun ni de'i las kyi rab 'byam ste /
T02TD2512.2E:263b-8: de myur du bsgrub par bya ba la ni rdzogs par bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:263b-9: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar grub par 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:263b-10: rdo rje gar gyi don yod pa'i thogs pa med pa la myur ba'i las sna tshogs kyi dngos grub dam pas so zhes gsungs so/ ;
T02TD2512.2E:263b-11: / de nas 'di'i mtshan nyid ni bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:263b-12: rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams ni bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:263b-13: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis go cha'i rnam par spyad la spyi bor dbang bskur ba gnyis bzhag la dos gnyis su phreng ba gnyis kyi rnam par byas la de bzhin du dar dpyangs bcings pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:263b-14: g-yon du rdo rje mda' 'phang ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:263b-18: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:263b-19: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:263b-20: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa mchod pa bcu gnyis bskyed la de rnams kyis dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa yid kyis mchod par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:263b-21: de lta bus ni thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:263b-22: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la rdo rje khu tshur bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:263b-27: de nas nu ma'i bar dang /
T02TD2512.2E:263b-30: ltag par de nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas su mdud pa'i tshul gyis go cha bgo ba byas la spyi bo dang dbang bskur ba'i gnas su mdud pa bya ba'i tshul dang /
T02TD2512.2E:264a-1: mgo bo'i logs su mdud pa'i tshul du byas la dar dpyangs bcings pa'i tshul du byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:264a-2: 'dis ni thams cad rdo rjer byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:264a-3: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyi go cha thams cad byas la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te ;
T02TD2512.2E:264a-4: g-yon logs su mda' 'phang ba'i tshul du bya zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:264a-5: rdo rje mdas kyang gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed par bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:264a-6: de lta bus ni bdud la sogs pa'i gdug pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:264a-7: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya rdo rje bsnyems pa bcings nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ma lus bar bcing bar bsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:264a-8: de lta bus ni phyag rgya thams cad nges par 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:264a-9: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:264a-10: 'dis ni dngos grub dam pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa yid la mngon par 'dod pa grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:264a-11: gar las byung ba'i phyag rgya brgya phrag gnyis pa 'di rdzogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:264a-12: las nyis brgya sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya yi ge h'um zlos shing bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:264a-13: aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um zhes zlos shing las la nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:264a-14: de ltar las nyis brgya bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:264a-15: phyag rgya nyis brgya'i mtshan nyid gsungs nas da ni phyag rgya chen po bcing ba de rnams kyi snying po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:264a-16: bzlas pa'i snying po gsungs pa ni de nas phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do zhes bya ba yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:264a-17: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gnas skabs so //
T02TD2512.2E:264a-18: phyag rgya yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na phyag rgya thams cad de //
T02TD2512.2E:264a-19: ji skad du bshad pa'i las thams cad sgrub par byed pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.2E:264a-20: de rnams kyi sgrub pa ni rang dbang du bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:264a-21: de'i cho ga ni yi ge h'um bzlas nas las thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyi bcing ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:264a-22: de'i rgyas pa ni de'i rgyun no //
T02TD2512.2E:264a-23: nyin re zhes bya ba ni nyin zhag re re zhing ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-0: dang por zhes bya ba ni las rnams @264b kyi thog mar ro //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-1: lan cig ces bya ba ni lan cig gcig go //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-2: phyag rgya chen po rab grub bya //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-3: zhes bya ba ni rjes su mnyes par byed pa la sogs pa grub par byed pa'i ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po de bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-4: gang gis de bsgrub par bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:264b-5: lan cig bzlas pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:264b-6: lan cig bzlas pa des so //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-7: de nas ci zhig lan cig bzlas she na /
T02TD2512.2E:264b-8: snying po mchog ces bya ba la gsungs te snying po bzang po ni snying po mchog ste /
T02TD2512.2E:264b-10: snying po mchog mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub stsol bar byed pa'i phyag rgya de la lan cig mngon par bsngags shing lan cig bzlas pa'i snying po mchog gis phyag rgya chen po rab tu bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-11: rgyu ci zhig gi phyir zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:264b-13: phyag rgya thams cad sgrub byed //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-15: ji skad du bshad pa'i las sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya de rnams ni shin tu bsgrub pa yin pas na /
T02TD2512.2E:264b-16: phyag rgya thams cad rab grub byed //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-18: gang gi phyir h'um gi gzugs can 'di ni snying po yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-19: de bas na las thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya la h'um zlos shing bcing bar bya'o /
T02TD2512.2E:264b-20: de yi rjes la nyi snying po //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-21: las rnams kun la nges sbyor bas //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-22: zhes bya ba ni de ltar yi ge h'um lan cig bzlas la /
T02TD2512.2E:264b-23: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub par byed pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2512.2E:264b-24: de'i rjes la aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um zhes bya ba nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa'i h'um bzlas par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:264b-25: de lta bus ni rjes su mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa las kyi dngos grub thams cad la nges par sbyor bar byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-26: de ltar byas pas ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:264b-27: don yod grub pas las rnams ni //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-28: kun la shin tu grub par 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-30: don yod par grub par 'gyur bas phyag rgya'i las kun la zhes pa rjes su mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa thams cad shin tu zhes bya ba lhag par grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-31: phyag rgya thams cad bdag byin brlab //
T02TD2512.2E:264b-32: ces bya ba las thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams ni phyag rgya rnams ni phyag rgya thams cad de /
T02TD2512.2E:265a-1: legs par byin gyis rlob pa ni phyag rgya thams cad rab tu byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:265a-2: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku dang /
T02TD2512.2E:265a-4: thugs rdo rje'i nus pa gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la grub pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:265a-5: de'i don gyis phyag rgya ni ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:265a-6: phyag rgya rdo rje zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di'o //
T02TD2512.2E:265a-7: ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:265a-8: phyag rgya thams cad mchog tu byin gyis rlob pa'i don de nyid du'o //
T02TD2512.2E:265a-11: dkyil 'khor dag kyang ma mthong ba'am /
T02TD2512.2E:265a-12: ma bshad pa la'ang rab grub 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:265a-14: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa la ma bshad pa yang ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid du grub par 'gyur ru zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:265a-15: rtog pa 'dir ni zhes bya ba rgyud 'dis ro //
T02TD2512.2E:265a-16: 'jigs pa yod mi ne zhes bya ba ni dam tshig las nyams pa med pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:265a-17: phyag rgya sbyin pa ni rjes su mnyes pa la sogs pa'i las sgrub par phyag rgya'i che ba nyid bstan par 'dod par bya ba'i phyir gdul bya rnams la rab tu ston par bshad cing 'khor lo med pas te /
T02TD2512.2E:265a-18: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la'o //
T02TD2512.2E:265a-19: ci'i phyir 'khor lo med pa rnams la phyag rgya bstan na rtog pa 'di la 'jigs shing nyams pa med ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:265a-20: gang gi phyir bdag la byin gyis rlob pas /
T02TD2512.2E:265a-21: rang sras rgyur ni 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2512.2E:265a-23: gang gi phyir dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa de rnams kyis kyang phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:265a-24: bzlas na 'di skad bshad pa'i bdag la byin gyis brlabs pas /
T02TD2512.2E:265a-25: de bzhin du gshegs pa nyid kyi sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyi bag chags bskyed par 'gyur ro /
T02TD2512.2E:265a-26: bsam pa shes nas sbyin par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:265a-27: zhes bya ba phyag rgya'i yul la gdul bya rnams kyi sems dang ba nyid du shes na phyag rgya sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:265a-29: sdig pa chen po byed pa'ang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:265a-30: mtshams med pa'i las ni sdig pa chen po ste /
T02TD2512.2E:265a-31: gang gis de byas pa de ni sdig pa chen po byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:265b-0: sdig pa chen po byed pa de rnams @265b la 'dra zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gzhan dag la ni shin tu 'ang sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:265b-1: ji lta bu zhe na zhes ston to //
T02TD2512.2E:265b-2: de lta bu la ni snying po byin yang dgos pa ci 'ang med do zhes gzhan dag rtogs na /
T02TD2512.2E:265b-3: de'i phyir 'di dag bcings pa tsam gyis de dag ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:265b-4: ji skad du bshad pa'i las grub pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag sdig pa chen po byed pa rnams kyis kyang bcings pa tsam gyis sdig pa chen po byed pa'i sems can de ni de dag rnam par sbyong bar byed cing gtsang ba dang dag par byed pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:265b-5: gang gi phyir sdig pa byed pas kyang /
T02TD2512.2E:265b-6: 'di'i bcings pa tsam gyis dag par byed pa des byin zhing stsal na /
T02TD2512.2E:265b-7: dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas na dgos pa yod pa nyid yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:265b-8: mchog dang po zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.2E:265b-9: rtogs pa yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na rtog pa chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:265b-10: de nyid rtog pa thams cad las mchog tu gyur pas mdzad shing 'bar bas na rgyal po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:265b-11: de'i bde ba chen po ni thar pa chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:265b-12: de nyid ni mi phyed pas na rdo rje lta bu yin pas na rdo rje'o //
T02TD2512.2E:265b-13: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad bskyed pa nyid kyis 'bras bu dang bcas pas na de nyid don yod pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:265b-14: de'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid ni dam tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:265b-15: de'i cho ga rgyas pa ni sgrub pa dang bsgrub par bya ba'i rgyun ni de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rtog pa las byung ba'i phyir rtog pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:265b-16: dpal mchog dang po'o rgya cher bshad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dum bu gnyis pa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD2512.2E:265b-17: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.2E:265b-19: // / de ltar 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags spang bar bya ba'i phyir dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:265b-20: da ni rang bzhin bzang ba'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtog pa gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:265b-21: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2512.2E:265b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:266a-1: ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:266a-2: dang po'i sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-3: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa nyid gzung ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-4: ston pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams kyi don mdzad cing /
T02TD2512.2E:266a-5: ston pas rang gi bka' bsgo ba la des par sbyor bar mdzad pas na ston pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-6: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-7: 'byin pa ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i sbrul [*sprul] pa mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-8: byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ngo bor mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-9: bde ba che zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-10: bde ba chen po rab brtan phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-12: rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa thob pa'i sems can rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i brtan pa'i don to //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-13: sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-14: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum par gtogs pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du rtogs pa ni sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:266a-15: sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-16: ci zhig mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs sbrul par mdzad ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:266a-17: kun gyi bdag nyid la zhugs te //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-19: thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni kun gyi bdag nyid de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-20: de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-21: kun gyi bdag nyid der zhugs pa ni zhugs par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-22: rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par bzung ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:266a-23: de nyid rab tu zhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-24: kun gyi bdag nyid kyi khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:266a-25: khams gsum dang mnyam zad pa med //
T02TD2512.2E:266a-27: nam mkha'i khams thams cad na rtag tu gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i khams ni thams cad kun no //
T02TD2512.2E:266b-0: khams de dag @266b thams cad mnyam zhing mtshungs pas na khams kun dang mnyam mo //
T02TD2512.2E:266b-1: de nyid kyis mi zad pa yin pas na /
T02TD2512.2E:266b-2: khams kun dang mnyam zad pa med //
T02TD2512.2E:266b-4: khams kun dang mnyam pa yang yin la zad pa med pa yang yin pas /
T02TD2512.2E:266b-5: khams kun dang mnyam zad ba med //
T02TD2512.2E:266b-7: khams kun dang mnyam zhing zad pa med pa'i rnam par snang mdzad de la zhugs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:266b-8: kun gyi bdag nyid de mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa med par spro zhing khyab par mdzad pa yang dag par grub pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:266b-10: ma nyams par grub pa mi 'byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:266b-11: de yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la khyab cing bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang lhan cig tu gyur to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:266b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs phyung ngo zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de bskyed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:266b-13: zhing ni thams cad mtha' yas pa //
T02TD2512.2E:266b-14: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang 'dra bar mtha' yas shing rgya che ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:266b-15: de nyid ni 'jig rten thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:266b-16: khams bcas pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rnams nyid nas sa 'og dang sa bla dang lha yul gyi rang bzhin can /
T02TD2512.2E:266b-17: mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gsum po gang yin pa ni 'jig rten thams cad de ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtha' yas pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pas na /
T02TD2512.2E:266b-18: 'jig rten thams cad dang khams thams cad ces bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:266b-19: de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD2512.2E:266b-20: til gyi gong bu bzhin du gang //
T02TD2512.2E:266b-22: zhing khams thams cad dang ji skad du bshad pa'i 'jig rten thams cad khams dang bcas pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed par bya bas na /
T02TD2512.2E:266b-23: dper na til gyi gong bul til gyi sa bon gyis bar mtshams med par yongs su gang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i zhing thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.2E:267a-1: 'jig rten thams cad rnam par snad mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dus de'i tshe myur zhing rengs par yongs su gang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:267a-2: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na //
T02TD2512.2E:267a-3: sems can kun mdun yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD2512.2E:267a-4: zhes bya ba 'di na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa yongs su gang ba mdzad pa ni sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:267a-5: sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la re re'i yang mdun na bzhugs par snang bas /
T02TD2512.2E:267a-6: sems can kun mdun yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD2512.2E:267a-8: ci zhig gi don du zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:267a-9: sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:267a-11: sems can yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na sems can thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:267a-12: de rnam par dag pa ni bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon sum du byas pas nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas pa'i dri ma dang bral ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:267a-13: de'i don du sems can thams cad kyi mdun na bzhugs so //
T02TD2512.2E:267a-14: sems can de dag thams cad de rnams bzhugs pas yang dag par 'gyur ram mi 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:267a-15: rang gi las kyis dag ma gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:267a-17: dam pa'i chos spong ba la sogs pa'i rang gi las la 'jug pa gang yin pas sems can de dag thams cad dag par mi 'gyur zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:267a-18: sangs rgyas nyid mngon sum du byas par ma gyur to //
T02TD2512.2E:267a-19: de'i tshe ni de'i dus na'o //
T02TD2512.2E:267a-20: de rnams ni 'dus par mdzad de ;
T02TD2512.2E:267a-21: sems can thams cad kyi mdun du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:267a-22: sems can gyi khams gso dka' ba nyid yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:267a-23: rang bzhin gyis zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2512.2E:267a-24: rang gi ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin te /
T02TD2512.2E:267a-25: dam pa'i chos spong ba la sogs pa la 'jug pa'i las kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi snod du ma gyur pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:267a-26: sems can gyi khams rnams rang bzhin gyis gso dka' ba des na /
T02TD2512.2E:267a-27: rang gi las ni spyang ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:267a-28: btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa yin //
T02TD2512.2E:267b-0: rang gi yang yin la las kyang yin @267b bas rang gi las te /
T02TD2512.2E:267b-1: sems can de rnams kyi dam pa'i chos spong ba la sogs pa'i las rnams so //
T02TD2512.2E:267b-2: sbyang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni skal ba med pa'i sems can de rnams kyi /
T02TD2512.2E:267b-3: sdig pa bsal ba'i don spyang ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.2E:267b-4: don de'i phyir sangs rgyas de dag thams cad btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:267b-5: skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i sems can de rnams spyang ba'i phyir re zhig 'bad pa mi mdzad kyi /
T02TD2512.2E:267b-6: dus gzhan gyi tshe smin par bya ba'i sgo nas sems can gyi khams spyang bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:267b-7: ji skad du bshad pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su spyang ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:267b-8: gang gi tshe mdun na bzhugs par gyur pas sems can gyi khams rnams so //
T02TD2512.2E:267b-9: rnam par sbyong bar mdzad par mi spyod par gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2512.2E:267b-10: sems can gyi khams skal ba med pa na 'bad pa ni 'bras bu med par mkhyen na /
T02TD2512.2E:267b-11: sangs rgyas de thams cad sems can thams cad spyang ba'i don du 'bad pa btang nas bzhugs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:267b-12: de nas zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.2E:267b-13: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:267b-14: sems dpa' chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2512.2E:267b-15: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.2E:267b-16: skad cig gis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:267b-17: skad cig ma gcig gis so //
T02TD2512.2E:267b-18: yang dag bskul zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad la sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i phyir yang dag par bskul bar gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:267b-19: rdo rje can rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:267b-20: byang chub chen por thugs brtan pas //
T02TD2512.2E:267b-22: byang chub kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas byang chub chen po ste /
T02TD2512.2E:267b-23: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:267b-24: de'i rang bzhin yin pas na brtan zhing mi phyed pa'i thugs 'di la yod pas na byang chub chen por thugs brtan pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:267b-25: de lta bu'i rdo rje can gyis sangs rgyas thams cad skad cig gis yang dag par bskul bar gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:268a-1: ltar yang dag pa bskul zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:268a-2: sems can kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:268a-3: sems can kyang yin la kun kyang yin pas sems can kun no //
T02TD2512.2E:268a-4: de rnams la phan pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bde ba'i las so //
T02TD2512.2E:268a-5: de nyid ni bsod nams te /
T02TD2512.2E:268a-6: gtsang zhing dag par byed pas na bsod nams so //
T02TD2512.2E:268a-8: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:268a-9: byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi sems ni byang chub sems so //
T02TD2512.2E:268a-10: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni bdag nyid yin par ston to //
T02TD2512.2E:268a-11: ci zhig tu rung ba zhig gam 'on te ma yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:268a-12: brtan pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:268a-13: de bzhin nyid kyi rdo rje mi shigs pa ni bdag nyid ston to //
T02TD2512.2E:268a-14: shin tu btang snyoms ma mdzad cig / ces bya ba ni gang gi phyir sems can kun la phan pa'i bsod nams byang chub kyi sems brtan zhing mi phyed pa dag yin pa des na sems can thams cad spyang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das btang snyoms ma mdzad cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:268a-15: khyed rnams kyis btang snyoms mdzad na sems can rnams ngan 'gror 'gro bas sems can gyi khams brgyud par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:268a-16: de ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sangs rgyas thams cad sems can gyi don gyi phyir yang dag par bskul bar gyur pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:268a-17: de rnams sems can gyi don gyi thabs ston cig ces sangs rgyas rnams kyis de skad du gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:268a-18: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag ston pa'i tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:268a-19: sangs rgyas kyis zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis so //
T02TD2512.2E:268a-21: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02TD2512.2E:268a-23: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni sku gsung thugs so //
T02TD2512.2E:268a-24: de 'di la mnga' bas na sku gsung thugs rdo rje can te /
T02TD2512.2E:268a-25: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dang ldan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:268a-26: ji ltar gsungs shing ci zhig gsungs she na /
T02TD2512.2E:268a-27: khyed ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:268a-28: byang chub sems zhes bya ba ni byang chub gyi mtshan nyid can gyi sems so //
T02TD2512.2E:268a-29: bdag ci zhig yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:268a-30: thabs zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:268b-0: @268b yid la mngon par 'dod cing bsam pa'i don bde bas thob par byed pas na thabs zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:268b-1: gang gi thabs yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:268b-2: snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyi zhes ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:268b-3: mi dmigs pa'i thugs rdo rje chen po'i rang bzhin can sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:268b-4: khyed ces bya ba ni khyed nyid yin te gzhan ma yin pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:268b-6: gang gi phyir khyed ni dmigs su med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin can gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can rnam par spyang ba'i thabs yin la /
T02TD2512.2E:268b-7: de bas na sems can rnam par sbyong ba'i thabs khyed kyis smros shig ces de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:268b-8: 'di ltar sems can gyi don gyi phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis rdo rje 'chang la gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:268b-9: de mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:268b-10: de nas ston pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:268b-11: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.2E:268b-12: ston pa rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.2E:268b-13: de tshe kun nas byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2512.2E:268b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khams gsum pa thams cad kun nas khyab par byin gyis brlabs pas na /
T02TD2512.2E:268b-16: kun nas byin gyis brlabs pa ste de mdzad par gyur pas na /
T02TD2512.2E:268b-17: kun nas byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:268b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i dus su de ltar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:268b-19: ci zhig kun nas byin gyis brlabs she na /
T02TD2512.2E:268b-20: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2512.2E:268b-21: bde ba chen po rdo rje zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2512.2E:268b-22: de las skyes pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:268b-23: de nyid kyis na dam pa ste mchog go //
T02TD2512.2E:268b-24: de'i tshad ji tsam zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:268b-25: khams gsum 'khor lo'i rgya khyon gyi //
T02TD2512.2E:268b-28: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams ni khams gsum gyi 'khor lo'o //
T02TD2512.2E:268b-29: des khyab pa'i dang tshul 'di la yod pas na /
T02TD2512.2E:268b-30: khams gsum gyi ni rgya khyon zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:269a-1: yin pa chen po yang yin las na 'khor lo chen po ste /
T02TD2512.2E:269a-2: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.2E:269a-3: khams gsum 'khor lo'i rgya khyon yang yin la 'khor lo chen po yang yin pas na khams gsum pa'i rgya khyon gyi 'khor lo chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:269a-4: gdod nas byung zhes bya ba ni da ltar byung ba'i tshul gyis rtag tu bzhugs pas na gdod ma nas byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:269a-5: de yis khams gsum la gnas pa'i sems can rnams rab tu bsgrub ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:269a-6: khams gsum gyi 'khor lo'i rgya khyon can gyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor des /
T02TD2512.2E:269a-10: khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bskal pa ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la mngon par 'dod cing brtson par rab tu bsgrubs te /
T02TD2512.2E:269a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la sogs pa la rab tu gzhag pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:269a-12: de cho dag pa grub par 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:269a-13: zhes bya ba ni de nas dus de'i tshe ste bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa dang po'i tshe'o //
T02TD2512.2E:269a-14: sems can skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas pa dang bral bas dag pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:269a-15: khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob pas grub pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:269a-16: sangs rgyas kun sogs dngos grub pa la /
T02TD2512.2E:269a-17: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyang yin la kun kyang yin pas na sangs rgyas kun te /
T02TD2512.2E:269a-18: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o /
T02TD2512.2E:269a-19: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni sangs rgyas kun sogs dngos grub ste //
T02TD2512.2E:269a-20: sangs rgyas byang chub thob pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:269a-21: de la sogs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas rdo rje sems dpa'i bar gyi rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kun sogs dngos grub ste /
T02TD2512.2E:269a-22: sangs rgyas kun sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi yul de la'o //
T02TD2512.2E:269a-23: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2512.2E:269a-24: sku dang gsung dang thugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa des 'dus pa mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:269b-0: 'dus pa mdzad nas rdo rje sems @269b dpa' la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ston par mdzad pa'i phyir gsol ba btab pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:269b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs chen po //
T02TD2512.2E:269b-3: sangs rgyas kun mchog bshad du gsol //
T02TD2512.2E:269b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te /
T02TD2512.2E:269b-5: de yang nam mkha' thams cad khyab pas na chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:269b-6: sangs rgyas kun ni ji skad du bshad pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.2E:269b-7: de rnams kyi mchog yin pas na sangs rgyas kun mchog ste /
T02TD2512.2E:269b-8: byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis sku'i gsang ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las dam par gyur pas na mchog ste /
T02TD2512.2E:269b-9: gang gi phyir de rnams sems de dang rjes su 'brel pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:269b-10: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2512.2E:269b-11: zhes bya ba ni gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'dus nas byon pa de thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs la yang dag bzhugs pas na /
T02TD2512.2E:269b-12: sku gsung thugs la yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD2512.2E:269b-14: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las //
T02TD2512.2E:269b-15: yang dag spros nas 'di gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:269b-16: zhes bya ba ni de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la zhugs te /
T02TD2512.2E:269b-17: de nas 'di gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.2E:269b-18: ci zhig mdzad nas she na /
T02TD2512.2E:269b-19: yang dag par spros nas zhes bya ba gsungs pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:269b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la chu dang 'o ma ltar gcig tu gyur pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i mnyam pa'i spro ba de mdzad pa ni yang dag par mnyam par spro ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:269b-21: 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba aom bhu kham zhes bya ba bka' stsal pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:269b-22: de nas 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.2E:269b-23: bdud rnams bcom pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gdan la bzhugs te /
T02TD2512.2E:269b-24: bdud bcom par mdzad pa de bzhin du /
T02TD2512.2E:270a-0: de'i tshe 'dul bar mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad @270a * //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-1: kyis bdud bcom bar mdzad cing khams gsum pa der byang chub kyi snying por byin gyis brlabs shing brtan par mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-2: sogs pa'i sgras ni dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:270a-3: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:270a-4: log par spyod pa'i sems can 'dul ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:270a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa rnams 'dul ba la bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-6: de la mi bskyod pa'i tshul gyis ni bdud rab tu bcom pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-7: rin chen 'byung ldan gyis ni dbang bskur ba thob pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-8: 'od dpag tu med pa'i tshul gyis ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-9: don yod par grub pa'i tshul gyis ni log par spyod pa'i sems can rnams 'dul ba yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-10: rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshul gyis ni sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-12: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-13: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:270a-14: byang chub snying por byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-15: zhes bya ba'i bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-16: de nas bsdu ba nas brtsams te gsungs pa yin pas shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-17: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:270a-18: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-19: dkyil 'khor mchog ni bka' stsal pa //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.2E:270a-21: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-22: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ston pa'i tshig ste /
T02TD2512.2E:270a-23: las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-24: rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-25: rtog pa kun gyi bde ba che //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-26: zhes bya ba rtog pa yang yin la kun kyang yin pas na rtog pa kun te /
T02TD2512.2E:270a-27: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i tshul lo //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-28: de rnams kyi bde ba chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste /
T02TD2512.2E:270a-29: de thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2512.2E:270a-30: de'i rgyu mthun pa las byung bas /
T02TD2512.2E:270a-32: rtog pa kun gyi bde ba che //
T02TD2512.2E:270a-34: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2512.2E:270b-0: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu gang gi @270b phyir ro //
T02TD2512.2E:270b-1: yang dag par rab tu phye sta bshad pas na yang dag rab bshad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:270b-2: dkyil 'khor chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2512.2E:270b-3: sku'i gsang ba gtsor gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul bas na dkyil 'khor gzhan las mchog tu gyur pas na dam pa yin zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:270b-4: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:270b-5: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas nye bar bzung ste rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor chen po 'di ji srid mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:270b-6: de nas de'i rjes thogs nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong pa'i skal ba med pa'i sems can rnams skal ba dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor yang dag par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:270b-7: dbyibs ji lta bur bri bar bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:270b-8: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:270b-9: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bshad ma thag pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir phyi'i dkyil 'khor yin la /
T02TD2512.2E:270b-10: de'i mchog gang yin pa de ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi'i mchog ces bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:270b-11: der ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:270b-12: rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri //
T02TD2512.2E:270b-14: rdo rje 'khor lo zlum po la rdo rje phreng ba'i tshul dang ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzad par byas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje 'khor lo ste yang dag par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:270b-15: 'khor lo'i lte ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar dkyil 'khor chen po de bris nas dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i dbus kyi lte bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'dzum pa mi snang ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:270b-16: tshe mas mngon pa'i 'dzum pa gang yin ba de ni 'dzum pa snang ba yin la /
T02TD2512.2E:270b-17: 'di'i 'dzum pa mi mngon bas na mi snang ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:270b-18: 'dzum pa mi snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi mchog bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD2512.2E:270b-19: su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho siddhi mam /
T02TD2512.2E:270b-20: zhes zlos shing dbus su dgod bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:271a-0: de nas rnam par snang mdzad de'i mdun du 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i gnas su bdud las rnam par rgyal bar mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa @271a * //
T02TD2512.2E:271a-1: yang dag par bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:271a-2: rnal 'byor pa mi bskyod pa'i sbyor bas bdud las rnam par rgyal bar byed cing /
T02TD2512.2E:271a-4: zhes zlos bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:271a-5: g-yas su byang chub sems dpa'/
T02TD2512.2E:271a-6: nor chen gyis ni dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2512.2E:271a-7: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g-yas k'i li k'i la'i gnas su rnal 'byor pas 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa'i nor chen po rin po che'i rigs kyi rang bzhin gyis dbang bskur zhing dbang bskur ba de byed bzhin du bri bar bya'o ;
T02TD2512.2E:271a-9: rnal 'byor pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas badzra ratna zhes bzlas la bdag nyid 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin gyi byang chub sems dpa'i rin po che'i cod pan la sogs pas dbang bskur bar bsam zhing bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan badzra ratna zhes zlos shing g-yas logs su bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:271a-10: rgyab tu byang chub sems dpa' dang ma nyam du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma'i gnas su rdo rje chos la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mnyam du lhan cig chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing dam pa'i chos ston pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:271a-11: chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can gyi chos ston cing rnal 'byor pas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:271a-13: rnal 'byor pa 'od dpag med pa'i nga rgyal bsgom zhing badzra dharm'a zhes zlos shing rdo rje chos la sogs pa'i padma'i rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig tu chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes ston cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:271a-14: g-yon du zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g-yon logs rdo rje bsnyems ma'i gnas su'o //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-0: log par rnam dregs pa ni dbang phyug @271b chen po la sogs pa dregs pa bdo ba rnams ni log par rnam par dregs pa'o zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-1: log par dregs pa de bsgrub pa ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i tshul sprul par mdzad nas de nas de rnams rang dbang du mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-2: bstan pa dam pa la mngon par dga' zhing nan tan lhur byed pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02TD2512.2E:271b-3: de dag ni shin tu yi rangs mdzad pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas don yod grub pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-4: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:271b-5: sngags pas don yod par grub pa'i nga rgyal bskyed la /
T02TD2512.2E:271b-6: badzra karma zhes zlos shing rang gi lus las rdo rje rigs rnams spros la /
T02TD2512.2E:271b-7: des lha chen po la sogs dregs pa bdo ba'i sems can btul te /
T02TD2512.2E:271b-8: rang dbang du byas par yid kyis bsams shing bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams kyang zhi ba'i tshul gyis rang dbang du byas par yid kyis bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:271b-10: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-11: de nas 'di rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-12: mtshams kyi char ni rdo rje dang //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-13: rin chen sdong bu nor bu bri'o //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-14: zhes bya ba ni nang gi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi me'i mtshams su rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
T02TD2512.2E:271b-15: bden bral du rdo rje rin chen /
T02TD2512.2E:271b-16: rlung gi mtshams su sdong bu ste rdo rje padma /
T02TD2512.2E:271b-17: dbang ldan du sna tshogs rdo rje'i ming nor bu zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-18: de nas 'di rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-19: mtshams rnams su ni lha mor bshad ;
T02TD2512.2E:271b-21: sgeg mo bzhad ma glu chen mo //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-22: gar mdzad ma ste lha mo'i tshogs //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-23: 'di dag rdo rje rnam sgeg mo'i //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-24: phyi yi mtshams su bya bar bshad //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-25: ces rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa de nyid 'dir bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-26: sgo nyid du ni lcags kyu zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:271b-28: rdo rje dril bu zhes gsungs pa de 'dir sgo ru bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-29: de bzhin snga ma ji lta bzhin //
T02TD2512.2E:271b-30: 'khor lo de ni brtag par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-1: par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor de legs par bris la rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bris pa'i tshul gyis cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad do //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-2: de nas mchod pa'i thal mo zhes bya ba /
T02TD2512.2E:272a-3: thal mo khong stong snying gar bcings //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-4: zhes bya ba rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:272a-5: g-yon du de bzhin bskor ba ni //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-6: zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i g-yon logs su de bzhin gshegs pa sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis bskor zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-7: me tog dang bcas phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig gcig / ces bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-9: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dam tshig gi rim pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-10: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-11: zhes bya ba ni lhag par mos pa phul du byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-12: de nas phyag byas la me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-13: gang gi dus su zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:272a-14: bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ni //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-16: bskor ba lan gsum byas nas so //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-17: shin tu gsang bas yang dag dgug / ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:272a-18: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a na'm a'a dya nutpa nan tv'a ta /
T02TD2512.2E:272a-19: ces zlos shing gsang ba'i lhags kyu mas dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:272a-23: de nas cho ga ji bzhin du //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-24: ston pa la ni me tog dor //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-25: zhes bya ba ni de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa gsang ba'i lcags kyus dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:272a-28: dbang du bya ba la ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te /
T02TD2512.2E:272a-29: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa'i tshogs cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la me tog dor ba'i sngags kyis me tog gi sil ma dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-30: sangs rgyas byang chub rab grub phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-31: 'gro ba'i mgon la de nyid brjod //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-32: ces bya ba ni bskor ba lan gsum byas nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mdun du 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.2E:272a-33: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2512.2E:272a-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i de kho na nyid 'gro ba'i mgon po bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:272b-1: sangs rgyas byang chub rab grub phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:272b-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:272b-4: de bzhin du phul du byung ba bsgrub pa ni rab grub pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:272b-5: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste shin tu grub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.2E:272b-6: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:272b-7: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a na'm a'a dya nutba nan tv'a ta /
T02TD2512.2E:272b-8: ces bya ba'i snying po dang drul bu dang bcas pa'i gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma dang 'bebs pas dgug cing spyan drangs nas myur ba nyid du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus shing byon par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:272b-9: thams cad ma skyes sbyor ba yis ;
T02TD2512.2E:272b-10: / zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyis ma skyes pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:272b-11: thams cad ma skyes pa ste chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
T02TD2512.2E:272b-12: de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pa'i sems kyi sbyor ba des dngos grub kun ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sgrub pa po'i dngos grub thams cad stsol zhing ster bar mdzad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:272b-13: ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.2E:272b-14: gang gi phyir 'dus pa rnams thams cad ma skyes pa'i sbyor bas sgrub pa po'i dngos grub thams cad rnal 'byor pa la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:272b-15: zhugs nas zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor der zhugs nas so //
T02TD2512.2E:272b-17: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor der zhugs nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:272b-18: dga' ba la sogs mtshan ma mchog / sna tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:272b-19: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor der zhugs nas sgrub par byed pa ni rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub kyi ltas dga' ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:272b-21: 'od zer mthong ba la sogs pa'i mchan ma'i mchog ste /
T02TD2512.2E:272b-22: dam pa'i tshul rnam pa sna tshogs skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:272b-23: de nas zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2512.2E:272b-24: mchog tu slob ma gzhug pa ni dkyil 'khor chen por ro //
T02TD2512.2E:272b-25: cho ga rgyas pa de bzhin no //
T02TD2512.2E:273a-0: zhes bya ba ni 'dir slob dpon gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad 'dir bya ba yin @273a * //
T02TD2512.2E:273a-2: / mchod pa'i thal mos 'khor lo che //
T02TD2512.2E:273a-3: mchod pa byas nas slar 'byung bya //
T02TD2512.2E:273a-4: zhes bya ba ni gang 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por mchod pa'i thal mo des me tog dang /
T02TD2512.2E:273a-7: dri la sogs pa blangs nas me tog la sogs pa der 'khor lo che zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor mchod pa byas nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la dkyil 'khor chen po de las slar 'byung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:273a-8: dngos grub cho ga ji bzhin du //
T02TD2512.2E:273a-9: sgrub pa rnams ni rab bshad bya //
T02TD2512.2E:273a-10: zhes bya ba la dngos grub ni bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T02TD2512.2E:273a-11: cho ga ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni cho ga'i rim pa ma 'chol bar ro //
T02TD2512.2E:273a-12: sgrub ces bya ba ni 'dis sgrub pas na bsgrub pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:273a-14: rab bshad bya zhes bya ba ni de rab tu phye ste sgrub pa dang dngos grub bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ste ci yang rung ba'i tshul du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:273a-15: de la cho ga ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni sgra'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:273a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs la rang gi lha'i sngags dang /
T02TD2512.2E:273a-17: phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du blangs te /
T02TD2512.2E:273a-18: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la mdun du rang gi lha spyan drangs pa dang ;
T02TD2512.2E:273a-20: phyag byas nas de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:273a-21: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas ras ris la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du nye reg lan cig byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:273a-22: zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas la de nas ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul lam dpa' bo gcig pu 'dir gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:273a-23: de'i mdun du bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:273a-24: ras ris la rang gi lha ji lta ba bzhin du spyan drangs nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad pa'am /
T02TD2512.2E:273a-25: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis yang zla ba gcig gi bar du bzlas brjod byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:273a-26: mthar zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:273a-27: de nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-0: bdud la sogs @273b las rnam rgyal brnyes //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-1: bcom ldan ras la bri bar bya //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-2: sgrub pa 'di las gcig tsam ni //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-3: de lta'i bsgrub byas sgrub par 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-4: zhes bya ba 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi ras ris sgrub pa la gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-5: dpa' bo gcig pu'i dbang du byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:273b-6: sku gzugs la sogs mdun du yang ;
T02TD2512.2E:273b-7: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:273b-9: 'dis kyang 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:273b-10: snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la zla ba gcig tsam bzlas par brjod byas nas rang gi lha dpa' bo gcig pu ras la sogs pa la gzhug pa mdun du gzhug ste cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.2E:273b-11: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la slar bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-12: de nas zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na de lta bus ni rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thog par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-13: rgyud 'di la thams cad du yang ras ris sgrub pa la /
T02TD2512.2E:273b-14: lce la rdo rje dkar po bsams te bzlas brjod bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-15: gzhung 'dis ni chos kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa yang bshad par gyur pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:273b-16: gang gi phyir phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:273b-17: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.2E:273b-18: las kyi phyag rgya rnams bsgrubs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la ston pa yin gyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni ma yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-19: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ni zhes bya ba ni de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gnas skabs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-21: de rnams kyi sgrub pa chen po ni rang gi sku'i ngo bor bdag nyid bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-22: de ston par byed pa'i sgra ni tshogs rgyud do //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-23: phyag rgya gcig bcings nas ni //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-24: bdag nyid sangs rgyas yin bsams na //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-25: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:273b-26: bdag nyid sangs rgyas yin no zhes bsgom zhing yang dang yang du mngon du byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-28: phyag rgya chen po dngos grub che //
T02TD2512.2E:273b-29: brtan pa ring por mi thogs thob //
T02TD2512.2E:274a-1: la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ni bdag nyid yin no zhes bsgoms na /
T02TD2512.2E:274a-2: rnal 'byor pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bcar du ming cing gzhig tu med par brtan pa ring por mi thogs shing myur ba nyid du thob pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:274a-3: de ltar phyag rgya chen po'i bsgrub pa gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:274a-4: da ni dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:274a-5: de nas dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa zhes bya ba yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:274a-6: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.2E:274a-7: dam tshig thams cad ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:274a-8: de rnams kyis sgrub pa ni rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:274a-10: zhes phyag rgya bcing ba'i snying po zlos shing bcing ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:274a-12: snying gar rdo rje'i gzugs bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:274a-15: bzlas brjod 'bum gyis bsgrubs nas ni /
T02TD2512.2E:274a-16: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:274a-19: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa pos bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:274a-20: sems dpa'i rdo rje snying gar bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:274a-22: zhes brjod la rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:274a-23: de nas zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du phyag rgya bcing ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:274a-24: rang gi lha'i sngags bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:274a-25: de nas yang de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas la mthar zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na de lta bus ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:274a-26: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:274a-27: da ni las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:274a-28: de nas las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni zhes bya ba yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:274a-29: de nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2512.2E:274a-30: las kyi phyag rgya yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na las kyi phyag rgya thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:274a-31: de rnams kyi bsgrub pa ni bdud bcom pa la sogs ba sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:274a-32: de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
T02TD2512.2E:274b-0: bdud las rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i las kyi @274b phyag rgya bcings la bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:274b-1: mchog rtogs shing zhes bya ba ni mchog ni dam pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:274b-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:274b-3: de rtogs pa ni mngon par byang chub pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:274b-4: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2512.2E:274b-6: 'od dpag tu med pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas chos ston pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:274b-7: mtshungs med sems dang don byas nas //
T02TD2512.2E:274b-8: zhes bya ba ni don yod par grub pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:274b-9: log par spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi don bya bar yid la bsams par byas na'ang de lta bus cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:274b-10: las kyi phyag rgya grub par 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:274b-13: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas yi ge aa las rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:274b-15: zhes zlos shing mi bskyod pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la bdud rab tu gzhom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:274b-16: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings la aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pas bdag nyid mngon par sangs rgyas par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:274b-17: badzra ratna zhes zlos shing rin po che'i rigs kyi rang bzhin can gyis byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu chen pos bdag nyid la dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.2E:274b-18: badzra dharm'a zhes zlos shing 'od dpag tu med pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:274b-19: de nas badzra karma zhes zlos shing don yod par grub pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:274b-20: sems can log par spyod pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:274b-21: yongs su dga' ba rnams dbang du bsdus shing do byas nas bdag nyid bya ba byas pa lta bur bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:274b-22: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:274b-23: snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:274b-24: de'i rjes la zla ba gnyis pa la yang mthar zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:274b-25: de lta bus ni las kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi dngos grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:274b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub mchog ni las kyi phyag rgyal sogs pa sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:274b-27: de'i cho ga ni bya ba rnams so //
T02TD2512.2E:275a-0: de'i cho ga rgyas pa ni chos @275a * //
T02TD2512.2E:275a-1: kyi phyag rgyal sogs pa sgrub pa'i rgyun no //
T02TD2512.2E:275a-2: de ston par byed pa sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
T02TD2512.2E:275a-3: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.2E:275a-5: // / yang 'di'i don brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:275a-7: bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa byas la bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir spos chab kyis bkang ba'i snod la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas te /
T02TD2512.2E:275a-8: lha'i khang pa'i sgor bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:275a-9: mchod yon dang mchod pa rnam pa lnga la ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par bzla'o //
T02TD2512.2E:275a-10: mchod chen thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:275a-11: bdag la byin rlabs la sogs bsgrub //
T02TD2512.2E:275a-12: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chad zhing //
T02TD2512.2E:275a-13: dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:275a-14: lugs ma'am yang na brkos pa'am /
T02TD2512.2E:275a-15: byas pa'am ni bris pa yi //
T02TD2512.2E:275a-16: dang po'i 'khor lo bzhag nas ni //
T02TD2512.2E:275a-17: des ni slar yang rab tu 'grub //
T02TD2512.2E:275a-18: yi ge h'um ma rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor sprul par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:275a-19: de nas gal te 'bor pa yod na me tog la sogs pas dkyil 'khor mchod la /
T02TD2512.2E:275a-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta pra na me na badzra bandha nam ka ro mi /
T02TD2512.2E:275a-21: zhes zlos shing phyogs thams cad nas dkyil 'khor lnga pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag bzhi byas nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad cing /
T02TD2512.2E:275a-23: de nas rdo rje thal mo dang /
T02TD2512.2E:275a-24: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas rdo rje bsdams pa rang gi snying gar dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:275a-25: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa bskyed la /
T02TD2512.2E:275a-26: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa zlos shing rang gi snying gar rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya dgrol bas dbab pa brtan par byas la rdo rje khu tshur gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:275a-27: aom badzra mushta bam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:275a-28: de nas phyag rgya dgrol bar byas la sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa rnam par dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:275a-29: de nas rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas la skyil mo krung gi steng du rdo rje bsdams pa bkan te bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:275a-30: snying gar sems ma rdo rje bkod de /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-0: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs @275b pa'i mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:275b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-4: sa ma ya sa tva aa dhi tishtha sva mam /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-6: dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis snying ga dang dpral ba dang lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:275b-7: de nas rnam pa snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:275b-8: de nas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas rang gi snying gar yid kyis zhugs la /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-9: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas de nyid du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par sprul la /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-10: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar gyi bdag nyid 'jug pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-11: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i nang du 'dres par bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-12: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ;
T02TD2512.2E:275b-13: aom bhu kham aa zhes zlos shing mdun du sna tshogs padma'i steng du /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-15: badzra h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje'i nga rgyal du bsgoms te /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-16: bee ro tsa na h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsams nas de nyid du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya sngar bshad pa'i snying po dang bcas pas dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-20: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-21: aom bhu kham dri shya zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad blta bar byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-22: aom bhu kham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-23: gsang ba'i lcags kyu mas rang gi lus la bcug la yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-24: sa ma ya satvam zhes brjod la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas sa ma ya satvam dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2512.2E:275b-25: aom bhu kham zhes lan gsum bzlas la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang bdag nyid chu dang 'o ma ltar gcig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:275b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos dang las dang /
T02TD2512.2E:275b-27: phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:276a-0: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad @276a * //
T02TD2512.2E:276a-1: pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:276a-2: snga ma bzhin du dang po'i rdo rjes bdag la byin gyis brlab pa byas nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:276a-3: rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.2E:276a-4: yi ge gnyis kyis go cha bgo bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:276a-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje dang bdag po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:276a-6: ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs la /
T02TD2512.2E:276a-7: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:276a-8: de nas 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.2E:276a-9: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen pos bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:276a-10: de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje bzung ste /
T02TD2512.2E:276a-11: chos kyi dril bu dkrol zhing dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.2E:276a-12: aom bhu kham zhes lan gsum bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:276a-13: de nas dang po'i rdo rje nam mkha'i phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa'i gzhal yas khang de bzhin du bskyed de /
T02TD2512.2E:276a-14: lha thams cad kyi gnas su hri las sna tshogs padma'i gdan bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:276a-15: lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom pa ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2512.2E:276a-16: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2512.2E:276a-17: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:276a-18: byang chub snying por byin rlob mdzod //
T02TD2512.2E:276a-19: ces bya ba'i bar gyis bshad pa bsgom pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:276a-20: de nas sgo dbye ba byas la bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:276a-21: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya ba ni las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:276a-22: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms nas yang bsdu bar byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:276a-23: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:276a-24: dpal mchog dang po'i sems dpa' che //
T02TD2512.2E:276a-25: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che //
T02TD2512.2E:276a-26: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD2512.2E:276a-27: rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag //
T02TD2512.2E:276a-28: ces bya ba la sogs pa mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-0: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a nam a'a dya nutpa nna tv'a ta ces zlos shing gsang @276b ba'i lcags kyu mas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcug la /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-1: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms nas chos dang /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-2: las dang phyag rgya chen pos rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:276b-3: de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang bskur la rdo rje sems ma nas rdo rje dril bu'i bar du sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur nas mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-4: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-5: phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyi bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:276b-6: de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i dga' ba'i rdo rjes phyag byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-7: phyag bzhi byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-9: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho & ham /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-11: zhes bya ba'i snying po gsum zlos shing /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-12: don gsum rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-13: ta th'a ga ta mandala sva bh'a wa ham sva mam /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-14: zhes zlos shing bdag nyid ni rang nyid de /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-15: da bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo yin no zhes bsam mo //
T02TD2512.2E:276b-17: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02TD2512.2E:276b-18: dbang phyug chen po dbang phyug che //
T02TD2512.2E:276b-19: bde ba chen po dngos grub mchog //
T02TD2512.2E:276b-20: de bzhin gshegs par bdag gyur cig / ces bsams la rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-21: aom bhu kham zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la 'di nyid chos kyi tshig gis zlos shing bdag nyid lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:276b-22: de ltar na dang por bdag la byin gyis brlab pa lan cig byas nas gang gi tshe mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor bas gnas par 'dod pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-23: aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su rnam par bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog gis //
T02TD2512.2E:276b-25: aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing bdag nyid kyi gnas bzhir de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:276b-26: bya ba thams cad byas nas yang slar zhugs te /
T02TD2512.2E:276b-27: gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma dang /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-0: rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying pos rnam par snang mdzad rang gi lus la bcug la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod @277a * //
T02TD2512.2E:277a-3: phyag kyang byas la de bzhin du bsgoms par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:277a-4: bsgom pas dub par gyur na yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-5: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-6: phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis byas nas de bzhin du phyag byas la de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:277a-7: de ltar zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam //
T02TD2512.2E:277a-9: dus ji srid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba stsol ba de srid kyi bar du nyin re zhing bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:277a-10: de nas nyin re'am zla ba re 'am /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-11: lo re zhing dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:277a-12: de la dang por sa spyang ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-13: sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga rjes su spyad la bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje 'khor los rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro bas sngom pa bzung la rnal 'byor chen po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-14: gzhal yas khang dang gdan rnams bskyed de /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-16: snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:277a-17: de nas de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang ba byas la yang phyag byas nas dang po'i sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-18: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-19: las kyi rgyal mchog rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-20: dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
T02TD2512.2E:277a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs chen po //
T02TD2512.2E:277a-23: sangs rgyas kun mchog bshad du gsol //
T02TD2512.2E:277a-24: zhes bya bas bdag nyid la gsol ba btab par bsam mo //
T02TD2512.2E:277a-25: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-26: aom bhu kham badzra tishtha mandala auttha pa ya zhes zlos shing yid kyis dkyil 'khor bteg la nam mkhar gzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-27: aom bhu kham aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-28: dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis snying ga dang /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-31: spyi bor bdag nyid la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-32: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-33: badzra drishtha mata ces bya ba mig gnyis su dgod pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:277a-34: phyag rgyal gnas de bzhin langs //
T02TD2512.2E:277b-0: kun du rnam @277b par bltas nas ni //
T02TD2512.2E:277b-1: aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing //
T02TD2512.2E:277b-2: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
T02TD2512.2E:277b-3: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:277b-4: lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga byas nas nyi ma 'char kar dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:277b-5: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i cho gas thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:277b-6: de'i nang du phyed kyi tshad la rdo rje rtse gsum pa zlum por bskor ba /
T02TD2512.2E:277b-7: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes par bri ba'i thig gdab bo //
T02TD2512.2E:277b-8: de nas tshon sna lnga'i phye mas dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD2512.2E:277b-9: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar sna tshogs padma la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gser gyi mdog can zhal gcig pa /
T02TD2512.2E:277b-10: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:277b-11: rdo rje skyil mi krung gis bzhugs pa nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba /
T02TD2512.2E:277b-12: rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
T02TD2512.2E:277b-13: zhal shar du gzigs pa cung zad 'dzum pa su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho siddha mam zhes zlos shing bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:277b-14: de'i mdun du 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa zla ba'i mdog can sa gnon gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa rdo rje rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
T02TD2512.2E:277b-15: rnal 'byor pa mi bskyod pa'i nga rgyal gyis bdud las rnam par rgyal bar bsam zhing rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po badzra satva h'um /
T02TD2512.2E:277b-16: zhes zlos shing bri par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:277b-17: k'i li k'i la'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan bee d'u rya'i mdog can /
T02TD2512.2E:277b-18: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
T02TD2512.2E:277b-19: rnal 'byor pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal gyis byang chub sems dpa'i nor chen pos bdag la dbang bskur bar bsam zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:277b-20: badzra ratna zhes zlos shing bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:277b-21: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
T02TD2512.2E:278a-0: rnal 'byor pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i nga rgyal @278a * //
T02TD2512.2E:278a-1: gyis rdo rje chos la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig chos dkyil 'khor lo skor bar bsam ma zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:278a-2: badzra dharm'a hri:zlos shing srog par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:278a-3: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi //
T02TD2512.2E:278a-4: g-yon logs su rdo rje snyems ma'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das don yod grub ba sna tshogs mdog can mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgyas bzhugs te /
T02TD2512.2E:278a-5: rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba rnal 'byor pa don yod par grub pa'i nga rgyal gyis g-yon logs su bzhugs par brtson pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'dul bar byed na /
T02TD2512.2E:278a-6: dam pa rnams la smos kyang ci dgos zhes yid la zhing badzra karma zhes zlos shing bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:278a-7: de la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ngo bo mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ni sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo rab tu byung ba'i cha lugs can /
T02TD2512.2E:278a-8: chos gos bsnams pa sna tshogs padma la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shing bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mngon par phyogs shing /
T02TD2512.2E:278a-9: rdo rje dang rin po che dang /
T02TD2512.2E:278a-11: sna tshogs padma bsnams pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnga' ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:278a-12: de nas rang gi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi me'i mtshams su rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
T02TD2512.2E:278a-13: bden bral gyi mtshams su rdo rje rin po che /
T02TD2512.2E:278a-14: rlung gi mtshams su rdo rje padma dang /
T02TD2512.2E:278a-15: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02TD2512.2E:278a-16: de la 'di rnams kyi snying bo ni satva badzra /
T02TD2512.2E:278a-21: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu'i mtshams su sgeg mo dang bzhad ma dang /
T02TD2512.2E:278a-23: gar ma zhes bya ba'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams snying po 'dis bris par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:278a-26: he be ga ba t'i ba dzra /
T02TD2512.2E:278a-31: nri tya be ba be ba zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:278a-32: shar phyogs kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje lcags kyu sku mdog dkar dmar rdo rje lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dzin par brtson pa /
T02TD2512.2E:278a-33: lho phyogs kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje zhags pa sku mdog dkar po //
T02TD2512.2E:278b-0: rdo rje zhags pas de bzhin @278b gshegs pa thams cad 'dzud pa la brtson pa /
T02TD2512.2E:278b-1: nub phyogs kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje lcags sgrog sku mdog ser po rdo rje lcags sgrog gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ching bar mdzad pa /
T02TD2512.2E:278b-2: byang phyogs kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje dril bu sku mdog sngo bo phyag g-yas na rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:278b-3: phyag g-yon pas gdan la bsnyems te bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:278b-4: de rnams kyi snying po ni dza:badzra aam ku sha /
T02TD2512.2E:278b-9: 'di dag thams cad kyang sna tshogs padma'i gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:278b-10: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /
T02TD2512.2E:278b-11: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mngon par phyogs par bri'o //
