T02TD2512.2E:278b-12: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas sgo phye la bsdu ba byas nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de /
T02TD2512.2E:278b-13: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mdun du 'dug la rdo rje skyil mi krung gis gnas te gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma'i snying po sngar bshad pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcug la /
T02TD2512.2E:278b-14: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal bar byas nas ra ba dang dra ba bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:278b-15: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo rnams bcad de rdo rje bsrung ba thams cad kyis yang dag par bsrungs la /
T02TD2512.2E:278b-16: aom bhu kham zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon phul nas /
T02TD2512.2E:278b-17: aom bhu kham dri shya sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam ham dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2512.2E:278b-19: zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:278b-20: de bzhin du aa: badzra gha tti dra shya sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam aa ham dza:h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2512.2E:278b-22: zhes bya ba lan gsum bzlas /
T02TD2512.2E:278b-23: rdo rje dril bu'i bar du rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-0: de nas chos dang las sang phyag rgya chen po rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rgyas btab la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur zhing rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang @279a * //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-2: de nas mchod yon phul la bum pa gang ba la sogs pa yang dag par mchod nas chos gos su gyon pa'i gos la rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:279a-3: yang gdong g-yogs kyi dang la sgo ba bzhi'i snying po bzlas te /
T02TD2512.2E:279a-4: des rang gi gdong g-yogs la /
T02TD2512.2E:279a-5: shin tu dmar ba'i gos gyon zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:279a-6: me tog gi phreng ba btags ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:279a-7: gdong dri zhim por byas la sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:279a-8: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:279a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:279a-10: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir gsol ba btab pa byas nas sdom pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-11: de nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chu la aom bhu kham zhes bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.2E:279a-12: thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba'i mtshan nyid la me tog dang bcas pa'i snying gar g-yon gyis bskor ba'i tshul gyis bcings la de nas me tog gi phreng ba blangs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:279a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa na //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-15: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-16: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-17: rdo rje chos ni glu blangs pas //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-18: rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-19: zhes brjod cing rdo rje shugs kyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-20: sgo bzhir rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i snying po yang de bzhin du bzla par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-22: ma h'a su ra ta su siddhi su to shyo me su /
T02TD2512.2E:279a-23: su kham badzras tva a'adyasiddya sva m'am /
T02TD2512.2E:279a-24: de'i 'og tu 'jug pa'i phyag rgya me tog dang bcas pa rang gi snying gar bzhag la /
T02TD2512.2E:279a-25: aom pa ra ma su kha sha ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa zlos shing bsam pa g-yos pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa la phyag bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-26: de nas dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor ba byas la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mdun du 'dug ste de kho na nyid brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-27: 'dod chags chen po'i bde ba che //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-28: rdo rje chen po nor che zhing //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-29: ye shes chen po las che ba //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-30: rdo rje sems dpar bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD2512.2E:279a-31: de nas dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2512.2E:279a-33: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la //
T02TD2512.2E:279b-0: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma'i @279b rdo rje phye la aom bhu kham aa zhes lan brgya zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:279b-1: de nas me tog sil ma gtor la 'jug pa'i mdzub mo'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-2: mthe chung gi rtse mo bsgyings ba dang bcas pas dkrol la /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-3: aom pa ra ma su kham sha ya su la li ta bi l'a sya na mi te na ma mi bha ga b'antam dza: h'um bam ho: hi hi hi hi pra t'i tstsha ku su m'a tha zhes brjod do //
T02TD2512.2E:279b-4: de nas phreng ba de blangs la /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-5: rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:279b-6: deng khyod dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-8: gal te skye bo 'dus nang smras //
T02TD2512.2E:279b-9: dad pa med pas pa gang par 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:279b-10: aom ma h'a su kha badzra sa tva aa bhi shi nytsa su ra stvam de nas snying po 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:279b-11: aom badzra tsakshu ka ma ya sa rba su ra ta stvam /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-12: de nas he badzra pa shya zhes zlos shing rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-13: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lha'i ngo bo nyid bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:279b-14: de nas tishtha badzra zhes zlos shing 'jug pa'i phyag rgyas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:279b-15: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor la shing ba brjod pa'i tshul du snying gar bcings nas /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-16: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la bstod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:279b-17: de nas rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-18: rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-19: yang dang po'i rdo rje badzra satva zhes zlos shing byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-20: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rang gi lus la gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod nas /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-21: ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-23: lung bstan pa'i bar gyi cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-24: bdag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-25: ji ltar mngon par 'dod par bzlas //
T02TD2512.2E:279b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa thams cad kyis lang dag par mchod nas phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:279b-27: de nas slob ma gzhug par 'dod na /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-28: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.2E:279b-29: rdo rje mchod yon bskor bcings te //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-2: mgo bos yang dag phyag byas pa //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-3: dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed yin //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-4: zhugs pas dkyil 'khor lan gsum ni //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-5: bskor ba byas nas brjod par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-6: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-7: 'gro ba kun la'ang grub par mdzod //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-8: de nas dus kyi mchod pa yis //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag mchod //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-10: de bzhin dbang bskur rdo rje ni //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-11: bzung ste slob ma gzhug par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-12: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-13: de nas slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-14: de la slob ma bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su gzung ba'am /
T02TD2512.2E:280a-16: dge slong gi sngom pa yongs su bzung bas sngar bshad pa'i cho gas rig pa'i sngom pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-17: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma la 'di skad ces smrar gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga th'a ga par ma ma h'a au tp'a da a'a mi aa she sha na bi she sha sarba sa tva sa dh'a tu dha dra na hri te su khotta ma siddhi ni mitta aa dyanta bha ba siddhi ma he shva rya dhi pa tya yam /
T02TD2512.2E:280a-19: ya boddha satva ta ma h'a ya dhi /
T02TD2512.2E:280a-20: ma he shva rya dhi pa tya yam /
T02TD2512.2E:280a-21: de nas slob ma'i snying gar su ra te sa ma ma ya stvam ho si ddhi badzra ya th'a su kham zhes bya bas de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2512.2E:280a-22: slob dpon gyis slob ma rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bya /
T02TD2512.2E:280a-23: de nas me tog la sogs pas mchod la /
T02TD2512.2E:280a-25: phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chos dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.2E:280a-26: dang por 'jug pa'i phyag rgyas slob dpon 'jug pa'i tshul du zhugs par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-27: de nas 'di skad ces smrar gzhug go //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-28: ma h'a ra ta su tri ta su to shya su su kho badzra satva a'a dya siddhya mam /
T02TD2512.2E:280a-29: de nas yang ngas 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD2512.2E:280a-30: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub par yang mthong na dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang cing dgos te de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par byas /
T02TD2512.2E:280a-31: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig / khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
T02TD2512.2E:280b-0: de @280b nas rdo rje slob dpon rang gi sems ma'i rdo rje phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:280b-1: gyen du bstan pa bcings la rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-2: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis gal te gang zhig la smras na glang ba 'gags par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-3: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02TD2512.2E:280b-4: mna'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas nas slob ma de 'thung du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-5: de la dam tshig gi snying po 'di yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:280b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-7: snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzad //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-8: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni//
T02TD2512.2E:280b-9: de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-10: badzra au da ka tha tha zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-11: de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:280b-12: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje ni nga yin gyis sangs rgyas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-13: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-14: mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re /
T02TD2512.2E:280b-15: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig ces smros shig / de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la de'i snying gar bzhag ste 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-17: 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-19: rdo rje ye shes bla med ni //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-20: di ring nyid du 'bab par shog / badzra ae be sha aa /
T02TD2512.2E:280b-21: zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o ;
T02TD2512.2E:280b-22: / yang khro bo'i khu tshur bcings la rdo rje sems mas g-yas pa dral bar bya zhing aom bhu kham aa aa aa aa zhes lan brgya bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-23: de nas de bzhin du me tog gi phreng ba dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-24: de nas snga ma bzhin du phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-25: de nas de bzhin du gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:280b-26: de nas he badzra pa shya zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:280b-28: de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-0: de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar sgor @281a * //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-1: bltas pa'i sna tshogs padma bris la slob ma rnam par snang mdzad du bsams te sems ma rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs la padma'i steng du las kyi phyag rgya bzhag nas yon gyi mchog blangs la /
T02TD2512.2E:281a-2: slob ma la mchod yon byin te /
T02TD2512.2E:281a-3: de nas mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod nas /
T02TD2512.2E:281a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la aom bhu kham aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa /
T02TD2512.2E:281a-5: zhes bya bas de dbang bskur la 'di skad brjod cing chu de 'thung du yang gzhug go //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-6: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-7: dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-8: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ster //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-9: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs shig / rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-10: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-11: skye bo 'dus nang bstan pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-12: dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-13: slob mas kyang thal mo bskor bas slob dpon la phyag byas la rdo rje me tog la sogs pas dbang bskur pa thams cad blang bar bya zhing yon yang rgyun du dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-14: de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rin po che'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:281a-15: dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur bas kyang de dbang bskur la /
T02TD2512.2E:281a-16: dza: h'um bam ho: ma h'a su kha badzra sa tva aa bhi she ka na stvam /
T02TD2512.2E:281a-17: aa bhi shanyts'i mi sarba badzra aa ti ba te tri to me bha ba /
T02TD2512.2E:281a-19: bha ga b'a na ma h'a badzra dha ra su ra ta stv'am ham /
T02TD2512.2E:281a-20: badzra satva aom bhur bhu ba sva: zhes bya ba'i sngags dang /
T02TD2512.2E:281a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje blangs te rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:281a-22: bdag po'i dbang bskur ba yang byin la ming gi dbang bskur ba yang 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-23: aom sarba badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi ma h'a dha ra te badzra n'a ma aa bhi shinytsa mam sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sva:/
T02TD2512.2E:281a-24: de nas 'dis dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi ma h'a badzra dha ra /
T02TD2512.2E:281a-26: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-27: rdo rje can gyi rdo rje yin //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-28: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-29: rdo rje 'chang chen brtul zhugs yin //
T02TD2512.2E:281a-30: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba byang chub chen po'i sems yongs su mi spang bar rtag tu bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-0: he badzra garbha pa te aa bhi @281b shanytsi he badzra n'a ma siddhi sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sva:/
T02TD2512.2E:281b-1: de nas 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba lnga bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-2: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po lnga yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:281b-3: rtag dang mi bskyod rin chen mchog /'jig rten dbang dang don yod grub //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-4: de bzhin gshegs kun nyid yin pas //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bshad //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-6: de la rigs kyi de kho na nyid ni /
T02TD2512.2E:281b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod pa //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-8: rin chen 'byung ldan rin chen dbang //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-9: 'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje chos //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-10: rdo rje las ni rab grub yin //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-11: de nas de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-12: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-13: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-14: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-15: zhes bya ba bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-16: de nas dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa blangs nas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bzhis mna' bsgags la bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-17: chog rgyas pa ni sngar bshad pa las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-18: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.2E:281b-20: // / de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.2E:281b-21: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga bstan nas dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la slob dpon gyis sgrub pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:281b-22: de nas ma grub dngos grub mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:281b-23: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:281b-27: las kyi phyag rgya zla ba gnyis kyis bsgrub sa pa na gang gi tshe grub par ma gyur pa de'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-28: grub pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rdzogs par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-29: grub pa med pas na ma grub pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:281b-30: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ma grub pa ni dngos grub mchog go //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-31: las rnams ni 'dod chags ba la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-33: de ni ma grub dngos grub mchog / las rnams kyi ni rgyun zhes bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:281b-34: de nyid ni las gzhan las dam par gyur pas na mchog go //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-1: sel zhes bya ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa nyes par spyod pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-2: sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni dbye ba rnam pa brgyas dngos grub thams cad grub par byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-3: go rims bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rim pa bzhin te /
T02TD2512.2E:282a-4: ji skad bshad pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i rim gyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-5: rab bshad ces bya ba de ltar gyur pa de rab tu bshad cing bstan bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-6: khyed 'chad par byed pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:282a-7: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:282a-8: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nye bar ston pa'i don to //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-9: nad kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na nad thams cad de skya rbab la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-10: mya ngan zhes bya ba ni sdug pa dang bral ba las byung ba'i yid mi bde ba'i rgyun no //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-11: gnod pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i don grub pa ma rnyed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal lo //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-12: gnod byed ni gcong chen po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-14: mi rgyu ba'i bdag nyid can no //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-15: sbyar ba'i dug ni sbyar ba'i las byung ba'i bdag nyid can no //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-16: gshed byed ni gzhan la gnod pa byed pa'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:282a-17: lha dgug pa dag sngags kyi stobs kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-18: g-yeng byed ni phur bu'i phyag rgya'am /
T02TD2512.2E:282a-19: ming rus la sogs pa phyi'i phur bus lha la sogs pas phur bu btab pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-20: ro langs ni 'dir gzhan dag la gnod par bya ba'i phyir shi ba'i rol srin po gdug pa bcug pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-21: sngags ni sgrub pa po'i don la gegs byed par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-22: sman ni 'dod pa'i don la gegs byed pas gzung ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-23: bgegs ni sgrub pa po'i 'dod chags pa nang gi bgegs dang /
T02TD2512.2E:282a-24: dngos grub gyi bar du gcod pa'i phyir bgegs rnams so //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-25: log 'dren ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-26: sdig pa ni sgrub pa po la za bar brtson pa'i srin po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-28: dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:282a-29: rims ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-30: gdon ni sems can gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i lha'i gdon la sogs pa rig pa mchog pas gsungs pa bco brgyad do //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-31: mkha' 'gro ma ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-32: nye bar 'tshe ba ni khyim du srin po la sogs pa snang ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:282a-33: des nye bar bcom pa ni nye bar 'tshe ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:282b-0: glo bur ba ni 'go @282b ba'i nad do //
T02TD2512.2E:282b-1: nyes pa ni khang pa la sogs par nyes ba glo bur du byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:282b-2: nyon mongs pa ni lus kyi sdug bsngal lo //
T02TD2512.2E:282b-3: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:282b-4: 'di rnams 'jig pa ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'phrog par byed pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyis nad btsir ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-10: khu tshur gyis bsal ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-11: kha zas dang khro bas phur bu dbyung ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-13: aom bris nas phyi ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-15: h'um dang bcas pas bsnun pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-17: tshon bris nas phyir byung ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-19: d'ur ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-22: skra nas bzung ste sbrug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-23: kha tv'am ga steng du bzung ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-24: rang gi khyim du gzhag pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-32: g-yas pa kun du bsgreng ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-33: g-yon pa'i rdo rje sor mos gzung ;
T02TD2512.2E:282b-34: / byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD2512.2E:282b-35: sangs rgyas byang chub rang bzhin byed //
T02TD2512.2E:282b-36: ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:282b-37: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pas rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bskyed de /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-38: 'di bcings nas aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing des nad btsir la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis nad pa'i spyi bo nas brtsams te rkang mthil gyi bar du yongs su bkang bar bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-39: de lta bus ni nad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:282b-40: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-41: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-42: lhan cig yid kyis gcig tu byas la mya ngan gzhig pa'i bsam pas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rang gi mig phyi zhing bde ba skyes par bsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:282b-43: de lta bus ni mya ngan 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:283a-0: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas bsgrub par bya ba dang lhan cig tu byas par bsams la bsgrub par bya ba @283a * //
T02TD2512.2E:283a-1: dang bde ba ngang yid bde ba skyes pa'i bsam bas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te snying gar gzhag par bya ste de lta bus ni gnod pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:283a-2: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:283a-3: nad pa'i lus la bya ba par bya zhing de dang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar pos nad pa'i lus de bzhin du kun du gang bar bsams te de lta bus ni gnod byed thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:283a-4: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas khu tshur gnyis kyis bsal bar byas pas ni dug 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:283a-5: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas kha zas rnyed pa na sngags bzla zhing kha zas de rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du bsams la de nas kha zas de zos na sbyar ba'i dug 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:283a-6: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:283a-7: gshed byed la mngon du phyogs te khros pas rdo rje 'bar ba 'phangs te gshed byed kyi steng du babs par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:283a-8: de lta bus ni 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:283a-9: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas phur bu bzung la yid kyis phyung la de lta bus ni bka' 'khor du 'jug go //
T02TD2512.2E:283a-10: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas phur bu bzung la bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:283a-11: des rting pas brdeg pa'i tshul du byas shing phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:283a-12: las kyang rdo rje 'bar ba spros la ro langs kyi steng du dbab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:283a-13: de lta bus ni ro langs thams cad 'jig go //
T02TD2512.2E:283a-14: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas yi ge aom bris la /
T02TD2512.2E:283a-15: sngags thams cad gzhig pa'i bsam bas dbyi bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:283a-16: de lta bus ni sngags thams cad 'jig go //
T02TD2512.2E:283a-17: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:283a-18: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te ;
T02TD2512.2E:283a-19: sman thams cad bzung ba'i bsam bas de sogs gzung bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:283a-20: de lta bus ni sman thams cad 'jig go //
T02TD2512.2E:283a-21: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya tsham [?] ngam dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:283a-22: aom bhu kham h'um zhes bya bas bgegs thams cad la bsnun cing /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-0: bgegs thams cad @283b kyi steng du rdo rje 'bar ba yid kyis phab na de lta bus ni bgegs thams cad 'jig go //
T02TD2512.2E:283b-1: de bzhin du thams cad byas la log 'dren bkug ste de'i steng du byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya rdo rje 'bar bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-2: de lta bus ni log 'dren thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:283b-3: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas srin po la sogs pa sdig pa thams cad bsad pa'i bsam pa de nyid kyis dbyi bar bya zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kyang de thal bar byas par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-5: de lta bus ni sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:283b-6: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-7: mdun du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad spyan drangs te /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-8: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-9: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rmi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhig pa'i bsam pas sbyin sreg byas na /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-10: de lta bus ni rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-11: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-12: bcom ldan 'das thab kyi dbus su spyan drangs la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-13: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas d'ur ba'i sbyin sreg byas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:283b-14: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings la spyi bor bzhag ste /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-15: byams pa'i lta bas bsgrub par bya ba la bya bcing bcom ldan 'das gtsug 'phyang gis kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i lus kun du gang la rims bcom bar gyur par bsam bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-16: de lta bus ni rims thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:283b-17: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas nad pa'i skra nas bzung la sbrug cing /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-18: bcom ldan 'das khro bo stobs po ches bsgrub par bya ba'i lus las gdon blangs te /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-19: gzhan du dor bar bsam bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-20: de lta bus ni gdon 'jig go //
T02TD2512.2E:283b-21: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:283b-22: de'i steng na kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i tshul du gzhag cing bdag nyid dpal he ru kar bsams la bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la sogs pa dang bcas pas bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khyab nas mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya rnams thal bar mdzad par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:284a-1: bus ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la yod pa'i mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:284a-2: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te rang gi khyim du bskor la rdo rje rigs kyis kyang yams kun du 'byin par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:284a-3: de lta bus ni yams thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:284a-4: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:284a-5: rang gi khyim du bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi khyim der rdo rje rigs 'byin pa'i tshul gyis gdug pa thams cad nges par skrod par mdzad pa la brtson par bsams na de lta bus ni nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'jig go //
T02TD2512.2E:284a-6: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:284a-7: rang gi khyim du zhugs la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar bos khang ba thams cad snang bar mdzad cing /
T02TD2512.2E:284a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i dbus na bzhugs par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:284a-9: de lta bus ni glo bur ba'i nyes pa sel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:284a-10: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:284a-11: rang gi snying ga nas bton te /
T02TD2512.2E:284a-12: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khyab par byas par bsams na de lta bus ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:284a-13: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te lus la bskor bas lus thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:284a-14: de lta bus ni lus kyi sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:284a-15: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:284a-16: des tshig 'byin pa'i tshul du bya zhing bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal gyi ngo bor bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:284a-17: de lta bus ni ngag gi sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig go //
T02TD2512.2E:284a-18: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:284a-19: snying ga'i phyogs su btsir zhing snying gar sems dpa' rdo rje bsgoms na de lta bus ni sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:284a-20: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya las nyi shu rtsa lnga bsgrub par gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:284b-0: da ni de nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las nyi shu rtsa lnga pos gzhan bya bar @284b gsungs pa ni tshe chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:284b-1: 'dis kyang 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:284b-2: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du byas la rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog bcings la rang gi snying gar brtan par bya zhing rang gi snying gar rnam par snang mdzad zla ba'i mdog can bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:284b-3: de lta bus ni tshe chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:284b-4: de nyid dbang po thams cad du bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad lo bcu drug lon pa tsam dang bdag nyid chu dang 'o ma bzhin du gcig tu gyur par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:284b-5: de lta bus ni na tshod chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:284b-6: de nyid khar bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ba'i sgo nas zhugs te /
T02TD2512.2E:284b-7: yan lag thams cad khyab nas rnam par snang mdzad du byas par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:284b-8: de lta bus ni gzugs chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:284b-9: de nyid khar bskor la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yang dag par brgyan pa /
T02TD2512.2E:284b-10: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yan lag rnam par mdzes pa kha'i sgo nas zhugs te /
T02TD2512.2E:284b-11: yan lag thams cad khyab pas rnam par snang mdzad du byas par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:284b-12: de lta bus ni kha dog chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:284b-13: de nyid dbral bar bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis khams gsum gyis chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.2E:284b-14: khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal srid thob bas bdag nyid gzi brjid mtha' yas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad du bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:284b-15: de lta bus ni gzi brjid chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:284b-16: de nyid snying gar gzhag ste rang gi snying gar gnas pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bdag nyid snang bar byas shing de'i mdangs dang ldan bar bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:284b-17: de lta bus ni mdangs 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:284b-18: de nyid phrag pa gnyis su bzhag la bcom lan 'das rnam par snang mdzad stobs nam mkha' dang mnyam par rang gi yan lag khyab cing de'i stobs dang ldan par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:285a-0: de lta bus ni stobs 'phel bar @285a * //
T02TD2512.2E:285a-2: de gnyis brla gnyis su bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das don yod par grub pas yan lag thams cad la khyab cing de'i spro ba dang ldan par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:285a-3: de lta bus ni spro ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285a-4: de nyid bcings la des phreng ba bcings pa'i tshul du bya zhing bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sna tshogs phreng ba'i dbang gis bdag nyid dbang bskur bas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las kyi rang bzhin du gyur bar bsam par gyur pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:285a-5: de lta bus ni brtson 'grus 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285a-6: de nyid dbang po thams cad la bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bdag nyid la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dbang gis dbang bskur bas nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:285a-7: de lta bus ni dpal chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285a-8: de nyid spyi bor bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang gis dbang bskur bas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar gyur par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:285a-9: de lta bus ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skal ba bzang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285a-10: de nyid khar bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kha'i sgo nas zhugs pas lus thams cad khyab pas rnam par snang mdzad du gyur cing rnam par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:285a-11: de lta bus ni bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285a-12: de nyid kha nas byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po rang gi kha nas byung bas phyogs bcur rang gi ming sgrogs par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:285a-13: de lta bus ni ming 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285a-14: de nyid thams cad du bskor la rang gi lus byung ba de'i phyogs bcur rang gi snyan pas khyab par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:285a-15: de lta bus ni snyan pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285a-16: de nyid phyogs kun nas bskor la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems grags pa sgrogs par bdag nyid bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:285a-17: de lta bus ni grags pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285b-0: de nyid bcings la de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa bsgoms na de lta bus ni @285b dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285b-1: de nyid bcings la snying gnas dbyung ba'i tshul du byas na blo gros 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285b-2: de nyid snying gar bzhag la dga' ba thob par byas na de lta bus ni brtan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285b-3: de nyid bcings la sangs rgyas kyi tshul du bdag nyid bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtog pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285b-4: de nyid bcings la sangs rgyas thams cad du bsgoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285b-5: de nyid bcings la phung po lnga po bzhag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phung po lnga 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285b-6: de nyid rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba ltar bskor zhing don yod par grub pa'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsams na de lta bus ni don yod par grub pa'i rang bzhin du 'du byed 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285b-7: de nyid bcings la rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgoms na /
T02TD2512.2E:285b-8: de lta bus ni sku 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285b-9: de nyid lce la bzhag na de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285b-10: de nyid bcings la yid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgoms na /
T02TD2512.2E:285b-11: de lta bus ni thugs 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285b-12: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog gi las nyi shu rtsa lnga pa bsgrub par gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:285b-13: da ni de nyid kyi las nyi shu rtsa lnga gzhan dag bsgrub par gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:285b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:285b-15: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:285b-16: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:285b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:285b-18: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad sgeg mo rtogs pa'i sbyin pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:285b-19: de bzhin du gtong ba rjes su dran pas ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:285b-20: de nyid bcings la rdo rje phreng ba ma rtogs pas sems can gyi khams thams cad yang dag par sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:286a-0: de bzhin du tshul khrims rjes su dran pas ni tshul @286a * //
T02TD2512.2E:286a-1: khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286a-2: de nyid bcings la sems can gyi khams thams cad la byams pa yang dag par spros te de lta bus ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:286a-3: de nyid bcings la gar ma'i tshul gyis sems can gyi khams thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:286a-4: de lta bus ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286a-5: de nyid bcings la rdo rje me tog me'i tshul gyis sems can gyi khams thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:286a-6: de lta bus ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286a-7: de nyid bcings la rdo rje bdug pa ma'i tshul gyis sems can gyi khams thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:286a-8: de lta bus ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286a-10: bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes thob par bsgoms na /
T02TD2512.2E:286a-11: de lta bus ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286a-12: de nyid bcings la stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pas ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286a-13: de nyid bcings la rdo rje dril bu'i tshul du bdag nyid bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:286a-14: de lta bus ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286a-15: de nyid bcings la mdun du rdo rje bsgoms na /
T02TD2512.2E:286a-16: de lta bus ni rdo rje 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286a-17: de nyid bcings la rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i gzugs rnam par bsgoms na de'i sgrub pa gnas pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286a-18: de nyid bcings la dran pa dang shes rab dang /
T02TD2512.2E:286a-19: yang dag par ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bsgoms na gzungs rnams 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286a-20: de nyid bcings la tshul gsum gyi bshad pa'i chos bsgoms na chos 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286a-21: de nyid bcings la rdo rje las kyi gzugs su bdag nyid bsgoms te /
T02TD2512.2E:286a-22: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:286a-23: sems can gyi don byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi las bsgoms na las 'grub pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:286a-24: de nyid bcings la gzugs thams cad kun du ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa bsgoms pas ni sna tshogs pa'i bya ba grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286b-0: de nyid bcings la rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi gzugs su bdag nyid bsams la @286b yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed par yid la byas la de lta bus ni sems can gyi don grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286b-1: phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas sems can thams cad kyi don byed par bsgoms pas ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i don 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286b-2: de nyid bcings la rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgoms na de lta bus ni sku 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286b-3: de nyid bcings la lce la rdo rje dkar po bsams la aom bh'u kham zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgoms na de lta bus ni gsung 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286b-4: de nyid bcings la rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgoms na de lta bus ni thugs 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:286b-5: de nyid bcings la rdo rje bdag nyid bsgoms na de lta bus ni rdo rje 'chang chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:286b-6: gang du khyad par dgag pa med pa de thams cad du aom bhu kham zhes bya ba'i snying po bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:286b-7: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba'i las bshad nas /
T02TD2512.2E:286b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog gi phyag rgya nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sna tshogs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i phrin las gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:286b-9: byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:286b-10: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:286b-13: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid bsgoms na de lta bus ni byang chub kyi sems chen po thams cad bskyed par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:286b-14: de nyid bcings la aom sa manta bha dra tsarya /
T02TD2512.2E:286b-15: zhes zlos shing bdag nyid kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i tshul du bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:286b-16: de lta bus ni kun du bzang po'i spyod pa sna tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:286b-17: 'di nyid bcings la aom tsint'a ma ni /
T02TD2512.2E:286b-18: zhes zlos shing rdo rje dpal du bdag nyid bsams la sems can gyi khams thams cad kyis bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par yid la bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:286b-19: de lta bus ni sems can gyi don 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:287a-1: zlos shing bdag nyid dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas 'pho ba nye bar bstan nas sh'akya'i rigs su lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su 'jug par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287a-2: de lta bus ni lhums su zhugs pa grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287a-3: aom dz'a ti bi barte zhes zlos shing bdag nyid yum gyi lhums nas bltams pa'i don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287a-4: de lta bus ni skye ba'i sa yang dag par ston par 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287a-6: zhes zlos shing bdag nyid gzhon nu'i rol pa ston pa la sogs pa bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287a-7: de lta bus ni gzhon nu'i rol par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:287a-8: aom ma h'i ba r'a ga dharma /
T02TD2512.2E:287a-9: zhes zlos shing bdag nyid mngon par 'byung bar bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287a-10: de lta bus ni de grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:287a-12: zhes zlos shing bdag nyid dka' ba spyod pa la gnas par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287a-13: de lta bus ni de 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287a-14: aom sarb'a ga mi ni zhes zlos shing bdag nyid byang chub chen po'i snying por 'gro bar bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287a-15: de lta bus ni de 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287a-16: aom badzra dhi ra tsitte h'um /
T02TD2512.2E:287a-17: zhes zlos shing rang gi lus las dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyung la des bdud kyi sde bcom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287a-18: de lta bus ni bdud brtul pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287a-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga te zhes zlos shing mngon par byang chub pa mngon du bya bar bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287a-20: de lta bus ni mngon par byang chub pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287a-21: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho dharma t'a dzny'a na pi shuddhe zhes zlos shing bdag nyid w'a r'a na s'i ra chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287a-22: de lta bus ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'grub bo ;
T02TD2512.2E:287a-23: / aom karma bi shva dha ni zhes zlos shing bdag nyid mu stegs can gzhan dag tshar gcod par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287a-24: de lta bus ni mu stegs pa gzhan tshar gcod pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287a-25: h'um ni su bha badzra ni phat ces zlos shing bdag nyid 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rgyal bar byed cing rdo rje rigs kyi rang bzhin du bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287a-26: de lta bus ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287a-27: aom ma h'a r'a ge zhes zlos shing bdag nyid lha las 'bab par bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287a-28: de lta bus ni de 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287b-0: aom dza badzra ni zhes zlos shing 'dus pa chen po byin gyis brlab par @287b bsgom bar bya ste //
T02TD2512.2E:287b-1: de lta bus ni de 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287b-2: aom h'um sarba dharma ni zhes zlos shing gdug pa thams cad rdo rje rigs kyi tshul gyis yid kyis gdul bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287b-3: de lta bus ni gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287b-4: aom hri zhes zlos shing bdag nyid 'gro ba 'dul ba'i skur bsams la gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pas sems can gdul bar yid kyis bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287b-5: de lta bus ni 'dul ba la rab tu 'jog pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287b-6: aom aa k'a ro mu kham zhes zlos shing ngan song gsum yid kyis bton la gsad bar bya zhing sems can de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes nas byang chub sems dpar gyur par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287b-7: de lta bus ni ngan song thams cad las gdon pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287b-8: aom pra dzny'a p'a ra mi ta zhes zlos shing bdag nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i mdo sde thams cad ston pa la brtson pa'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287b-9: de lta bus ni mdo sde thams cad ston pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287b-10: aom ba h'um zhes zlos shing bdag nyid rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyis rtog pa thams cad brtan par byed par bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287b-11: de lta bus ni rtog pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287b-12: aa zhes zlos shing sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa rnams la sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa ster bar bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287b-13: de lta bus ni dngos grub thams cad ster ba 'grub bo ;
T02TD2512.2E:287b-14: / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a y'a gre zhes zlos shing bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin du bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:287b-15: de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog rab tu thob pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287b-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta w'ag pi shuddhe zhes zlos shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi rang bzhin du bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rab tu thob pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2512.2E:287b-17: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzre ni zhes zlos shing rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgo par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:288a-0: de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs @288a * //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-1: rab tu thob cing rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-2: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa la sogs pa 'dul ba'i sgo rnams rnam par sbyong ba ni rnam par 'phrul pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-3: de sgrub pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-5: yang de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:288a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:288a-7: bsgom par bya ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-8: ji ltar phyag rgya 'di dag gis zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-10: de rnams kyi byang chub ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-11: de'i rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-12: de'i rnam pa la rnam par rtog pa ni rtog pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-13: de ston par byed pa'i sgra la yang nye bar btags pas de skad ces bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-14: de nyid ni ston pa ste bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-15: de'i rgyas pa ni rgyun no //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-16: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dum bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2512.2E:288a-18: // / de ltar sems can rang bzhin bzang ba rnams kyi don du rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:288a-19: da ni khro bas khro ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:288a-20: de nas sna tshogs las chen po //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-22: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:288a-23: dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-24: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa nyid yin ni ;
T02TD2512.2E:288a-25: / sna tshogs ni rnam pa tha dad pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:288a-26: rjes su mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-27: 'di la phrin las chen po mnga' bas na sna tshogs las chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-28: khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen po //
T02TD2512.2E:288a-29: zhes bya ba ni thams cad du khyab par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:288b-0: gdug @288b pa thams cad ni dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ste de rnams 'dul ba'i mchog ni 'dul bar mdzad pa'i dam pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2512.2E:288b-3: sems can kun la rjes ston mdzad //
T02TD2512.2E:288b-4: ces bya ba gsungs te sems can yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na sems can thams cad de /
T02TD2512.2E:288b-6: phan gdags par 'os pa rnams so //
T02TD2512.2E:288b-7: de rnams la rjes su ston par mdzad pa ni rang gi bka' la nges par sbyor bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:288b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis /
T02TD2512.2E:288b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bskyed pa //
T02TD2512.2E:288b-10: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can rang bzhin bzang ba rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas sems can gyi khams rang bzhin bzang ba rnams 'dul ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhi ba des dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can kun gyi don bya zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:288b-11: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gsum 'dul bar rab tu bsgrub par mi nus so zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:288b-12: 'jig rten gsum po de gdul bar bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhi bar nus par ma gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:288b-13: ci'i phyir nus par ma gyur ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:288b-14: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:288b-15: gang gi phyir zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyes byas rnams kyis gdug cing ma rungs par gyur pa rang gi ste /
T02TD2512.2E:288b-16: rang nyid kyis rang gi sems kyi spyod pa rang bzhin des 'gro ba 'di dag kun rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zhi ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:288b-17: zhi ba'i nyams kyis bzhugs pas rab tu bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:288b-18: gdug cing gtum pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2512.2E:288b-19: de bas na bde bar gshegs pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:288b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can rnams kyis don mdzad par gyur pa dag gang gi tshe ste dus gang gi tshe gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can gyi don mdzad par spyod par ma gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2512.2E:289a-0: nyid kyi dngos po kun zhes bya ba nyid kyi rang gi byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid kyi dngos @289a * //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-1: po kun zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa' ste de la gsol ba btab pa ni gsol ba btab par gyur pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:289a-2: gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje rigs kyi rang bzhin du mdzod cig ces gsol ba btab bo //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-3: tshig ji lta bus she na /
T02TD2512.2E:289a-4: sems can gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:289a-5: de nas sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:289a-6: au tishtha sa ma ya kro dha ni sum bha dzva la badzra h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa tsam gyis so //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-7: phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-8: rang nyid gtso bo ni rang dbang can no //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-9: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de rnams la slar 'byung zhing phyir 'thon te /
T02TD2512.2E:289a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdun na gnas zhes bya ba la spyan sngar bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-13: sku gang gis skyil mo krung du ni gang gis she na /
T02TD2512.2E:289a-14: khro bo chen po rgyal po'i sku yis ni //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-15: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-17: khro bo chen po ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-18: de ni rdo rje rigs kyi bdag por gyur pa nyid kyis ni mdzes shing 'bar bas na rgyal po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-19: de'i sku ni gzi mdangs ldan pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:289a-20: khro bo chen po rgyal po'i sku des sgeg pa'i sku'i mdangs gsal te /
T02TD2512.2E:289a-21: khro bo'i gzhi mdangs kyis bzhugs so zhes pa'i tha tshig go /
T02TD2512.2E:289a-22: sems dpa'i skyil krung ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-23: 'bar ba nyid phreng ba dkrigs pas ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba ste de nyid 'od yin la des gsal zhing snang ba 'di la mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-24: de ji lta bus snang bar byed ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:289a-25: sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhan 'dra ba'am /
T02TD2512.2E:289a-27: rdo rje mchog bsdams pa rnam par sreg pa'i bskal pa gnyis 'dra ba'i dang po'i rdo rje gsor zhing snying po gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-28: gzhan yang de nyid kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-29: g-yon pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pa che //
T02TD2512.2E:289a-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2512.2E:289b-0: @289b g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur khro bo'i dril bu dang bcas pa dkur 'jog par mdzad pa ni g-yon bsnyems pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-1: des shugs dang bcas pas na drag po ste /
T02TD2512.2E:289b-2: des gsor ba ni phyag g-yas pas dang po'i rdo rje gyen du 'phen pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-3: khyad par ji lta bus des gsor zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:289b-4: bskyod ces bya ba smos te /
T02TD2512.2E:289b-5: myur zhing shin tu rings par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-6: 'bar ba ni rdo rje cher 'bar zhes bya ba 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje ni cher 'bar ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-7: de'i 'bar bas nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pas na 'bar ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-8: de'i me stag rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje me'i me stag chung du rnams te des sreg pa 'dra zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa thams cad sreg pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-9: gsor ba ni gyen du 'phen pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-10: 'bar ba chen po ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pa'i rdo rje 'bar bas rab tu 'bar ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-11: de ji lta bus she na /
T02TD2512.2E:289b-12: bskal ba'i me dpung lta bu yin //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-15: dang po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2512.2E:289b-16: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas pa rdo rje gang yin pa de ni dang po'i rdo rje'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-17: khro gnyer bcas zhes bya ba ni khor gnyer bcas par gnas pas bcas so //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-18: rdo rje mchog 'dzin ni rdo rje dam pa snang ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:289b-19: dang po'i rdo rje bsdams pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-20: gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-22: de la 'di ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2512.2E:289b-23: h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-24: rdo rje 'bar ba chen po 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje 'bar pa chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-25: rdo rje 'bar ba chen po yang yin la me ltar 'bar ba yang yin zhing de lta bus ni nyi ma dang ldan pas na 'di la rdo rje me 'bar ba chen po mo dang nyi ma zhes bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:289b-26: rdo rje me 'byung ba'i rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-27: de'i nges pa'i ye shes ni snying po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-28: de ston par byed pa'i sgra h'um zhes bya ba la yang nye bar btags pas me'i snying po zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:289b-29: snying po zhes 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:290a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams @290a * //
T02TD2512.2E:290a-1: cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la zhugs la /
T02TD2512.2E:290a-2: de nas der gnas nas de rnams las rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i skur slar byung ste /
T02TD2512.2E:290a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zhugs so //
T02TD2512.2E:290a-4: de nas gdug cing gtum pa rnams ni nges par rdo rje rigs kyis 'dul ba yin no snyam du dgongs nas shin tu dgyes pas ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis h'um zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:290a-5: sdig pa yang yin la kun kyang yin pas sdig pa kun te /
T02TD2512.2E:290a-6: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi tshul lo //
T02TD2512.2E:290a-7: de nyid ni bud shing dang dra bar ye shes kyi mes bsreg par byas pa yin pas na sdig pa kun gyi bud shing ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:290a-8: de rnams zad pa ni zad pa'i rgyu ste /
T02TD2512.2E:290a-9: ye shes kyi me'i rang bzhin can gyi yi ge h'um ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:290a-10: sdig pa kun gyi bud shing zad pa'i snying po phyung ba la g-yos pa ni g-yos par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:290a-11: 'gul ba ni 'gul bar gyur pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:290a-12: phyogs bcu kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyis sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin can gyi 'jig rten gsum po sa 'og dang sa steng dang /
T02TD2512.2E:290a-13: mtho ris kyi mtshan can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g-yos shing 'gul bar bskyod par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:290a-14: lha chen la sogs lha rnams ni //
T02TD2512.2E:290a-15: g-yo ba med cing rmongs par 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:290a-16: zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um des 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g-yos par byas nas lha chen po la sogs pa yang brgyal zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:290a-17: kun du rmongs pa skye bar gyur pa des na de rnams g-yo ba med cing rmongs pa nyid du gyur to /
T02TD2512.2E:290a-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:290a-20: lha la sogs zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa la spyod pa ni lha ste /
T02TD2512.2E:290a-21: de la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni lha la sogs so //
T02TD2512.2E:290a-22: srid pa gsum po kun gyi phyogs bcu na gnas pa thams cad do //
T02TD2512.2E:290a-23: sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rngul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang 'dus par mdzad par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:290b-0: de nas 'dus par gyur pa de rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub brtan zhing mi phyed par mdzad @290b nas ;
T02TD2512.2E:290b-1: rdo rje rigs kyi rang bzhin gyi gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can thams cad gdul ba'i phyir thabs chen po zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:290b-2: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2512.2E:290b-3: dam pa bdag ces bya ba ni rdo rje rigs kyi rang bzhin de nyid kyi mchog tu gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:290b-4: kyang zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ltos nas kyang gi sgra smos pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:290b-5: thugs su chud ces bya ba ni rdo rje rigs kyi rang bzhin du bdag nyid mngon sum du byas pa ni thugs su chud pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:290b-6: de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshogs las zhes bya ba ni phyag g-yas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba las so //
T02TD2512.2E:290b-8: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:290b-9: rdo rje 'bar ba de la mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor phyung ste zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2512.2E:290b-10: de nyid kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir drag po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:290b-11: drag po yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na drag po chen po ste /
T02TD2512.2E:290b-12: mche ba gtsigs pa la sogs pas 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:290b-13: phyag rgya'i gar gyis 'bar zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'i gar gyis 'bar ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:290b-14: de nas phyogs bcur khyab par 'jug pas na kun du 'khrug pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:290b-15: drag po chen po yang yin la phyag rgya gar gyis 'bar ba yang yin zhing kun du 'khrug pa yang yin pas na rdag po chen po ste /
T02TD2512.2E:290b-16: phyag rgya'i gar gyis 'bar zhing 'khrug / ces bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:290b-17: rdo rje thams cad ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi bdag po rnams so//
T02TD2512.2E:290b-18: de rnams kyi gsang ba chen po ni skye bo thams cad kyi mngon sum du ma gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:290b-19: de ci zhig ce na mkha' 'gro ma'i rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor yin zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:290b-20: mkha' 'gro ma'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi 'khor lo yin pas nam mkha' 'gro ma'i rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor ro ;
T02TD2512.2E:290b-21: / de la rdo rje mi ltar 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD2512.2E:290b-22: de las byung ba'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi lha nam mkha' la rgyu ba thams cad ni mkha' 'gro'o //
T02TD2512.2E:290b-23: de phyung nas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje de las byung zhing bton na cho ga bzhin te /
T02TD2512.2E:291a-0: @291a * // rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs kyis so //
T02TD2512.2E:291a-1: ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:291a-2: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:291a-3: lha mo'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2512.2E:291a-4: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis so //
T02TD2512.2E:291a-5: logs kun du ni yang dag gnas //
T02TD2512.2E:291a-6: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i phyogs dang mtshams rnams su gnas pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:291a-7: sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa //
T02TD2512.2E:291a-8: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa'i rang bzhin lta bur rdo rje rigs chen po byung zhing rnam par ston par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:291a-9: de nas rdo rje de las te 'od 'bar ba'i rdo rje de las so //
T02TD2512.2E:291a-10: sna tshogs gzugs mchog grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:291a-11: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi tshul du sems can gyi khams thams cad bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:291a-12: sems can gdug cing gtum pa rnams btul ba ni sna tshogs gzugs mchog grub pa ste de'i don du byung ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:291a-13: phyung nas kun du bzhud par 'gyur /
T02TD2512.2E:291a-14: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa thams cad rdo rje de las phyung nas phyogs bcur song ba ni kun du bzhud pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:291a-15: kun du 'bar ba rnam par 'khrug / ces bya ba ni thams cad du 'bar ba'i nang du chud pas na kun du 'bar ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:291a-16: phan tshun du rnam par khyab pas na rnam par 'khrug pa'o ;
T02TD2512.2E:291a-17: / rlung gis skyod pa pos zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:291a-18: sangs rgyas thams cad de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad sras te /
T02TD2512.2E:291a-19: byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa na bzhugs shing gnas par mdzad pa rnams h'um zhes bya ba des yang dag par bskul ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:291a-20: 'gro ba'i don la 'dir gshegs shig / ces thugs su chud par mdzad nas /
T02TD2512.2E:291a-21: 'jig rten kun gyis yongs bskor ba //
T02TD2512.2E:291b-0: zhes bya ba gang de dag rang rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi @291b 'khor brgya byin la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can lta bu ni 'jig rten de dag kun gyis sangs rgyas de dag thams cad yongs su bskor nas bzhugs pas na 'jig rten kun gyis yongs su bskor ba ste yongs su bskor ba'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad pa kug cing spyan drangs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:291b-2: sems can kun gyi don dang ni //
T02TD2512.2E:291b-4: drag cing drag po'i sbyor bas sems can gdug cing gtum pa rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir dang zhi bas bsdu bar 'os pa'i sems can rnams kun du bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2512.2E:291b-5: sangs rgyas thams cad dgug cing spyan drangs pa yin no /
T02TD2512.2E:291b-6: bstan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:291b-7: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' rnam pa sna tshogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:291b-8: de grub pa ni rdzogs pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:291b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas gdul bya rnams mi dge ba bcu yongs su spong zhing dge ba bcu nyams su len pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
T02TD2512.2E:291b-10: de'i don du sangs rgyas de thams cad la yang dag par bskul nas spyan drangs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:291b-11: 'jig rten gsum dag de rnams kyang //
T02TD2512.2E:291b-12: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir dang /
T02TD2512.2E:291b-13: bstan pa thams cad grub par bya ba'i phyir dgug par ma zad kyi h'um zhes bya ba des dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa khams gsum gyi bdag po de rnams kyang kun du rgyal bas g-yo ba med par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:291b-14: rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas pa ste //
T02TD2512.2E:291b-15: gnas dang gzhal yas khang dang rang rang gi 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas par dgug go //
T02TD2512.2E:291b-16: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:291b-17: de ltar rdo rje'i rigs bskyed pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis bkug pa'i rjes thogs nyid la rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:291b-18: rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can de rnams la ste /
T02TD2512.2E:291b-19: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa g-yo ba med par gyur pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:292a-0: de rnams la thugs rje skyes nas thugs rje zhes bya ba thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis 'chi ba slong bar byed pa'i rigs pa @292a * //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-2: shi ba slar gso brtan par gsungs //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-4: shi ba slar gso ba'i don la bzlog dka' ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-5: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-6: hi zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i snying po ste /
T02TD2512.2E:292a-7: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas khams gsum gdul bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-8: de nas de gsungs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i khro gnyer gyi phyogs nas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i nye ba'i snying po khro bo gnyis po phyung nas de'i rdo rje'i rigs thams cad rang gi rdo rje las phyung ste /
T02TD2512.2E:292a-9: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa btul nas /
T02TD2512.2E:292a-10: rdo rje ming byin te 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog tu byin gyis brlab pa'i bar du mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-11: de ltar na de nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:292a-12: 'jig rten gsum mchog byin gyis rlob //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-13: ces bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-14: de nas bsdu ba sngon du 'gro ba ni gsum pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-15: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum gsungs nas da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:292a-16: de nas rdo rje 'dzin chen mchog / mgon po yis ni gsol btab pa //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.2E:292a-18: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-19: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ston pa'i tshig yin te gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-20: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-22: mgon po yis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis so //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-23: gsol ba btab pa ni gsol bas btab par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-24: ci'i phyir gsol ba btab ce na /
T02TD2512.2E:292a-25: rtog pa 'di ni bshad pa'i phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:292a-27: 'og nas rjes thogs nyid la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rdo rje rigs kyi rtog pa 'di bshad cing bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:292b-0: sems can thams cad la @292b rjes su ston par mdzad pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba la gsol ba btab par gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-2: dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol du //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:292b-4: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de ni sngar bshad pa yin la dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol pa gang yin pa de ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol lo //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-5: de ci zhig yin zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:292b-6: 'bar ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:292b-7: 'bar ba'i 'od des nye bar mtshon pa'i 'khor lo ste dkyil 'khor la ni 'bar ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:292b-8: nang gi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba dang bcas pa zhes ston pa yin pas de rnal 'byor bas yang dag par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-9: de'i nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar ro //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-10: gzhag par bya zhes bya ba ni lugs ma'am brkos pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-11: sngon po 'bar ba'i sku bzang po //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-12: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sngon po 'bar ba las grub pas shin tu mdzes pa'i sku ni /
T02TD2512.2E:292b-13: sngon po 'bar ba'i sku bzang po //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-15: 'od zer sngon po 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-16: zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-18: bsnyems bcas shas cher 'bar ba la //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-19: zhes bya ba ni bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i shugs dang ldan pa'i 'bar ba gang yin pa de ni bsnyems bcas shas cher 'bar ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:292b-20: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa kha bkan te kha nang du bstan pa ni 'dir bsnyems pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:292b-21: de lta bus ni rdo rje 'bar ba gsor ba la brtson pa ni de la 'bad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-23: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pas ji skad du bshad pa'i snyems tshul byas nas phyag g-yas pas 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gsor zhing bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-24: de yi ngos ni thams cad du //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-25: zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang mtshams rnams su'o //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-26: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-27: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i sku'o //
T02TD2512.2E:292b-28: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sku mtshon cha ci zhig bsnams pa bri zhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:292b-29: rdo rje mtshon cha mdung chen dang //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2512.2E:293a-3: rdo rje mtshon cha ma ni rdo rje'i mtshon cha bsnams ma'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-4: rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa ni rtse gsum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-5: ral gri 'dzin pa ni ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-6: padma 'dzin pa ni zhags pa dang thob ba bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-7: mda' 'dzin pa ni mda' bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-8: kha tv'am ga 'dzin ma ni kha tv'am ga bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-9: 'khor lo 'dzin pa ni 'khor lo bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-10: ba dan sna tshogs 'dzin pa ni lha mo rdo rje dril bu ba dan ma'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-11: rdo rje rigs chen po ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-13: zhes bya ba 'jig rten gsum gyi gsang bar 'bar ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje'i rigs chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po ji ltar bkod pa de bzhin du 'dir yang dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-15: thig bdun gyi ni zhes bya ba smos so //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-17: dang por rdo rje'i phyag rgya bdag / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:293a-18: 'bar ba'i 'khor los yongs su bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor dang por ni rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du bri'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-19: de bzhin du drug pa'i bar la rdo rje pho nya'i mchog dang /
T02TD2512.2E:293a-20: gnod sbyin dang srin po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:293a-22: bdun pa la ni yang dag gnon //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-23: ri mo der ni dgod par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-24: rdo rje 'chang ba chen po yi //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-25: rdo rje rigs ni sna tshogs pa //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-26: zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi don bstan pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:293a-27: dbang phyug dam pa drag po'i tshogs //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-28: gtum po chen po 'dul bar mdzad //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-30: ri mo bdun pa'i bar du rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pas gdul bar gyur pa'i lha chen po la sogs pa nas chu lha'i bar du chung ma dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-32: lha la sogs pa kun gyi tshogs //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-33: zhes bya ba ni phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su ni me la sogs pa'i mtshams su lha yang yin pas lha kun no //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-34: de rnams kyi tshogs ni dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2512.2E:293a-35: de rnams rang rang gi phyogs su dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293a-37: mdor na ming po gsum la sogs /
T02TD2512.2E:293b-0: rang gi phyogs @293b su dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:293b-3: don thams cad grub par byed pa ni ming po gsum mo //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-4: de la sogs pa ni sngon du bya ba'i lha'i tshogs thams cad mdor bsdus nas rang gi phyogs su dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-5: mtshams su lha mor bshad pa yi //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-6: zhes bya ba ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-7: sgo dbus su yang de rnams nyid //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-8: ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs ni /
T02TD2512.2E:293b-9: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du gang bzhag pa de dag 'dir dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-10: rdo rje lcags kyu tshogs bcas pa'i //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-11: khro bo go rims ji bzhin bya //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-12: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i sgo srung ma rnams dang /
T02TD2512.2E:293b-13: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i rnam par 'joms ma khro bo dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de rnams su ji skad bshad pa'i snying pos dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-14: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-15: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa ltar 'dir yang cho ga thams cad de bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-16: khros pas rdo rje gsor ba dang //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-18: de nas me tog blangs nas ni //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-19: khros pas bdag po che la gtor //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-20: zhes bya bar sbyar te rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i cho gas zhugs pa bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-21: me tog dor la rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:293b-22: khros par gyur pas khro gnyer bsdus pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:293b-23: 'dzum pa dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la bdud cing phyag bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-25: rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu ches //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-26: yang dag par ni dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:293b-27: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bkod la /
T02TD2512.2E:293b-28: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo legs par phye ste /
T02TD2512.2E:294a-0: bsdu ba byas la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par bstod nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po spyan 'dren pa'i sngags dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba 'khor @294a * //
T02TD2512.2E:294a-1: dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du spyan drangs shing dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294a-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:294a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyang de kho na nyid kyi snying pos gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni hi zhes bya bas de kho na nyid kyi snying po bstan pas so //
T02TD2512.2E:294a-6: ham zhes bya bzlos shing bcom ldan 'das me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294a-7: de nas dam tshig brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar slob ma la bstan pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
T02TD2512.2E:294a-8: de sems can mang la bde phyir dang //
T02TD2512.2E:294a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dam tshig brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ji skad du bshad pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te bcug nas rdo rje h'um mdzad yi ge h'um dang bcas pas sdigs mdzub bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294a-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sdigs mdzub kyi phan yon gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:294a-12: de nas cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:294a-13: de ltar slob ma zhugs par byas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:294a-15: de nas me tog dor du gzhug go //
T02TD2512.2E:294a-16: de nas de blangs la mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294a-17: de nas dkyil 'khor bstan pa la snying gar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol bar bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:294a-18: 'di ni cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:294a-19: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa de bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa'i cho gas slob ma rnams la dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:294a-20: dngos grub ni rdo rje brtul zhugs dang /
T02TD2512.2E:294a-21: rdo rje rigs bdag po'i de kho na nyid bstan pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:294a-22: dam tshig gsum sbyin pa dang lung bstan pa dang snying po sbyin pa dang phyag rgya bslab pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:294a-24: gzengs bstod pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu bshad pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:294a-25: dam tshig bstan pa rnams bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:294a-26: rdo rje khro bo ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294b-0: de'i las kyi dbye ba bzhi po gang yin @294b bde de rnams la bslab par bya zhing bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294b-2: rgyas gdab pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te de la rgyas gdab pa bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po la rdo rje mda' bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294b-3: phyag rgya gzhig pa ni gdon gyis zin pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas gdon gyi phyag rgya gzhig pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294b-4: 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas gdon gyis bzung ba'i rgyud la yod pa'i gdon gsad pa ni gsad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294b-5: ba dan sna tshogs 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas gdon gyis zin pa'i sems can rnams la yang srog 'byin pa ni sems can rnams la slar 'tsho bar bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294b-6: rdo rje khro bo'i las bzhi po 'di dag gdon gyis bzung ba la bya ba yin nam 'on te ma yin pa ji ltar shes par bya zhe na //
T02TD2512.2E:294b-7: gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:294b-8: sems can gang la mda' 'dzin ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya sbyar ba na 'gyur bskyed par byed na /
T02TD2512.2E:294b-9: sems can de ni gdon gdug pas zin pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294b-10: de nas 'tsho bar byed pa'i phyag rgya sna tshogs ba dan 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas sems can de 'tsho bar byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:294b-11: shin tu bsrung ba'i phyag rgyas slar yang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing sems can de la gdon gyis 'gyur ba yang byed par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir de la bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294b-12: 'tsho ba'i phyag rgya gang yin pa 'dis srog byin te bsrung bar bya ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294b-13: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do//
T02TD2512.2E:294b-14: de nas 'dir bsgrub pa bshad bya ste zhes bya ba ni de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gnas skabs so //
T02TD2512.2E:294b-15: 'dir zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294b-16: sgrub pa ni bsgrub pa'i thabs las so //
T02TD2512.2E:294b-17: bshad ces bya ste zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:294b-18: ji bzhin sku ni dge 'dun du //
T02TD2512.2E:294b-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das me ltar 'bar ba'i ras ris la sogs pa ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i sku gzugs dge zhing sdig pa dang bral ba de'i mdun du ste /
T02TD2512.2E:295a-0: spyan sngar rdo rje gsor bas rdo rje gsor zhing dang po zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i @295a * //
T02TD2512.2E:295a-1: zhag nas brtsams te bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o zhes bya ba bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:295a-3: 'bum tshang nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i 'bras bu gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:295a-4: de ltar yi ge h'um gi sgrub pa gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:295a-5: da ni de nas de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsgrub pa ni zhes bya ba ni sogs pas yi ge h'um gi sgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:295a-7: de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin can gyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po gsungs nas /
T02TD2512.2E:295a-8: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa sgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:295a-9: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de bzhin no //
