T02TD2512.2E:295a-10: phyag rgya rnams kyi dam pa bsgrub pa ni dam tshig sgrub pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:295a-11: phyag rgya chen po thams cad mngon du byas pa'i thabs so //
T02TD2512.2E:295a-13: ji bzhin rab tu phyag rgya bcing //
T02TD2512.2E:295a-14: zhes bya ba yin te mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba la gnas pa'i skabs ni ji bzhin dus te /
T02TD2512.2E:295a-15: de'i dus su phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:295a-16: bdag nyid bsreg bar bya'o zhes bya ba rang nyid thal bar bya'o zhes bya ba sems bskyed la bzlas brjod kyi dong yis rang gi lha'i snying po zlos shing srid pa 'di nyid du zhes bya ba tshe 'di nyid la khro bo che zhes bya ba rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sgrub pa po'i phyag rgya chen po sgom par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:295a-17: de ltar rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa gsungs nas da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:295a-18: dam tshig gi phyag rgya sgrub pa ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba la rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig 'dzin par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:295a-19: de'i sgrub pa ni de bzhin no //
T02TD2512.2E:295a-20: de nyid bstan pa ni bdag ni thams cad mi snang bar bya zhes brjod cing phyag na rdo rje yi zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2512.2E:295a-21: bdag ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rang bzhin te /
T02TD2512.2E:295a-22: stong pa nyid bcu drug gi ngo bo nyid yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:295b-0: gsad par bya'o zhes bya ba rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i rang @295b bzhin thams cad mi snang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:295b-1: chos bdag med par bsgom pas bsgom pa'i dus kyi dang por de skad brjod la phyag na rdo rje ste /
T02TD2512.2E:295b-2: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dam tshig sgrub pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:295b-3: bzlas brjod byas na rnal 'byor pa rdo rje 'dzin pa 'grub bar 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD2512.2E:295b-5: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2512.2E:295b-6: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa bstan nas /
T02TD2512.2E:295b-7: da ni de las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni zhes bya ba las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:295b-8: sgrub pa de'i rang gi tshul gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2512.2E:295b-9: rnam pa bzhi po la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bu'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa chen po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:295b-11: chos dang las kyi mchod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi las bzhi po gang yin pa de ni shin tu byed ces bya ba ni rab tu byed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:295b-12: nyid ces bya ba nges par gzung ste /
T02TD2512.2E:295b-13: de nyid bsgrub pa'i mchog gi las byed pas rdo rje las nyid thob pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:295b-15: thams cad bde ba'i phyir zlos na //
T02TD2512.2E:295b-17: sems can thams cad rdo rje'i rigs rtogs pa'i bar du bskyed pa ni thams cad bde ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:295b-18: de'i don du bzlas na rdo rje'i las nyid de rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:295b-19: de thob pa ni rnyed pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:295b-20: bskal ba chen po ni chos dang las dang /
T02TD2512.2E:295b-21: dam tshig dang phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:295b-23: de'i rgyas pa ni de'i rgyun no //
T02TD2512.2E:295b-24: de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
T02TD2512.2E:295b-25: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston pa yin par shes par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:295b-26: rdo rje thal mo dang rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:295b-27: de nas rdo rje dbab pa bskyed la /
T02TD2512.2E:295b-28: dbab pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:295b-29: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:295b-30: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje dbab pa la /
T02TD2512.2E:295b-31: yi ge h'um yid kyis bris la /
T02TD2512.2E:295b-32: de nyid yid la zlos shing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:296a-1: yi ge h'um dang yi ge aa'i ye shes dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa la /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-2: rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:296a-3: de'i steng du yi ge h'um nyid dang ka la sogs pa gsal bya'i yi ge dang bcas pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-4: gnyis pa yang de h'um dang bcas pa las rdo rje 'bar ba de'i dbus su yi ge h'um bsams la gnyis su med pa'i thugs rdo rje chen po'i mtshan nyid ltar rdo rje de bzhin no zhes rdo rje'i nga rgyal bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-5: rdo rje de las rdo rje rigs rnams sbrul te /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-6: des gdug pa thams cad btul nas /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-7: de yang rdo rje der yid kyis zhugs par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:296a-8: de nas rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-9: yi ge h'um gis rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bsam mo //
T02TD2512.2E:296a-10: de nas ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-11: zhes zlos shing dam tshig chen po'i sems dpar bdag nyid bsgom mo //
T02TD2512.2E:296a-12: de nas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la ma h'a sa ma yo& ham /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-13: zhes zlos shing rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sku dang gsung dang /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-14: thugs rdo rje'i ngo bor bdag nyid bsams la phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-15: sa ma ya sa tva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes zlos shing ;
T02TD2512.2E:296a-16: snying ga dang dbral ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-17: lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:296a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-19: h'um aa: zhes zlos shing sna tshogs padma'i steng du rdo rje 'bar ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:296a-20: de nas rdo rje'i dbus su h'um bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-22: de nyid badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-23: de nas de nyid du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das me ltar 'bar bar dgug pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-24: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-25: dbang du byas la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:296a-26: h'um dri shya zhes bya bas blta bar byas la rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po'i h'um gis rang gi lus la bcom ldan 'das gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:296a-27: de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:296b-0: sa ma ya stvam hi zhes zlos shing 'od kyi dkyil 'khor @296b bskyed la de zhugs pas bcom ldan 'das dang bdag nyid gcig tu gyur nas /
T02TD2512.2E:296b-1: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba bsgoms la /
T02TD2512.2E:296b-3: sa ma ya stvam ham ho zhes lan gsum bzla par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:296b-4: de nas chos dang las dang /
T02TD2512.2E:296b-5: phyag rgya chen pos bcom ldan 'das rgyas btab la /
T02TD2512.2E:296b-6: dza: h'um bam ho: / zhes zlos shing yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas rang gi lus la sangs rgyas thams cad bcug la rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis de bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:296b-7: de nas de las bshad pa'i chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis de rnams la rgyas btab la /
T02TD2512.2E:296b-8: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:296b-9: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:296b-10: de nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog gi phyag rgyas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyi dbang dang /
T02TD2512.2E:296b-11: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba'i phreng bas dbang bskur ba blangs la yi ge gnyis kyi go chas bdag nyid go bgo bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:296b-12: de nas khro bo rdo rje rtse lnga pas bdag po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:296b-13: ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs la dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:296b-14: de nas khro bo'i rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa gnyis kyis rdo rje bzung zhing chos kyi dril bu dkrol la dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs nas h'um lan gsum bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:296b-15: de nas rdo rje gsor zhing khro gnyer dang 'dzum pa dang bcas pas sdud par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:296b-16: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:296b-17: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02TD2512.2E:296b-18: dbang phyug che nyid bdag po mchog / rdo rje sems dpar bdag gyur cig /
T02TD2512.2E:296b-19: de skad ces brjod la rab tu bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:296b-20: lce la rdo rje dkar po de la h'um bsam mo //
T02TD2512.2E:296b-21: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i gnas su h'um mdzad sgrub par byed pa'i yi ge h'um bris la bdag nyid rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:297a-1: mtshungs par bsam zhing bzlas pa'i don la dmigs shing zla ba gcig gi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:297a-2: mdun du yang ras ris la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du spyan drangs la /
T02TD2512.2E:297a-3: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la phyag byas nas rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgyas yi ge h'um bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:297a-4: de nas zla ba nya ba'i dus su mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na /
T02TD2512.2E:297a-5: nang par rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:297a-6: yang na hi zhes bya ba de bzhin du bsgrubs la zla ba gcig tsam bzlas la de'i rjes la ras ris kyi mdun du stong phrag brgya bzlas nas mthar yang zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na /
T02TD2512.2E:297a-7: nyi ma 'chang ba'i dus su rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:297a-8: de nas phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:297a-9: zla ba gcig tsam du bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa bzlas nas thams cad bya'o zhes bsgom mo //
T02TD2512.2E:297a-10: de nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzhag / yang zla ba gcig tsam bsgoms la mthar de bzhin du mtshan thog thag bsgoms na rdo rje 'chang ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:297a-11: 'on te dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du thams cad byas nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje la h'um yid kyis bri'o //
T02TD2512.2E:297a-12: de nas chos thams cad gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid bar bsgoms la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas zla ba gcig tsam du h'um bzlas la /
T02TD2512.2E:297a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mdun du bzhag la zla ba gzhan la bdag gis thams cad gsang par bya'o zhes brjod la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:297a-14: mthar de bzhin du mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:297b-0: 'on te las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du chog thams cad rjes su spyad la 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mchod @297b pa rnam pa bcu drug gis mchod pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:297b-1: phyag byas la bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje la h'um bsams nas de nyid bzlas shing zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:297b-2: yang bcom ldan 'das mdun du bzhag la mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.2E:297b-3: yang zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:297b-4: mtshan thog thag bzlas shing bsgoms nas de'i rjes la nyi ma 'char kar rdo rje h'um mdzad dang 'dra ba yas thams cad nus par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:297b-5: de ltar na de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba nas brtsams te bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2512.2E:297b-6: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:297b-7: yang 'di'i don brjod par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:297b-8: bdag dang gnas bsrung ba byas la rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor mdun du bskyed nas mngon sum dang 'dra bar bltas la /
T02TD2512.2E:297b-9: gal te 'byor ba yod na me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas dkyil 'khor lnga pas phyag bya pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:297b-10: phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas snga ma bzhin du sdom pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:297b-11: de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thal ma la sogs pa nas dam tshig gi khu tshur bcing ba'i bar gyis phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad byas la de nas yi ge h'um zlos shing rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa nas lha mo rdo rje dril bu ma'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bcings la de'i snying po lan gsum bzlas nas /
T02TD2512.2E:297b-13: zhes bya bas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams rang gi snying gar gzhug go //
T02TD2512.2E:297b-14: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i gzugs kyang rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bar bar yid kyis gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:297b-15: de nas sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa thams cad dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:297b-16: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba la h'um yid kyis bris la de nyid yid la zlos shing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298a-1: de bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298a-2: de nas nam mkha' rab 'byam gyi tshad tsam gyi rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas zhugs la rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298a-3: de nas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i bdag nyid bsams la 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
T02TD2512.2E:298a-4: dkyil 'khor der yid kyis 'jug pa'i glu len cing 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298a-5: de nas me tog dor ba'i glu len cing rang gi mgor me tog gi phreng ba dor la de nas ji lta ba bzhin bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298a-6: de nas dngos grub kyi brtul zhugs bzung ba'i bar gyis chog rnams rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.2E:298a-7: dkyil 'khor der rang gi snying ga'am zla bar yid kyis gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298a-8: de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:298a-9: h'um gis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba snga ma bzhin du rang gi lus la bcug la de nas snga ma bzhin du 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed de bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298a-10: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen por rgyas btab la 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor chen po byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:298a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.2E:298a-12: rdo rje h'um mdzad du yi ge h'um gis byin gyis brlabs par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298a-13: de nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas la sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur pa'i phyag rgya'am /
T02TD2512.2E:298a-14: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur la yi ge gnyis kyi go chas go bgo bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298a-15: de nas rdo rje dang bdag po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:298a-16: ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs bzung nas //
T02TD2512.2E:298a-17: bro bo'i rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod la bcom ldan 'das la khro gnyer 'dzum pa dang bcas pas btud par byas la phyag bzhi byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:298b-0: de'i rjes la de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje bzung @298b zhing chos kyi dril bu dkrol la dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs nas h'um lan gsum bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298b-1: de'i rjes la aom badzra a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD2512.2E:298b-2: zhes bya bas lha thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298b-3: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes zlos shing gzugs brnyan dang 'dra zhing stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo yin par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298b-4: de nas sarba sa mo& ham zhes zlos shing chos thams cad bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi 'thas bu lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298b-5: de nas snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba la yid ge h'um yid kyis bris la sarbhodha ma ma h'a he shvarya dhi pa ram /
T02TD2512.2E:298b-6: sa ma yo& ham badzra sa tva stvam zhes brjod la /
T02TD2512.2E:298b-7: nyin re'i sbyor bas bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298b-8: dkyil 'khor gzhan rnams kyi sngags ni bzlas 'bum bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298b-9: de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa bya bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:298b-10: yang na rang gi snying gar rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la rang rang gi snying pos rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du rang gi snying ga'i dkyil 'khor du rang rang gi gnas su yid kyis bkod la /
T02TD2512.2E:298b-14: zhes zlos shing snga ma bzhin du don gsum pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298b-15: de nas badzra dzva la aa na l'arka a'atma ma h'a mandala sva bha po& ham sva mam zhes bya bas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i nga rgyal gyis bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:298b-16: lha thams cad kyi thugs na gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i dbus su yi ge h'um yid kyis bris la /
T02TD2512.2E:298b-17: de nyid rdo rje'i tshig gam khro bo'i tshig gis zlos shing ji srid dkyil 'khor de nyid nyin re bsgom pa'i dus su mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298b-18: de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa legs par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:298b-19: de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas zhag bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:298b-20: de nas nyin re 'am zla re'am /
T02TD2512.2E:299a-0: @299a * // lo re zhing dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-1: de yang gtsug lag khang ngam /
T02TD2512.2E:299a-6: shar gyi mtshams kyi sa'i char bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-7: de la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su bris na ;
T02TD2512.2E:299a-8: rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:299a-9: yul gyi skye po rnams dang 'tshe ba mang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-10: grong khyer gang gi lho phyogs su bris par gyur na de stong par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-11: gang la dmigs nas bris pa de 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-16: der gang zhig zhugs pa de 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-17: me'i mtshams kyi sar bris na /
T02TD2512.2E:299a-20: bden bral du ni bris na /
T02TD2512.2E:299a-22: rlung gi char bris na chu chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-23: de bas na grong khyer gyi dbang ldan gyi phyogs char brten nas sa yongs su brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-24: mchod rten dang nye ba ma yin rlung gi gnas su yang ma yin /
T02TD2512.2E:299a-25: mchod rten gyi gnas su ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-26: shing gi gnas su ni 'chi ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-29: ji skad bshad pa'i gnas su ni /
T02TD2512.2E:299a-34: sol ba la sogs pa bsal la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-35: gang gi phyir rdo ba dang bcas par ni rlung 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-36: rus pa dang bcas par ni gzer gyis 'debs so //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-37: gseg ma dang bcas pa'i gnas su lkugs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-39: sol ba dang bcas pa'i gnas su rims 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-40: ji skad du bshad pa'i phyogs kyi cha de'i sa de yang bram ze dang /
T02TD2512.2E:299a-43: dmangs rigs te rigs bzhir shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:299a-44: de la dkar po gang yin pa de ni bram ze'i rigs te /
T02TD2512.2E:299a-45: sa phyogs der gang rig pa sgrub par byed na bsang phye dang /
T02TD2512.2E:299b-2: spyi blugs la sogs pa'i rdzas dang /
T02TD2512.2E:299b-3: nges der dkyil 'khor bri par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:299b-4: dmar po gang yin pa de ni rgyal rigs te /
T02TD2512.2E:299b-5: gang de sgrub par byed pas na rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.2E:299b-12: lcags mda' la sogs pa sgrub par byed de der des dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:299b-13: ser po gang yin pa de ni rje'u rigs te gang zhig der bsgrubs pas ni dgra sta dang /
T02TD2512.2E:299b-15: tog spyad la sogs pa bsgrub pa ste des dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o ;
T02TD2512.2E:299b-16: / nag po gang yin pa de ni dmangs rigs te /
T02TD2512.2E:299b-17: sa phyogs gang yin pa der ni cig shos kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:299b-18: tshon sna lnga'i srad bus thig btab la ri mo shin tu mi sbom pa shin tu mi phra ba shin tu mi 'byer pa /
T02TD2512.2E:299b-20: de la ri mo phra bas ni za byed kyi las bskyed do //
T02TD2512.2E:299b-21: sbom pos ni klu'i gnas bskyed do zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so //
T02TD2512.2E:299b-22: de la dang por re zhig yo byad thams cad dang ldan pas mngon par gang 'dod pa'i sa'i dbus su mi rus kyi phye ma la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bzlog la bdag dang slob ma zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:299b-23: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis gdug pa rnams bskrad la gnas bsrung ba rnams byas nas yang nyungs kar dang chu dang /
T02TD2512.2E:299b-24: thal ba la dkyil 'khor de nyid lan bdun bzlas pas gtor la /
T02TD2512.2E:299b-25: sa phyogs der khru gang tsam mam 'dom gang tsam du brkos te zlos la skra dang phub ma dang rus pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:299b-28: sol ba la sogs pa bsal la sbyangs nas spos chu'i dri zhim pos spags pa'i sas bkang ste /
T02TD2512.2E:299b-29: rdo rje rtse mo yongs su bzlas pa'i dri'i chus yang dang yang chag chag btab la kun du brdung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:299b-30: de nas shin tu mnyam par byas pa sgo bzhi dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du chud ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:300a-0: rta babs bzhi sa mdzes par byas pa phyogs bzhir skar khung bzhes yongs su bskor ba der slob ma shin tu byang bas @300a * //
T02TD2512.2E:300a-1: ba'i rnam lnga la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pas shar phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:300a-2: skyang nul byed du bcug cing de nyid yongs su bzlas pa'i dri chus bsang gtor byas la de nyid bzlas pa'i rin po che dang /
T02TD2512.2E:300a-3: sman dang 'bru thams cad sa'i dbus dang phyogs bzhir dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:300a-4: sa gzhi yongs su spyang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.2E:300a-5: rtsig pa la sogs pa shin tu byi dor byas pa'i char rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad la yungs kar dang chu dang thal ba la de nyid yongs su bzlas pas sa la gtor nas yang slob ma shin tu byang bas rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i ba'i rnam lngas shar phyogs nas brtsams te byug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:300a-6: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri'i chus gtor bar byas la de nyid bzlas pa'i rin po che dang sman dang 'bru rnams snga ma bzhin du bcug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:300a-7: de nas yang slob ma shin tu byang bas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i sbos chus shar phyogs nas brtsams te byung tu gzhug go //
T02TD2512.2E:300a-8: de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi sku gzugs lugs ma'am /
T02TD2512.2E:300a-11: bris pa rnams kyis brgyan par bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:300a-12: mtha' mar tshon gyi phreng bas nye bar mdzes par byas la dril bu btags pa'i tog bzang po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:300a-14: 'phan gdugs mchog gi sa rnam par brgyan pa dra ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:300a-16: rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02TD2512.2E:300a-22: mar me la sogs pas shin tu mdzes par byas la mtshams bzhir gnas pa'i spos snod las bdug pa gtul ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:300a-24: gar la sogs pa byed du bcug pas kyang yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2512.2E:300a-25: sa la lag pa gzhag ste yi ge h'um dang /
T02TD2512.2E:300a-26: yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:300a-27: sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-0: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i khro bor snyoms par zhugs pas blangs @300b la bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa byas nas mchod pa rnams pa lnga dang /
T02TD2512.2E:300b-1: mchod yon dang las thams cad pa'i spos chu la /
T02TD2512.2E:300b-2: sngags yongs su bzlas la rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por mngon par sprul la phyag bya ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sngom pa bzung nas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor pas de bzhin bsgrubs nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2512.2E:300b-3: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-4: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-5: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-6: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-8: g-yon pa'i mig tu ta las zla ba bya //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-9: g-yas par ma bkod nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-10: h'um gis mig 'bras bskal ba'i me lta bur //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-11: gnas pa 'dis ni rdo rje'i lta ba bya //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-12: zhes bya ba dang h'um zlos pa la brtson zhing yid kyis phyag rgya chen po bcings la bar snang gi phyogs su gnas te /
T02TD2512.2E:300b-13: rlung gi dkyil 'khor las byung ba'i //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-15: dbus su sa bon rnam bkod pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-16: rdo rje brtul zhugs can gyis bsam //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-17: ri bo dang bcas sa gzhi rnams dang ni //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-18: chu tshogs rdo rje me yi thal bar byas //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-19: nam mkha'i phyogs su kham ni rnam bsams na //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-20: rnam par snang mdzad chu ni rnam par 'bebs //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-21: kun nas dpa' rlabs 'khrug par 'gyur pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-22: rgya mtsho dpag tu med par de rjes 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-23: de tshe rgya mtshor me yis bskor ba la //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-24: padmar yongs su gyur par brtag par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-25: shes rab ces bshad 'dzam bu'i gser mchog can //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-26: rus sbal padma'i rtsa bar bsam par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-27: 'dir ni lte ba dag tu phra nyid ni //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-28: dzambu'i gser du snang ba rnams par bsam //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-29: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kham gi ni //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-30: ngo bo nyid du byon nas lte bar bzhugs //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-31: gcig tu gyur pa de las ri rab ni //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-32: rin chen bzhi yi char ldan yang dag byung //
T02TD2512.2E:300b-34: h'um sum h'um zhes bya ba las sa bon gyi yi ge las ri rab bskyed par bya ba'o zhes bsam mo //
T02TD2512.2E:301a-0: de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo brkyang bas sa la reg par @301a * //
T02TD2512.2E:301a-1: byas la ri rab rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab po //
T02TD2512.2E:301a-2: de nas ri rab kyi steng du rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bskyed la dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-3: bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:301a-4: deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02TD2512.2E:301a-5: ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod la /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-6: yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-7: dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol //
T02TD2512.2E:301a-8: zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod do //
T02TD2512.2E:301a-9: de nas yang yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la dang po sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-10: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang las kyi rgyal po mchog bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:301a-11: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-12: h'um zlos pa la brtson zhing dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag nyid la gsol bar bsam mo //
T02TD2512.2E:301a-14: sems can kun la rjes ston pas //
T02TD2512.2E:301a-15: bcom ldan khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2512.2E:301a-16: au ttishtha sa ma ya kro dha ni sumbha dzva la badzra /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-17: de nas rang gis dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-18: h'um h'um badzra tishtha ma h'a mandala autp'a da ya zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-19: dkyil 'khor chen po bteg la yid kyis bar snang gis phyogs su bteg la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid snying ga dang dbral ba dang lkog ma dang spyi bor bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-20: yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-21: kro dha drashti hi zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-22: phyag rgyal gnas de bzhin langs //
T02TD2512.2E:301a-23: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02TD2512.2E:301a-24: h'um zhes kun du zlos byed cing //
T02TD2512.2E:301a-25: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
T02TD2512.2E:301a-26: yi ge aa las rkang pa gnyis kyi mthil du sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-28: ri rab kyi steng nas brtsams te /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-29: sa gzhi brtan pa la thug gi bar du dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cha rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsam zhing khro bo'i lta bas kyang mtshams dang phyogs dang /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-30: nam mkha' dang 'og dang dkyil 'khor bcing pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:301a-31: dra ba dang rab dag bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:301b-0: yang h'um zlos shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams @301b cad kyi thugs ka nas phyung ste /
T02TD2512.2E:301b-1: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i khro bos 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rdo rje 'bar ba 'khrug cing /
T02TD2512.2E:301b-2: mi bzad pa'i h'um gi sgra 'jigs pas kun du khengs shing sdong bu can gyi padma'i 'dab ma bzhin du kun nas g-yo bar byed pa'o ;
T02TD2512.2E:301b-3: / rdo rje 'bebs pa'i sbyor bas nam mkha'i phyogs thams cad nas babs la /
T02TD2512.2E:301b-4: gar las byung ba'i me tog gi thal mos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2512.2E:301b-5: dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la /
T02TD2512.2E:301b-6: bskal pa'i me'i phung po lta bu'i khro bo'i tshogs byon pas bdud thams cad skrag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:301b-7: de nas dga' ba yongs su gyur pa'i lus kyis shar phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:301b-8: de nas g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas de nyid du 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.2E:301b-9: de bzhin du bgegs thams cad bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:301b-10: de nas gnas de nas gnod sbyin gyi 'gros kyis lho phyogs su song la g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug ste de bzhin du bgegs rnams rjes su bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:301b-11: de nas gnas de nas langs la g-yas brkyang ba dang g-yon brkyang ba gnyis kyis nub phyogs su song la zlum po'i 'dug stangs bcings te de bzhin du bgegs rnams shin tu bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:301b-12: de nas gnas de nas nam mkha'i khams kyi gtos ma lus pa dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bskyod cing rdo rje'i 'gros kyis byang phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:301b-13: de nas g-yas brkyang ba dang g-yon brkyang ba dang sa ga'i 'dug stangs dang /
T02TD2512.2E:301b-15: mthun pa'i rkang stabs te lngas de bzhin du bgegs bskrad par byas nas rdo rje 'gros kyis gnas te /
T02TD2512.2E:301b-16: de nas shar phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:301b-17: de ltar stang stabs bzhis bgegs thams cad bcom par gyur pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:302a-0: dkyil 'khor gyi dus su ji lta bya ba de bzhin du 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa gzhig pa la yang sbyar @302a * //
T02TD2512.2E:302a-2: de ltar 'khrul 'khor la sogs pas bcom par gyur pa yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:302a-3: stang stabs kyi dus 'dir yi ge h'um khro bo'i tshig gis rgyun mi chad par bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302a-4: de nas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas sgo bzhi phye la gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa /
T02TD2512.2E:302a-5: rdo rje rgyu'i ngo bo nyid sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pa 'dis dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302a-6: aom badzra mandala h'um dza: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste dkyil 'khor dgug pa'o//
T02TD2512.2E:302a-7: da'i rjes la aom badzra tsakra aa dhi tishtha siddhya h'um zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pa yang dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302a-8: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba ltar yongs su bskor ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302a-9: de nas seng ldeng gi rdo rje phur ba h'um las mtha' yas dang rnam par rgyal ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:302a-12: rgyal ba zhes bya ba stod khro bo la smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bur bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302a-13: de nas tsandan dmar bos byugs shing srad du dmar pos dkris la /
T02TD2512.2E:302a-14: me tog gi phreng ba dmar po btags te /
T02TD2512.2E:302a-15: ham kro dha ya sa ham tri sha ta tri ta ti zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la g-yon pa'i khro bo khu tshur gyis bzung nas /
T02TD2512.2E:302a-16: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhir rdo rje tho bas brdung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302a-17: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad la bsrung ba byas nas de bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad de /
T02TD2512.2E:302a-18: rdo rje bsrung bas bsrung ba'i lha thams cad yang dag par bsrungs la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i bum pas bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir sgor bzhag nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags zlos shing slob dpon rang nyid dam grogs dang bcas pas shar phyogs nas brtsams te dkyil 'khor gyis byug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302b-0: de nas slob dpon gyis lha thams cad kyi gnas su dri zhim pos dkyil 'khor byas la dpal rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i snying po lag pa bdugs pa la lan @302b bdun bdun bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302b-1: de nas dkyil 'khor de rnams su rang rang gi snying po nyid kyis rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa bkod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302b-2: de nas de rnams la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de /
T02TD2512.2E:302b-3: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin nas ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rin po che dang /
T02TD2512.2E:302b-4: sman dang 'bru thams cad dang ldan pa ras sngon po zung gcig gis mgul pa bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:302b-5: me tog gi phreng ba btags la /
T02TD2512.2E:302b-6: phyi rol kun du dris byugs pa /
T02TD2512.2E:302b-7: me tog gi sil ma gtor ba /
T02TD2512.2E:302b-8: dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i lcug ma btags la lo ma bzang pos kha brgyan pa rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kyang spros chu cung zad bcug la /
T02TD2512.2E:302b-9: cho ga 'dis lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302b-10: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi khro bos mchod yon la lan brgya bzlas la bum pa der rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi khro bo h'um las bskyed de /
T02TD2512.2E:302b-11: rang gi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te /
T02TD2512.2E:302b-12: mchod yon phul la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2512.2E:302b-13: khro bo rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bum pa dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bzung ba'i khro bo rdo rje dang /
T02TD2512.2E:302b-14: me tog gi lcag ma la sogs pa rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi khro bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302b-15: de nas me tog rnams bum pa der bcug la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags nyid kyis bdug sbos dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302b-16: de ltar na rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i bum pa de la yang rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi cho ga bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302b-17: de nas nyi ma gnyis pa la thun gsum du bzlas brjod de bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302b-18: bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302b-19: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi khro bo dang /
T02TD2512.2E:302b-20: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:302b-21: m'a ma k'is nyin re zhing mar la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:302b-22: 'di ni bsnyen pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.2E:302b-23: de ltar mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstod la /
T02TD2512.2E:302b-24: khro bo rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis dang /
T02TD2512.2E:303a-0: me tog la sogs pas yang @303a * //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-1: dag par mchod de slob ma rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-2: de la re zhig dang por slob ma lag na me tog thogs pas phyag byas nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-3: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa las //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-4: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-6: mgon po bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-7: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-8: sngom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-9: de nas slob dpon gyis de rnams kyi snying gar sa ma ya aa zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02TD2512.2E:303a-10: de h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba bsams la lag pa g-yas pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje 'bar ba blangs la de'i snying gar bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-11: su ra ta stvam sa ma ya stvam ham badzra siddha ya tha su kham /
T02TD2512.2E:303a-12: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du bcug ste /
T02TD2512.2E:303a-13: rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas ni //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-14: shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas nyon //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-15: brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-16: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-17: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-18: rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid stsal gang //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-19: de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-20: spyan sngar ma lus de ltar so sor bshags //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-21: bde gshegs sras kyis tshogs gnyis zab pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-22: rgya chen 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-23: sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan pa la'ang //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-24: rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-25: thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur cig / blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-26: ma lus rigs kyi padma'i nang zhugs pa //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-27: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-28: blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' rab ste //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-29: dman pas 'jigs dang bral bas rgyal byed tshal //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-30: srid pa'i sbyor ba zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog / gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-31: 'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing //
T02TD2512.2E:303a-32: blo gros rnam rgyas thugs rje cher ldan pa'i//
T02TD2512.2E:303b-0: @303b brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-1: srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-2: rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-3: 'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rgyal 'gyur ba //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-4: snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cing yang dag rtogs //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-5: mnyam med byang chub rnam par gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-6: sems can rnams ni yongs su smin pa'am //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-7: yang na yongs su skyob par bya phyir ram //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-8: rang gi sems ni dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-9: 'di dag thams cad rtsva sogs bzhin du gtang //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-10: de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-11: bsam gtan shes rab bla na med pa ni //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-12: bdag dang gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-13: skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bya //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-14: bde bar gshegs pa sngags la mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-15: chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-16: blo sogs rnams kyis thob par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-17: khyad 'phags gnas la bdag ni gnas par bgyi //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-19: bdag gis de skad ces brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gis thams cad yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-20: bdag gis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-21: bdag gis sems can thams cad dang /
T02TD2512.2E:303b-22: thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyis btul nas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la rab tu gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-23: bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang sems can 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do zhes sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-24: bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du rjes su rtog par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-25: bdag gis ma yengs ba'i sems dang ;
T02TD2512.2E:303b-26: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:303b-27: bdag gis thos pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtog par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:304a-0: bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas par so sor rtogs @304a * //
T02TD2512.2E:304a-1: par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:304a-4: so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:304a-5: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:304a-6: de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa ma lus pa'i bar la mngon par gnas par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub par bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:304a-7: 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub chen por sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu yin te /
T02TD2512.2E:304a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang /
T02TD2512.2E:304a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:304a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo ste /
T02TD2512.2E:304a-11: 'di nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:304a-12: de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par byas pa'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di la gnas pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa zhes bya ba sgo mtha' yas pa la gnas pa mtha' med par 'gyur ba rdzogs par byas nas gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams la spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i sgo mang po bstan pas yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:304a-13: yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:304a-14: yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la nges par sbyar bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:304a-15: de nas slob ma'i lag tu rdo rje khro bo'i dris dri /
T02TD2512.2E:304a-16: me tog gis me tog / rdo rje bdug pas de la bdug spos sbyin zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:304a-17: rdo rje mar mes mar me snang bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:304a-18: de nas au dumw'a ra dang /
T02TD2512.2E:304a-19: aa shva ttha las byas pa'i so shing dris byugs shing me tog bcings pas rdo rje bzhad pa'i khro bo bzlas shing bsrung bar byas pa sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:304a-20: ku sha sar pa las rdo rje rnon po'i khro bo bzlas pa sbyin no //
T02TD2512.2E:304a-21: de nas srung skud mdud pa gsum dang ldan pa dpung pa g-yon par rang nyid kyis bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:304a-22: aom badzra ha sa kro dha h'a h'a h'a h'a h'um phat /
T02TD2512.2E:304a-23: ces bya ba ni so shing la bzla ba'i sngags so //
T02TD2512.2E:304a-24: aom badzra tishtha kro dha tstshinda tstshinda h'um phat /
T02TD2512.2E:304b-0: ces bya ba ni ku sha la @304b bzla ba'i sngags so //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-1: aom badzra raksha h'um kro dha raksha h'um phat /
T02TD2512.2E:304b-2: ces bya ba ni srung skud la bzla ba'i sngags so //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-3: aom buddha mee tri badzra raksha ham /
T02TD2512.2E:304b-4: zhes bya ba byams pa'i go chas thams cad yang dag par bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-5: aom badzra satva aushshi she h'um phat /
T02TD2512.2E:304b-6: ces bya ba rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas kyang bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-7: de nas 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:304b-8: bzhin bzangs rnams longs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshol cig / nang par thar pa chen po grong khyer chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-9: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o ;
T02TD2512.2E:304b-10: / yang mchod pa byas la bdug spos gtul te bcom ldan 'das lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-11: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-12: khro bo'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-13: bdag la brtse bar gyur nas su //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-14: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-15: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir ;
T02TD2512.2E:304b-17: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-18: de bas gnang ba mdzad par rigs //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-19: sangs rgyas mgon po brtser ldan dang //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-20: byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-21: gsang sngags lha gzhan gang lags dang //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-22: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-23: gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-24: gang su lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-25: sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-26: bdag la dgongs pa mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-27: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-28: sang ni dkyil 'khor bzang po'i ming //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-29: 'di zhes bgyi ba ci nus kyis //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-30: cho ga bzhin du bri lags na //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-31: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-32: thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-33: tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-34: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-36: snying nas dad pas phyag bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-37: bstod pa'i cho ga nyid kyang bya //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-39: 'dod chags bral ba dang ldan pa'i //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-40: chos ni slob ma la bshad pa //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-41: byas nas dang po blo ldan gyis //
T02TD2512.2E:304b-42: ku sha'i stan la nyal du gzhug / rmi lam sangs rgyas mthong ba ni //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-2: mchod pa dang ni sku gzugs mthong //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-3: de la mchod pa rtsom pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-4: dge slong dag las chos nyan dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-5: yang na gzhan las nyan kyang rung //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-6: chos ni rnam par spyod pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-7: de bzhin glegs bam bklag pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-8: rmi lam dge 'dun mthong ba dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-9: yang na dge slong gcig mthong ba dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-10: de dang 'grogs shing gtam zer dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-11: yang na dge slong dngos bor 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-12: gtsug lag khang dag mthong ba dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-13: de bzhin dge slong rnam dag mthong //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-14: rgyal ba'i sras rnams mthong ba dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-15: de bzhin pha ma bla ma dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-16: mdza' bo rnam pa sna tshogs rnams //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-17: rmi lam du ni mthong na shis //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-18: rig sngags dang ni dngos grub thob //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-19: de bzhin bslab pa 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-20: kun dga' rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-21: 'bab chu rnams dang rgya mtsho dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-22: ri dang glang po che dag dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-23: mthong na yang ni dge bar grags //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-24: rgyal po dag ni mthong na shis //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-25: bde gshegs spyod pa mthun pa yi //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-26: dka' thub can dang bram ze dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-27: phyug po skyes bu dam pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-28: ba lang rta dang ngang pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-29: seng ge dang ni ri dvags rnams //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-30: rmi lam du ni mthong na shis //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-31: bkra shis pa yi bya rnams dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-32: gser dag dang ni gter rnams dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-33: rin po che dang dngul dag dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-34: nor ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-35: mdor ni 'byung khungs rnam pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-36: mtshon cha rnams dang 'bru rnams dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-37: 'bras bu rnams dang me tog dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-38: rgyan ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang//
T02TD2512.2E:305a-39: kha zas dang ni gos rnams dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-40: byis pa dag ni gzhon nu dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-41: bud med gzugs ni bzang mo dag / rmi lam du ni mthong na bzang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-42: yang na thob cing reg smra dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-43: rmi lam du ni dbang bskur dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-44: rgyal por gyur cing 'byor pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-45: dmag dpon du ni gyur pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-46: g-yul las rgyal zhing dgra sod dang /
T02TD2512.2E:305a-47: gnyen dang lhan cig 'grogs pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-48: lha rnams kyang ni mthong ba dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305a-49: theg pa dang ni shing rta zhon //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-0: de bzhin ri dang yang thog 'dzeg / ngo mtshar rnam pa sna tshogs dag / rmi lam du ni mthong na dge / yam shing me la sbyin sreg @305b bya ;
T02TD2512.2E:305b-1: / bya ba bzang po dag la 'jug / chu las rgal zhing ri las rgal //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-2: rkun po dag ni tshar gcod dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-3: stobs 'gyed pa las rgyal ba dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-4: gyad stabs rdo bcing 'gying ba dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-5: rtsed mo sna tshogs rmi lam dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-6: de bzhin brtson dang spung byed dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-7: bkra shis dag ni thams cad kyang //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-8: mthong na rab tu dge bar bshad //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-9: gsang sngags cho ga nyan pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-10: dga' ston dge ba mthong ba dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-11: sgrub ba bzang po rtsom pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-12: de la sogs pa'i lha rnams ni //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-13: dge ba rnam pa du ma dag / blo yis rnam par dpyad bya zhing //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-14: de las bzlog pa spang bar bya //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-15: dge ba rnams ni sgrub par 'gyur //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-16: mi dge ba dag shes nas su //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-17: de dag mkhas pas spang bar bya //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-18: dge ba yi ni ltas rnams ni //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-19: rab dang 'bring dang tha ma las //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-20: gsang sngags dngos grub rnam gsum po //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-22: / mi dge ba la zhi ba yi //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-23: sbyin sreg zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-24: ba yi mar la brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-25: cho ga ji bzhin bri bar bya //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-26: de nas slob ma sdig bral zhing //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-27: rnam par dag pa de dag la //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-28: rjes su brtse bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-29: ci 'dod par ni gzung bar bya ;
T02TD2512.2E:305b-30: / de nas mal nas langs la snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2512.2E:305b-31: nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bar snang gi phyogs su bzhag la tshon sna lnga'i srad bu la srad bu'i sngags dang /
T02TD2512.2E:305b-32: h'um lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:305b-33: de nas dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi dris byugs la /
T02TD2512.2E:305b-34: me tog gi sil mas gtor nas bar snang la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2512.2E:305b-35: glu dang rol mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2512.2E:305b-36: mig g-yon dang g-yas su dza las nyi ma dang zla ba ser po snang ba bskyed la /
T02TD2512.2E:306a-0: rang gi lag na gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um las grogs bo rdo rje las kyi khro bor phyung nas g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis tshon sna lnga'i srad bu blangs nas sngags kyis sbyangs pa'i thig chal dkar po la sbangs @306a * //
T02TD2512.2E:306a-1: ba dza: yis srad bu de rang gi lag nas grogs po'i lag tu btang la grogs pos kyang dza: dza: dza: zhes yi ge dza: lan gsum bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306a-2: de nas phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsam zhing slob dpon nub tu 'dug cing shar phyogs su bltas la /
T02TD2512.2E:306a-3: aom badzra sa ma ya su tra ma ti kra ma h'um /
T02TD2512.2E:306a-4: zhes zlos shing thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306a-5: yang slob dpon lho phyogs su 'dug ste /
T02TD2512.2E:306a-6: byang phyogs su bltas la tshangs pa'i thig gnyis pa gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306a-7: de nas me'i mtshams su 'dug ste byang phyogs su bltas la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar ngos kyi thig gdab bo //
T02TD2512.2E:306a-8: rlung gi phyogs nas lho phyogs su bltas la nub ngos su thig gdab bo //
T02TD2512.2E:306a-9: de nas de nyid du 'dug la shar phyogs su bltas te /
T02TD2512.2E:306a-10: byang phyogs su thig gdab bo //
T02TD2512.2E:306a-11: de nas yang me'i phyogs su 'dug la nub tu bltas te lho phyogs su thig gdab po ;
T02TD2512.2E:306a-12: / de bzhin du kha khyer dang lha'i snam bu'i thig gdab par bya zhing /
T02TD2512.2E:306a-13: slob dpon dang sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gnyis ka g-yas nas bskor ba'i tshul gyis 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306a-14: yang me'i mtshams su 'dug la rlung gi mtshams kyi bar du thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306a-15: yang bden bral gyi mtshams su 'dug pa dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi bar du thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306a-16: de nas sgo dang sgo khyud dang rta babs kyi thig gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:306a-17: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306a-18: de ltar phyi'i dkyil 'khor legs par thig btab nas de'i dbus su dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar seng ldeng la sogs pa'i rdo rje phur bu la sngar bshad pa'i phur bu'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la h'um zlos shing rdo rjes brdung bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306a-19: phur bu des tshon sna lnga'i srad bu bltabs te btags la des dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te g-yas nas bskor zhing cha nyi shu'i tshad kyis thig gdab la thams cad kyi nang du rdo rje 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306a-20: de'i nyis 'gyur gyis dngos po 'bar pa'i 'khor los yongs su bskor ba'i nang du thig gdab po //
T02TD2512.2E:306a-21: de'i nyis 'gyur gyis ni gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-0: de'i @306b bzhi 'gyur gyis ni gsum pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-1: de'i lnga 'gyur gyis ni bzhi pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-2: de'i drug 'gyur gyis ni lnga pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-3: de'i bdun 'gyur gyis ni drug pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-4: de'i brgyad 'gyur gyis ni bdun pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-5: thig gis bar du chod par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-6: de nas rdo rje'i thig dang dkyil 'khor gyi ka ba brgyad thig gis legs par thig btab la /
T02TD2512.2E:306b-7: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang gi mtshams las me'i phyogs nas brtsams te ming po gsum dang sring mo bzhi dang /
T02TD2512.2E:306b-8: glu dang sdug bsngal gdon pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-9: de nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2512.2E:306b-10: h'um bzhi zlos shing dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar gnas pa'i phur bu bton la /
T02TD2512.2E:306b-11: rang gi rdo rje 'bar bar yid kyis gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-12: de nas phur bu'i khung bu phye ma lngas bkang la mnyam par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-13: de nas hi zhes bya ba mig g-yon dang g-yas su nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed de khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas shing sgo rnams dbye'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-14: da ni lung las bshad pa'i thig gi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:306b-15: de nas srad bu nyis 'gyur du //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-16: byas pas thig ni gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-17: nam mkha' kun dang cha mnyam pas ;
T02TD2512.2E:306b-18: / tshad ni tshad med pa nyid yin //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-19: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-20: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-21: kha khyer gyis ni yongs bskor cing //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-22: mtshams su lha mos rnam sad byas //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-23: dkyil 'khor gyi ni grva rnams dang //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-24: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-25: zla ba phyed pa la gnas pa'i //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-26: rdo rje rin chen gyis mdzes byas //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-27: mi mnyam med par zur bzhi ste //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-28: dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi yin //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-29: bsam gtan gyis ni rta babs te //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-30: ting nge 'dzin rnams khyams su bshad //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-31: khyams der gnas pa'i rdo rje bdag / gzungs rnams lha mos mchod pa yin //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-32: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pas //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-33: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par mdzes //
T02TD2512.2E:306b-34: dam chos mchog gi yan lag kun //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-0: gdul byas bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog / rlung gis bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog / ba dan dril bu @307a * //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-2: me long ye shes rtag me tog / byang chub yan lag me tog phreng //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-3: dra ba me long me long che //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-4: me tog phreng ba'i rgyan gyis bskor //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-5: kun du mi zad bde ba ni //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-6: bde ba chen po zhes bshad do //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-7: de ltar dkyil 'khor thig btab nas ;
T02TD2512.2E:307a-8: / rin chen sna tshogs phye ma'am //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-9: khams sna tshogs kyi phye ma'am //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-11: de bzhin nyungs kar phye ma ni //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-12: rgya skyegs yung dang sngo dang ljang //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-13: tshon sna bzhi yis btsos gyur cing //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-14: dri zhim phye ma dang bsres la //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-15: srad bu de rnams dgang bar bya //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-16: rin chen phye mas rgyal srid thob //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-17: khams kyi phye ma gser mang rnyed //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-19: nyungs kar gyis ni don nges 'grub //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-20: de la phyi yi dkyil 'khor ni /
T02TD2512.2E:307a-25: dkar pos ri mo lnga bya'o ;
T02TD2512.2E:307a-26: / ri mo bdun la ni kha dog ser po'i ri mo gcig gis 'bar ba'i 'khor lo byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:307a-28: lcags kyi 'khor lo dam pa yin //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-30: lhag ma go bar zad do //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-31: tshon mngon par spyang ba ni sngar bshad pa las gzung ngo ;
T02TD2512.2E:307a-32: / tshon rtsi lnga dang bo dgye ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:307a-34: h'um gis brtsam par byas te /
T02TD2512.2E:307a-35: phyis ni ci ba der bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-36: de nas hi zlos shing 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte ba'i phyogs su sna tshogs padma'i gdan la rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sku gzugs lugs ma'am /
T02TD2512.2E:307a-38: bris pa bzhugs su gsol ba'am /
T02TD2512.2E:307a-39: nam mkha'i phyogs las phab ste /
T02TD2512.2E:307a-40: sku'i gzugs brnyan dang gcig tu bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:307a-41: hi h'um zhes zlos shing mdun du 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i gnas su rdo rje mtshon cha 'dzin ma /
T02TD2512.2E:307a-42: g-yas logs su k'i li k'i la'i gnas su mthu chen 'dzin ma /
T02TD2512.2E:307a-43: de'i rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma'i gnas su mdzod 'dzin ma /
T02TD2512.2E:307a-44: g-yon du rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i gnas su thod pa'i zhags pa 'dzin ma /
T02TD2512.2E:307a-46: bden bral du kha tv'am ga 'dzin ma /
T02TD2512.2E:307a-47: rlung gi mtshams su 'khor lo 'dzin ma /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-0: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su ba @307b dan sna tshogs 'dzin ma dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:307b-1: de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-2: h'um badzra pra ha ra ni ma ta /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-3: h'um badzra sh'u la gri bindha mat /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-4: aom badzra kro she tstshi nda mata /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-5: aom badzra aa ma la padme mata /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-6: h'um badzra gu hya siddhya pa ra ma yo g'i shva ri hr'i: h'um badzra tsande shva ri kha tv'am gi /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-7: ma h'a badzra ka p'a li m'a la ma ku te /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-8: ru lu ru lu le hi /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-9: h'um badzra na ra ya ni badzri /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-10: h'um ma h'a badzra pa t'a ke dzdzi /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-11: de ltar rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'khor lor lha rnams bkod pa byas nas de nas rdo rje shugs kyis byung la /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-12: 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rim pas bskor ba dang po'i thig gi nang du rdo rje gtsug tor ma /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-13: aom tram bandha ham zhes zlos shing bzhi po shar phyogs nas brtsams te gral rim pa bzhin du bri bar gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:307b-14: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad sprul pa'i khro bo bzhis //
T02TD2512.2E:307b-15: aom sarba badzra aadhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shi nyts'a mi bhur bhu ba sva: zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-16: de nas aom sum bha ni dha ti badzre na tstshinda ti ha na ti da ha ti ba tsa ti bhi ri bhi ri sv'a h'a /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-17: zhes bya ba rig pa'i mchog zhal nas byin pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:307b-18: na mo badzra p'a ni sya aom ta kki h'um dza: zhes bya bas khro bo 'dod pa /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-19: ho badzra p'a ni h'um phat ces bya bas gshin rje gshed /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-20: ka ni dhu ni sa h'um phat ces pas khro bo ka ni /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-21: he ma h'a aam ku she ho bha ga b'a na badzra h'um dza: zhes khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-22: aom badzra p'a sha hr'i: zhes bya pas rdo rje zhags pa /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-23: he badzra k'i li k'i la /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-24: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam zhes bya bas khro bo rdo rje k'i li k'i la /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-25: he badzra aa na ya sarba badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam ma h'a pa ra me shva ra la ghu la ghu bha ga b'a na /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-26: badzra aa kro ma h'a sarba bi dza ya kro dha ha ra h'um phat /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-27: ces bya bas khro bo bsnyems pa /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-28: aom badzra mi tra te na su kha te na aa bhya nta ra te na /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-29: au pa tishtha dri dho me bha wa /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-30: a'a ha ro me bha wa ham /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-31: aa pra ti ha tyo me bha wa /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-32: sha shva tva me bha wa ham /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-33: sarba tsitta shre yo me ku ru siddhya ha ha hi zhes bya bas khro bo rdo rje bsdams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-34: aom ru ta ru ta h'um phat ces bya bas khro bo rdo rje khu tshur /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-35: aom badzra lo ke shva ra aa na hi ni dhi ni pa ra me shva ra la ghu la ghu bha ga b'a na badzra kra ma sarba bi dza ye kri da ta aom ha ra ha ra h'um phat ces bya bas khro bo rdo rje snyems ma /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-36: aom badzra mi tra te na su kha te na aa bhya nta ra te na /
T02TD2512.2E:307b-37: au pa tishtha re tva sa tva sho dha ya /
T02TD2512.2E:308a-1: ga b'an badzra su dha ya sarba ma h'a sa tva h'um phat ces bya bas rdo rje sde /
T02TD2512.2E:308a-2: badzra ho badzra bandha ra sarba karm'a dhi pa te ma h'a badzra dha ri pri ya sarba du sht'a na pra du sht'a na ha na tstshinda spho ta ya ma rma ni pra ha ra pra ha ra sma ra sma ra ya th'a ta th'a tree lo kya bi dza ye tsina tam putta dhya na badzra dha ra ma dhe na /
T02TD2512.2E:308a-3: a'a be sha ya sarba l'a l'a l'a l'a li la ya ma na /
T02TD2512.2E:308a-4: ha ha ha h'a ma ma sa tva sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya h'um phat ces bya bas rdo rje gtsug 'phyang ngo //
T02TD2512.2E:308a-5: aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sv'a h'a zhes bya bas ni rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2512.2E:308a-6: aom badzra mutstsha ya pra mutstsha ya aa bi sha sa ma yo tse na tsa me h'um phat ces bya ba ni rdo rje rkang gdub bo ;
T02TD2512.2E:308a-7: / aom ku ru ku ru su ru su ru tishtha tishtha bandha bandha ma h'a ba la sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ha na ha na phat ces bya bas ni rdo rje sgeg mo'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308a-8: aom badzra aa kra ma aa kra ma sarba h'um phat ces bya bas ni rdo rje rnon po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308a-9: aom h'um hu lu hu lu ma no dza ba sh'i ghram a'a gatstsha ya a'a gatstsha ya /
T02TD2512.2E:308a-10: sarba ku ru sarba ta th'a ga ta sa tya ma nu p'a la ya aa ni yam sva aa ni ya badzra sa ma ya sa tva ya h'um hu lu hu lu zhes bya ba ni rdo rje shugs kyi bri ba'am dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308a-11: de ltar srad bu dang po'i nang du rdo rje phyag rgya'i dbang po rnams bkod nas gnyis par sngags kyi phreng ba rnams sa ma ya zhes bya ba 'dis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308a-12: de rnams kyi g-yon logs su rdo rje glu ma'i gzugs can gyi lha mo pi wang len pa la brtson pa /
T02TD2512.2E:308a-13: aom badzra be ti be te sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308a-14: yang rdo rje mgon po btsun mo dang bcas pa rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308a-15: badzra aa ma ra aom ra ta h'um na ma zhes bya ba ni rdo rje mgon po rnams kyi snying po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308a-16: aom badzra aa te pa ti ya hi zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi btsun mo rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308a-17: de ltar gnyis pa sngags kyi lha rnams bris nas gsum par rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje lha mos bskor ba rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308a-18: badzra pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rgyal po rnams kyi snying po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308a-20: de ba de he zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lha mo rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308a-21: de ltar srad bu gsum pa'i nang du rdo rje rgyal po rnams rdo rje lha mo rnams kyis bskor bar bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308a-22: bzhi pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa chen po ste sgeg mo dang /
T02TD2512.2E:308b-0: tshogs kyi dbang phyug @308b rdo rje rol mo rnams brdung ba la brtson pa rnams kyang bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-1: de rnams kyi snying po yi ge h'um yin no //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-2: lnga par ni rgyal phran rnams dang sgor sgo ba rnams dang /
T02TD2512.2E:308b-3: tshogs dang khro bo rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-4: badzra bha bha zhes bya ba ni rgyal phran rnams kyi snying po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-5: badzra be tra dha ra zhes bya ba ni sgo ba rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-6: aom badzra sha sa ya h'um phat ces bya ba ni tshogs rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-7: badzra h'um zhes bya ba ni khro bo rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-8: drug pa ni rdo rje pho nya gtum po dang /
T02TD2512.2E:308b-11: mngag gzhug rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-12: aom badzra aa ma hi aa na ya sarba dza zhes bya ba ni rdo rje pho nya rnams kyi snying po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-13: aom badzra yaksha h'um aa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-14: badzra r'aksha sa raksha mam phat ces bya ba ni srin po rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-15: he badzra kri ta ces bya ba ni mngag gzhug pa rnams kyi snying po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-16: de nas srad bu bdun pa'i nang du btul bar gyur pa'i gtum po chen po drag po la sogs pa dbang phyug dam par rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa dang bdas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-17: de la rdo rje gtsug tor gyis tshar gcad pa drag po la sogs pa nas chu lha'i bar du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-18: rdo rje smin mtshams kyis ni zil gyis gnon to //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-19: rig pa mchog gis ni dam tshig gi sun 'byin te //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-20: snying pos ni nges par gnon to //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-21: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyis ni bskyed do //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-22: khro bo ka ni sa ni rmongs par byas so //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-23: rdo rje lcags kyus ni bkug / rdo rje zhags pas ni bcings /
T02TD2512.2E:308b-24: k'i li k'i las ni btsir /
T02TD2512.2E:308b-25: rdo rje bsnyems pas ni chad pas bcad /
T02TD2512.2E:308b-26: rdo rje bsdams pas ni rgyas btab /
T02TD2512.2E:308b-27: rdo rje khu tshur gyis ni brgyal bar byas /
T02TD2512.2E:308b-30: rdo rje pus mos ni mdud par byas /
T02TD2512.2E:308b-31: rdo rje rkang gdub kyis rgyal /
T02TD2512.2E:308b-32: rdo rje sgrog gis ni bcings /
T02TD2512.2E:308b-33: rdo rje 'khor los ni smra bar byed /
T02TD2512.2E:308b-34: rdo rje rkang pas ni mnyes /
T02TD2512.2E:308b-35: phyag rgya rig pa'i ltag pa'i lhas //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-36: rgyas gdab pa dang 'bebs pa nyid //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-37: rdo rje mgon po lha mor bcas //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-38: btul ba dang ni brdeg pa yis //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-39: rdo rje rgyal po lha mor bcas //
T02TD2512.2E:308b-40: btul dang snun par byed pa dang //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-0: rgyal phran gyis ni mngon par @309a * //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-2: / sgo ba rnams kyis g-yul du bcom //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-3: mi bzad tshogs kyis rjes su btul //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-4: rdo rje khro bos rnam par brlag / pho nya pho nya mo yis bkug / rdo rje gnod sbyin srin po dang //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-5: mngag gzhu pa yis gsod dang zad //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-6: skrag par byas dang zos pa yin //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-7: las rnams kun la rdo rje yi //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-8: rnal 'byor phra men ma rnams kyis //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-9: yid kyis rgyas btab rmongs byas btul //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-10: phyag rgya rigs lhag lha rnams kyis //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-11: kun du brdegs na bza' bar byed //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-12: de la phyag rgya'i rigs pa'i lhag pa'i lha rnams kyi sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-13: bhe dhi te zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi phra men ma rnams kyi snying po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-14: aom badzra aa pa ra tsi ti ru ta ma ta pho nya mo rnams kyi snying po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-15: rdo rje kha tv'am ga'i tshogs chen mos kyang drag po nas chu lha'i mthar thug pa'i bar du chung ma dang bcas pa nyal ba'i tshul du byas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-16: rdo rje mdung gis ni skrag par byas /
T02TD2512.2E:309a-17: rdo rje ral gris ni bcad /
T02TD2512.2E:309a-18: rdo rje zhags pas ni drangs /
T02TD2512.2E:309a-19: rdo rje dbyug pas ni bcag / rdo rje mdung gis ni phug / rdo rje mdas ni nges par rgyal bar byed /
T02TD2512.2E:309a-20: rdo rje kha tv'am gas ni bcom par byas /
T02TD2512.2E:309a-21: rdo rje 'khor los ni dngos grub kyi mchog bsgrub po //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-22: ru lu ru lu zhes bya ba ni rdo rje kha tv'am ga'i tshogs kyi snying po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-23: aom hri: phat ces bya ba ni rdo rje mdung gi tshogs kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-24: aom tstshi nda badzra zhes bya ba ni rdo rje zhags pa'i tshogs kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-25: badzra h'um bam zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i tshogs kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-26: bhinda badzra zhes bya ba ni rdo rje mdung gi tshogs kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-27: badzra ba na zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gzhu'i tshogs kyi'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-28: badzra pra brta ka zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i tshogs kyi snying po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-29: yid la 'dod pa'i cho ga'i sbyor bas las 'di dag thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2512.2E:309a-30: de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu'i me'i mtshams su khro bo'i sgeg mo'o ;
T02TD2512.2E:309a-32: rlung gi mtshams su glu ma /
T02TD2512.2E:309a-33: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su gar ma /
T02TD2512.2E:309a-34: shar phyogs kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje lcags kyu ma khro bo dang bcas pa /
T02TD2512.2E:309a-35: lho sgor rdo rje zhags pa ma /
T02TD2512.2E:309a-36: nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma /
T02TD2512.2E:309a-37: byang gi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje dril bu ma /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-0: rdo rje sems @309b dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa'i snying pos bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309b-1: yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu dang nye ba'i nang gi gnas kyi me'i mtshams su ming po gsum gyi dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-2: bden bral gyi mtshams su sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-3: rlung gi mtshams su klu'i dkyil 'khor dang ;
T02TD2512.2E:309b-4: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su sdug bsngal gdon pa'i dkyil 'khor 'og nas bshad pa'i cho gas bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309b-5: de la rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba sku mdog sngo ba /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-6: zhal khro ba dang bcas pas bzhad pa /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-7: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-8: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur khro bo'i dril bu dang bcas pas bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis 'chang ba /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-9: phyag g-yas pas khro bo'i rdo rje blangs te dres pas gsor bar brtson pa /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-10: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa 'bar ba'i phreng ba can 'od zer 'bar ba kun du 'khrug pa /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-11: sangs rgyas lnga'i rdo rje phreng ba'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-12: khro gnyer dang bcas shing khro bo rdo rje blta bas gzigs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309b-13: sgeg mo dang rdo rje lcags kyu ma sku mdog dkar mo rdo rje mtshon cha dang mnga' bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-14: bzhad ma dang zhags pa ma sku mdog dkar po /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-15: mdung chen po bsnams pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-16: kha tv'am ga bsnams pa glu ma dang lcags sgrog ma sku mdog dkar ljang ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-17: gar ma dang dril bu ma sku mdog gser btso ma'i mdog can zhags pa bsnams pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-18: ba dan sna tshogs bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309b-19: 'di dag thams cad kyang padma'i gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-20: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-21: khro ba dang bcas pas bzhad pa'i zhal ras can /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-22: khro gnyer dang bcas pa'i khro bo rdo rje lta ba dang ldan pa /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-23: 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'bar ba kun du 'khrug pas kyang sangs rgyas lnga'i rdo rje phreng ba'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309b-24: gang du khyad par gyi tshig med pa der rdo rje mtshon cha 'dzin ma phyag g-yas kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa gsor ba la brtson pa /
T02TD2512.2E:309b-25: phyag g-yon pas gdan la bsnyems pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:309b-26: mdung chen 'dzin ma phyag g-yas kyis rtse gsum bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310a-0: phyag g-yon gyis gdan la bsnyems @310a * //
T02TD2512.2E:310a-2: / ral gri 'dzin ma phyag g-yas kyis rdo rje khu tshur gyis ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310a-3: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur rang gi thugs kar 'jog pa'i sdigs mdzub mdzad pa zhags pa 'dzin ma g-yas rdo rje khu tshur gyis zhags pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310a-4: phyag g-yon gyis thod pa bsnams pa'o//
T02TD2512.2E:310a-5: mda' 'dzin ma phyag g-yon gyis rdo rje gzhu bsnams pa'o /
T02TD2512.2E:310a-6: g-yas kyi mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu rgyud bzung nas mda' 'phen pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310a-8: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan sangs rgyas kyi gtsug gi nor bus brgyan pas phyag g-yas kyis rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar ba rtse mor btags pa'i kha tv'am ga bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310a-9: phyag g-yon gyis gdan la bsnyems nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310a-10: 'khor lo 'dzin ma phyag g-yas kyi gung mos rdo rje 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bstod pa'i tshul du bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310a-11: phyag g-yon gyis gdan la bsnyems pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310a-13: phyag g-yas kyis dril bu 'dab ma sna tshogs can btags pa g-yon rdo rje khu tshur dril bu dang bcas pa dkur bstan te bsnyems par bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310a-14: sgeg mo la sogs pa rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul las 'dir khro bo dang bcas pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310a-15: rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa rnams kyi ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310a-16: de la rdo rje gtsug tor bzhi ni sku mdog sngo ba g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje gtsug tor bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310a-17: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis sdigs mdzub byed pa la brtson pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310a-18: rdo rje smin mtshams rigs pa'i rgyal po bzhi ni sku mdog dkar po phyag g-yas pas mdzod spu dkar po bsdams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310a-19: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mos sdigs mdzub byed pa la brtson pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310a-20: rig pa mchog sku mdog sngo ba chos kyi h'um mdzod kyi tshul can g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje padma bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310a-21: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis sdigs mdzub byed pa la brtson pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310a-22: khro bo tikka sku mdog sngo ba /
T02TD2512.2E:310a-23: khu tshur gnyis rdo rje mda' 'phen zhing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310b-0: gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po g-yon pa'i mdzub mos sdigs mdzub mdzad cing g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis ral gri bsnams nas gdug pa thams cad @310b rnam par dkrugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310b-1: khro bo ka ni sku mdog dmar ba g-yas kyi khu tshur gyis ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310b-2: g-yon pa'i mdzub mos sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310b-3: rdo rje lcags kyu mdog sngo ba /
T02TD2512.2E:310b-4: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310b-5: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mos de bzhin du sdigs mdzub mdzad pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310b-6: rdo rje zhags pa sku mdog ser po g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310b-7: g-yon pa'i mdzub mos de bzhin du sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310b-8: rdo rje k'i li k'i la sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis khu tshur du byas pas rang gi thugs kar rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310b-9: rdo rje bsnyems pa sku mdog sngo ba khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje gnyis bsnams te bsnyems tshul gnyis mdzad pas bzhugs shing dpung pa g-yon du 'dud pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310b-10: rdo rje bsdams pa sku mdog gser po g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje bsnams nas g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bsdigs par mdzad pa la brtson pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310b-11: rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog padma ltar dmar skya g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis sdig mdzub mdzad pa la brtson pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310b-12: rdo rje sde sku mdog dkar dmar g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje padma bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310b-13: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin du sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310b-14: gtsug 'phyang sku mdog dmar po mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa rdo rje'i mda' 'phen pas gdug pa thams cad gsod pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310b-15: rdo rje phyag mtshan sku mdog sngo ba /
T02TD2512.2E:310b-16: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje bsdams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310b-17: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mos gdug pa thams cad la yang dag par bsdigs te 'dug pa mdzad cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310b-18: rdo rje rkang gdub sku mdog dmar po g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje rkang gdub bsnams pa /
T02TD2512.2E:310b-19: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis gdug pa thams cad kun du bsdigs nas brgyal bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:310b-20: rdo rje sgrog sku mdog dkar dmar g-yas dang g-yon gyi khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog bsnams pas gdug pa thams cad bcing ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:311a-0: rdo rje rno ba sku mdog sngo ba g-yas pa'i @311a * //
T02TD2512.2E:311a-1: rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mos gdug pa thams cad rab tu bsdigs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:311a-2: rdo rje 'bebs pa g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bsdams nas gsor ba //
T02TD2512.2E:311a-3: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis gdug pa thams cad bsdigs shing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:311a-4: 'di dag thams cad kyang g-yon brkyang ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2512.2E:311a-6: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa /
T02TD2512.2E:311a-7: khro pa dang bcas pa bzhad pa'i zhal ras can /
T02TD2512.2E:311a-8: khro gnyer dang bcas shing khro ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas lnga dang /
T02TD2512.2E:311a-9: rdo rje phreng bas dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa sna tshogs pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:311a-10: rim pa gnyis pa la sngags rnams ni g-yas kyi khu tshur gyi sa dam tshig gi 'ching ba g-yon gyis snga ma bzhin du sdigs mdzub la brtson pa rdo rje khu tshur gzugs can no //
T02TD2512.2E:311a-11: de rnams kyi lha mo ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis pi wang thogs te brdung ba dang ;
T02TD2512.2E:311a-12: rdo rje glu ma'i gzugs can du g-yon phyogs nyid la gnas pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:311a-13: rdo rje mgon po ni byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs can g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung ste stod de mchod pa dang g-yon pas gdan la bsnyems te gnas pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:311a-14: de rnams kyi lha mo nyid kyang de'i gzugs 'chad ba nyid kyis g-yon logs na gnas pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:311a-15: yang srad bu gsum par rdo rje rgyal po rnams ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'i tshul can gser gyi mdog 'dra ba /
T02TD2512.2E:311a-16: lha mo bzhi'i dbus na gnas pa ste /
T02TD2512.2E:311a-17: lha mo de rnams kyang de'i tshul 'dzin pa nyid do //
T02TD2512.2E:311a-18: yang srad bu bzhi par rdo rje chen po 'joms ma rnams ni sgeg pa dang /
T02TD2512.2E:311a-21: gar byed pa rdo rje'i rol mo chen po glu len pa'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig gnas shing ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i grangs dang ldan par shes pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:311a-22: yang srad bu lnga pa'i nang du rgyal phran rnams sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2512.2E:311a-23: sgo ba rnams ni mdog sngo ba /
T02TD2512.2E:311a-24: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten nas g-yas pas rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:311a-25: rdo rje tshogs ni sku mdog sngo ba'o //
T02TD2512.2E:311a-26: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo sdigs mdzub byed par brtson pa /
T02TD2512.2E:311b-0: g-yas pa'i @311b rdo rje khu chur gyis rdo rje thogs nas mdun du bsdu ba dang phyir 'gyed pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i khro bo rnams ni mdog sna tshogs pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur rdo rje dang bcas pas sdigs mdzub byed pa la brtson pa /
T02TD2512.2E:311b-1: g-yon dkur brten par gnas pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:311b-2: sgo ba la sogs pa 'di dag thams cad g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas pa /
T02TD2512.2E:311b-3: spyan dmar zhing 'jigs su rung ba /
T02TD2512.2E:311b-5: khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma bsdus pa /
T02TD2512.2E:311b-6: zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa'o /
T02TD2512.2E:311b-7: rim pa drug pa la pho nya rnams ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje 'od ma'i lhug ma gnyis thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:311b-8: gnod sbyin rnams ni g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mos sdigs mdzub byed pa la brtson pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:311b-9: srin po rnams ni g-yon ba'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mos sdigs mdzub byed pa /
T02TD2512.2E:311b-10: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje mche ba thogs pa'o //
T02TD2512.2E:311b-11: mngag gzhug pa rnams ni g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mos sdigs mdzub byed pa /
